You will take an original approach to a familiar problem today and will be amazed how quickly you find a solution. Is it because circumstances have changed? No, it’s because you have changed your way of thinking. By shifting your focus you understand the issue better.

Don’t sit back and wait for good things to come to you over the coming 12 months – they will, but not to the extent that will make you happy. Get out into the world and make things happen. Be the kind of Pisces who always takes the lead.

The sun is now moving through the most sensitive sector of your chart, so most likely you will be in a thoughtful mood today. And that’s good because the more you think the less likely it is you will make the kind of snap decision that attracts trouble.

Don’t get discouraged if the results you were hoping for have yet to come through. There is still a bit to be done before you get the breakthrough you so strongly desire. Today, make friends with people whose dreams and schemes reflect your own.

If you find that you are under pressure today it can only be because you are putting yourself under pressure. The sun in the career area of your chart means you want to make a good impression. That’s fine, but don’t expect too much of yourself.

The sun in the sympathetic sign of Pisces indicates that so many of the things that have been worrying you will soon fade away. Chances are most of them never existed in the first place, but the important thing is you now feel free to enjoy yourself.

The focus is still on partnerships but of a less personal nature. Matters to do with money, investments and business will be top of your agenda over the next few weeks and if you play your cards right there is every chance you could make a handsome profit.

Don’t try to keep things from partners and loved ones. It won’t work, not least because the planets suggest they know at least half the story already. You are strongly advised to be truthful about what you’ve been up to – and what you intend to do next.

Life seems to have taken a more serious turn of late but that doesn’t mean you cannot have fun. You will, however, have to focus more on work and health issues over the next three or four weeks. Do whatever is takes to keep yourself in good shape.

The sun in Pisces at this time of year makes it easier for you to do things of a creative nature, so identify what it is that attracts you the most and then get on with it. Don’t waste time making detailed plans – let your inner voice guide you.

If you do a favour for someone now they will do no end of favours for you later on when the roles are reversed and it is you who needs some kind of assistance. Most of all, focus on getting your home life sorted – everything else depends on that.

This is a great time for travelling and socializing and generally having a good time. Don’t worry if you don’t have much money to spare at the moment because fate will provide when you need it most. Enjoy other people’s company as much as they enjoy yours.

Your head may be full of good ideas but how many of them will amount to anything? Make this the day you get your act together and decide, once and for all, where you are going to focus your energy. Do just one thing really well.

A little bit of effort will go a long way now the sun is established in your sign, so forget about all the negative things that have happened and believe with all your heart that you are destined for great things. Then apply yourself with energy and enthusiasm.

A Mercury-Jupiter link on your birthday means you need to take command of your thoughts – because if you don’t they could lead you off in some rather weird directions. Be open to new ideas, but only use those you know without a doubt to be true.

Take your time and make a good job of what you are working on. Under no circumstances allow colleagues or employers to pressure you into completing tasks faster than you think is wise. Getting it right the first time is of the utmost importance.

You will be asked to do something today that you really don’t want to do, but according to the planets you will have little choice in the matter. Don’t just go through the motions though – make an effort and make a really good job of it.

Just because you have the power to make people do what you want them to do does not mean you must use it. Bear that thought in mind today before you start barking orders like a sergeant-major. Co-operation works better than coercion in the long-term.

This is the ideal day to sit down with a pen and a piece of paper and map out your plans for the next few months. If you find yourself torn between competing goals and timetables, go with the one that attracted you first. Trust your instincts.

If a colleague promises you all kinds of goodies today if you do something for them you will be inclined to believe them. Why? Because they are physically so attractive. Really Leo, if it’s that easy to persuade you maybe you deserve to be cheated!

If someone gives you a hard time today you must not give them a hard time in return. Just turn your back and walk away and don’t waste any more thoughts or feelings on them. Whatever the issues between you they are not worth getting worked up about.

The planets warn you are paying too much attention to what other people are saying and not enough attention to your own inner voice. The answers you are looking for are inside your head, so slow your thoughts right down and let inspiration come through.

You need to be on your guard today. Even when dealing with people you think you can trust you would be wise to check the facts and figures they give to you before you act on them. There is no guarantee they know what they are talking about.

Your mind seems to be moving a bit slowly at the moment. That can only mean that you are mentally tired and need to give your brain a rest. Forget about serious subjects and find something to do that you enjoy but which does not require much thought.

If you keep your wits about you today you will gain from someone else’s stupidity. That may sound immoral but the fact is if they choose to do something in a slapdash fashion then you are quite entitled to do it better and get rewarded for it.

Because Mercury, planet of the mind, is at odds with Jupiter, planet of exaggeration, today you would be wise to question everything you see and hear. That applies especially to anything to do with money matters and business issues. You cannot afford to take risks.

You have something to say that you suspect won’t go down well in certain quarters. Too bad, say it anyway. This is your time of year and you are entitled to speak your mind. Later on you may be thanked for your words of wisdom – or maybe not!

Venus, planet of harmony, and Pluto, planet of transformation, join forces on your birthday this year – a combination that makes all things possible for you over the coming 12 months. What is the one thing you are most passionate about? Turn that passion into power.

Venus and Pluto join forces in the career area of your chart today, which suggests you will be passionately involved in doing something that means a great deal to you personally. Don’t let it get so personal though that others find it hard to join in and help you.

Positive thinking is a must this weekend, especially if you are one of those people who tends to dwell on what went wrong in the past rather than look forward to what might go right in the future. Get out into the world and do something you really enjoy.

You seem to be getting criticism from all directions at the moment but there is no reason to worry about it. Some people just like finding fault (Virgos especially!) and what they say must not be allowed to influence your thinking or what you do in the world.

Whatever feuds or fallings out you may have had with partners and loved ones over the past few weeks you must now put them behind you and move on together. Make the first move. Say sorry and mean it. That’s probably all it will take.

This is an exceptionally busy time for you, so you need to find ways to stay healthy in mind, body and spirit. Set aside a little time this weekend to slow things right down and to remind yourself of the many things you have to be thankful for.

A Venus-Pluto union in the most dynamic and creative area of your chart this weekend means you can charm the birds from the trees, if that’s what turns you on. Talking of being turned on, this is also a potentially amazing time for affairs of the heart!

Family matters and domestic issues should go well for you over the next 48 hours and even if you fell out with someone in your home environment recently it won’t be hard to kiss and make up. You have too much in common to stay angry for long.

Trust your instincts this weekend, even if almost everyone you know is telling you to do the opposite of what your inner voice whispers. Ultimately, only you know what is best for your long-term happiness and security, so only you can make the really important decisions.

Someone you work with or maybe bump into socially occasionally is about to become a bigger part of your life than you thought possible. The friendship you form has the potential to last a lifetime, because both of you are focused on the same goals.

Venus in your sign links with power planet Pluto today, so if you need to get important things done this is the time. No matter how challenging life may get you will handle everything that happens with ease. You’re a serious player, and a winner too.

You may find it hard to trust a certain person but what choice do you have? The planets indicate that only they can help you get from where you are now to where you most want to be, so put your doubts behind you and move forward together.

You won’t much care what happens this weekend because you are so in the zone, physically, mentally and emotionally, that you know you can handle whatever life chooses to throw in your direction. You have what it takes to win and you know it!

One of the things you need to do over the coming year is to make sure you are rewarded at the correct level for what you do for other people. That applies not only to your work but also to more personal relations. It cannot be all give and no take.

You may not much enjoy what you are expected to do today but do it to the best of your abilities anyway. If you make believe it is the most interesting task in the world you may be surprised to discover it’s not so bad after all.

Cosmic activity in the friendship area of your chart encourages you to get involved in a program that brings like-minded people together. What is it that motivates you the most to do good in the world? Seek out those who share the same purpose.

If you want to get ahead this week you will need to cut back on the talk and get down to some serious work. A more conciliatory approach will be necessary too, especially when dealing with people whose aims appear to be at odds with your own.

This is a highly positive time of year for you and if you make the most of it you can’t help but move ahead in leaps and bounds. Travel opportunities will become available early next month, so pack a bag so you can move at a moment’s notice.

A money-making offer may sound too good to be true but the planets indicate it is on the level, so get serious about it and don’t be afraid to get involved. Check the facts and figures first, of course, but don’t let self-doubt stop you from acting.

You may be inclined to give up on a relationship that has been going through some bumpy times but give it a bit longer because things will get better. You may ultimately decide to go your separate ways but at least you will have given it one last chance.

You seem to be under the impression that you need to change your methods. That’s wrong. In fact, your current way of doing things is exactly right for you, so resist the urge to change for the sake of it and make what you already do work even better.

Moderation is essential over the next few days, especially if you are the sort of Scorpio who happily goes to extremes when things are going well for you. The sun in Pisces does wonders for your self-belief, but you need to mix it with plenty of common sense.

People will go out of their way to help you over the next few days, even when you probably don’t deserve it. Never doubt that you are respected by those you work with, and loved by those you live with. And don’t neglect to give respect and love back.

You appear to be worrying about something that is of only minor importance in the greater scheme of things. It may be the case that you fear you are about to let someone down, but the fact is you can and you must put your own interests first.

Cosmic activity in the most materialistic area of your chart will encourage you to focus more time and energy on what you own and earn, and that’s a good thing. The fact is you have been neglecting your financial situation of late, so get it sorted now.

The sun in your sign over the next few weeks will encourage you to be more outgoing, but as mind planet Mercury is moving retrograde, also in your sign, you will need to be careful when dealing with people for the first time. Don’t be too trusting.

Creative and artistic activities will go very well indeed over the coming year, so don’t limit yourself in any way, shape or form. Put a name to your dream and go after it with every fibre of your being. There is no doubt at all that your dream will come true.

Duty calls as the new week begins and being the sort who takes your responsibilities seriously you won’t hesitate to answer. Just make sure that what you do for other people is what they genuinely cannot do for themselves. Your mother didn’t raise you to be a fool.

Almost certainly you will run out of patience with someone you work with today, and that’s a very good thing. You need to let them know that you won’t be taken for a ride, not by them, not by anyone. No more mister nice guy!

Someone will try to win you round to their way of thinking today but it will be clear right from the start that your minds are moving in very different directions. Thank them for their input, then do what you know to be right. Think for yourself.

You like to be of assistance and help people who are struggling, but today you will go to the other extreme and do only what makes you happy, regardless of how it might make other people feel. Try not to be too cold-hearted about it though.

You won’t want much to do with the world as the new week begins, so find a quiet and secluded place where you can be on your own. Usually you enjoy having people around you but today you desire only the company of your own thoughts.

Before you get angry with a colleague for getting something wrong today make sure they really have got it wrong. The planets warn you could easily get the wrong end of the stick over the next 24 hours. Don’t give others an excuse to beat you with it!

You may have to deal with someone today who you don’t much like but you are advised to ignore your feelings and get on with it because there are things they can do for you that you cannot do for yourself. You can at least pretend to be friendly.

There will be times today when you get the impression that certain individuals are being deliberately obstructive – and you’re right, they are. Don’t let them see that you have noticed though. Play along as if nothing has happened. Your opportunity for revenge will come soon enough.

You have a habit of rushing in where angels fear to tread and usually it pays off for you. However, the planets warn that if you jump into the unknown today you may end up landing in something unpleasant – and that’s if you land at all!

No matter what size the task you face and no matter how much the odds may be stacked against you there is not the slightest doubt that you will come through. You are at your best when faced with a challenge that only the toughest and brightest can handle.

If you are not in the mood for work today then don’t force yourself. Others may say you have urgent business to take care of but you know it can wait until another day. Ease yourself into the week – you can build up speed and momentum later on.

No doubt you feel you could take on the world and win, but why go to all that trouble when the things you need, the things that will make you truly happy, are much closer to home? Spend some quality time with the people you love today.

It is essential that you have some kind of plan for the coming year. It does not have to be too detailed, but it does have to provide you with an overall goal or objective so you can be sure that you are always moving in the right direction.

Force yourself to do something exciting today. You may not be in the mood to get out into the world and put yourself about a bit but the planets indicate that if you make the effort you will enjoy yourself immensely. Don’t think about it, just do it.

Some things are changing quite rapidly now and there is nothing you can do to stop it happening. But why would you want to when the changes are likely to benefit you? Ask yourself how you can start making those changes work in your favour. Then act.

If you get dragged into a dispute with someone who is stronger or better connected than you then it is inevitable that you will lose, so keep your temper in check and back off a bit if things get a bit heated. You don’t have to win every time.

You don’t have to apologize for something you said – not if you meant it. You are entitled to speak your mind even if people in positions of authority disagree with you. Diversity of opinion is a must, so speak up and ruffle a few feathers.

The more you worry about your cash-flow problems, the less likely it is you will find a solution, so cheer up and start believing that the right opportunity will come along at just the right time. Before you know it the money will be coming in again.

If you find it hard to look on the bright side of life at the moment then get out into the world and mix with people whose outlook is more positive than your own. With any luck some of their cheery nature will rub off on you.

There is a danger at the moment that you think you have to be first in everything you do. Why is that a danger? Because it encourages you to try too hard. You are at your best when everything feels balanced and easygoing, so why put pressure on yourself?

The winds of change are blowing strongly now and the good news is they are at your back and pushing you in a direction that is right for you in every way. So sit back, relax and enjoy the journey. You’re sure to end up some place good.

You may feel a bit lost and insecure at the moment but that’s okay. It’s times like these that make the good times feel even better, so hunker down some place quiet where you won’t be disturbed and wait for the cosmic outlook to change. It will, very soon.

The message of the stars today is that you should keep things simple, both in your private life and at work. Be careful while on the move as travel plans could easily go wrong. If you take a wrong turn there is no telling where you might end up.

Like it or not you will have to let go of something you don’t want to let go of today. It may be a painful process but it won’t be long before you realize that you never really needed it and that it was blocking off other possibilities.

The sun in your sign forms a tense aspect to Pluto, planet of power, today. What that suggests is that you need to tread carefully when dealing with authority figures. What you say and do may be in jest but it’s unlikely they will see it that way.

Your task for the coming year is to learn to see the world through different eyes. You don’t have to change your own outlook, but you do have to develop the ability to see things from other people’s point of view. If you can do that you will thrive.

You may not be at your best now but there is plenty you can do to make life more enjoyable. To start with try to forget about a recent falling out with a friend. It’s not important, so get past it and move on, together or on your own.

You seem to be in one of your happy-go-lucky moods at the moment and that’s great, but bear in mind that not everyone will share your positive outlook on life. One particular individual – a friend or a work colleague – could do with some upbeat advice.

Anyone who pokes their nose in your affairs today is going to seriously regret it. You don’t need advice and you certainly don’t need people you feel superior to telling you what should be done. Tell them – as nicely as you can – to get lost.

It may not be easy to work out if someone is being serious or if they are joking but, to be safe, take what you are told with a large pinch of salt and make sure they know you are not going to act on what they are telling you.

Focus on the one thing you do best today. Leo is a larger-than-life sign and if you are typical of your kind you want nothing more than to do things that bring you recognition and rewards. Get creative today – it could pay off in a very big way.

You need to remind yourself that in the greater scheme of things your everyday problems don’t mean a great deal. Take a look at the bigger picture today. Better still, take a look at the world and how the other half lives. You’re one of the lucky ones.

Chances are you will find yourself at serious odds with someone you live or work with today and there is not much you can do about it. The simple fact is you are such different characters that it would be best if you interacted as little as possible.

Stay alert over the next 24 hours because unexpected events are sure to disrupt your plans. On the plus side, one of those events will unsettle the status quo to such an extent that it creates no end of opportunities for you personally. Take advantage of them.

Dealing with other people’s problems will take up a large slice of your time and energy today but you must not think of it as a chore. The fact that you are in a position to help people means the universe is working through you to do good things.

By all means get tough with someone who is not pulling their weight but don’t go too far and make an enemy of them. The planets warn if you rant and rave it will, in the long-term, have the opposite effect to what you desire. Calm down Capricorn!

What feels right to you may not feel right to others and if you keep that fact in mind today you are less likely to fall out with people who should be your friends. Let them know that, whatever your differences, you will always support them in their choices.

The planets indicate that you are going places. What does that actually mean? Well, it could mean you will be on the move in the physical sense but more likely it means you will be moving up in the world in the estimation of important people

A sun-Mars link on your birthday means you will be in sparkling form over the coming year. Your confidence is such that you will attempt things that lesser mortals find too challenging. For you though the challenge is what it’s all about!

If you make an effort to be enthusiastic about something you would rather not be doing today you may in fact thoroughly enjoy it. You will also impress the people you work with and for by your dedication to duty. Always keep your standards high.

Take a look back over the past few months and ask yourself how many of the things you feared would happen did in fact occur. Hardly any of them, right? With that knowledge in mind stop worrying about tomorrow – it will be great.

If someone tries to belittle your efforts it can only be because they are jealous of your ability to get things done. In other words they resent you being so good at your job. Make it your aim today to add to that resentment.

If there is something you have wanted to do for ages but for one reason or another never quite got around to, do it now. While the sun is moving through the most adventurous area of your chart you can and you must be more active.

Money matters should be going well for you now – you are certainly less inclined to worry about your cash-flow situation. But don’t go from one extreme to the other and start spending money like you have a never-ending supply of the stuff.

Your luck is on the turn and in a matter of days you will be enjoying a much more rewarding phase. The way you choose to think and feel will have a lot to do with it too. Be positive at all times and in all situations.

The next few days will be fortunate for you and what you gain you will deserve. Not everyone will agree that is so but what other people think is of no concern. If the winds of fate blow good things your way it is your duty to enjoy them.

You may be tempted to bet against the odds today and, who knows, you might win big. But the planets warn it’s more likely you will lose and regret having taken such an unnecessary gamble. Keep your money in your pocket for now.

Don’t feel bad about it if you gain from someone else’s loss today. Everyone has their good days and their bad days and if you are one of the lucky ones who is doing okay at the moment then your only obligation is to enjoy it.

You seem to believe that others are out to get you, that people you interact with are plotting to make money at your expense – but it isn’t true. Saturn’s influence is having a negative effect on your thinking at the moment. Choose to ignore it.

Good fortune is heading rapidly in your direction and although you may find that hard to believe in your present situation it is undoubtedly true, so try to stay positive and be on the lookout for the telltale signs that announce better days.

No matter what tales of woe you hear from other people today you are advised to take them all with a large pinch of salt, because almost certainly they are making things sound worse than they really are so they can get your sympathy.

You need to change the way you look at the world and you need to do it in a positive way. Make a point of believing that everything that happens is part of a greater cosmic plan – which means that even so-called negative events ultimately have positive outcomes.

Get to know what those around you are thinking today. How do you do that? You ask them. The more you are aware of what others expect from you the more likely it is you will be able to deliver, and the happier your relationships will be.

Anyone who tries to tell you that you should be working harder must be treated with the contempt they deserve. No one puts in more effort than you, and if partners and colleagues really can’t see that then they need their eyes fixed.

You should be able to express yourself easily today, but as your ruling planet Mercury is moving retrograde you must make sure that the facts and figures you use are genuine. Resist the urge to make things up, because you WILL be found out.

You may be unhappy with the attitude of some of the people you have been dealing with but don’t let it show. Act as if you are on top of each and every situation and, hopefully, they will be inspired by your positive approach and be positive too.

You don’t lack for ideas at the moment and with Uranus, planet of genius, strong in your chart this weekend you will no doubt come up with something positively outrageous. Don’t make it so outrageous though that others can’t understand it.

What you learn over the next 48 hours will help you make sense of something that has been confusing you for weeks, if not months. Once you are aware of what’s going on you will realize that your worries were entirely misplaced. It’s all good Virgo.

Mercury, planet of communication, will help you to think clearly this weekend, and also to speak up when you have something important to say. But don’t just natter away for the sake of it. Too much talk could have unexpected and negative consequences.

You need to be honest and accept that you have been worrying yourself silly for no good reason, even while denying that anything is wrong. Use your razor-sharp mind to look beyond surface appearances and find out what has really been going on.

Both at home and at work you are finding it hard to trust people, but if you stop and think about it you will realize there is no reason why you should be so suspicious. Most people are just like you, and they certainly don’t want to hurt you.

You know what you want and you have every intention of getting it, but to be sure of success you must be confident that the facts on which you base your aims and actions can be trusted 100 per cent. If not, give it more thought before you proceed.

The goal you are working your way toward may seem a long way off but don’t give up on it. Your birthday chart promises that by this time next year it will be within reach, so keep at it and keep believing that each and every day matters.

It might by a smart idea to keep a lower than usual profile today. The moon’s eclipse of Saturn suggests that someone in a position of power has got it in for you, so stay out of their way as much as you possibly can.

If you make a move without asking a loved one’s advice first you may never hear the last of it – especially if it doesn’t go as well as you had hoped. Be smart and consult your nearest and dearest before you do anything questionable.

Friends may be encouraging you to join them in some sort of social event but only do so if you feel up to it. The planets warn that you need plenty of rest and relaxation now, and you’re unlikely to get it if you are on the move.

Stay calm and stay in control. That may not be an easy thing to do if someone in a position of authority gives you a hard time today but according to the planets they want you to get annoyed. Don’t give them the satisfaction of falling for it.

Someone may tell you today that you have no right to occupy a certain position but as far as you are concerned you are the one in command and that’s all that matters. Challenges to your authority must be met head on and defeated.

Try not to take anything you see and hear at face value today. Also, the more certain people try to steer you in a direction that does not feel right to you the more you must resist. Only you can decide where the truth is to be found.

You need help – that much is clear – but seem unable or unwilling to accept it, even from those who have helped you in the past. There may be a very good reason why you are suspicious but don’t let it get out of hand.

Follow your instincts today, even if it means doing the opposite of what everyone else seems to be doing. You should know by now that your own mind is a far better guide to what you should be doing than what other people tell you.

Stick with what you know and trust and don’t be tempted to do things in ways that don’t come easily to you. If, however, you really must try something new make sure you get advice from those who have been there and done it before you.

You may find it difficult getting through to someone you live or work with today but that’s okay. In fact, you should take the hint and stop trying altogether. Chances are they simply don’t want to hear what you have to say. It’s their choice!

If your sixth sense tells you that someone is not being honest with you today then be on your guard. Having said which, the planets indicate this may be that one time in a hundred when your instincts are not up to scratch.

Keep telling yourself that as one door closes so another door opens. You may be disappointed that something you had high hopes for is coming to an end but there will be other opportunities. Remember, life is a journey, not a destination.

Instead of starting something new this year try dusting off a project you began, and then abandoned, way back and see if you can make it work this time. It may surprise you to find, with the extra experience you now have, how easily it comes to you.

If you limit yourself to one way of doing a job this weekend you will quickly get bored, so keep yourself interested by varying your routine and trying new methods. They say a change is as good as a rest, so why not put it to the test?

You won’t find it hard to knuckle down and get things done over the next 48 hours, but once you have got them done you must forget about work and do something more enjoyable, something that involves people who never fail to make you laugh.

If you spend all your time working this weekend you may give loved ones and people who value your company the impression that you don’t want to see them. You must find time to have fun on a one-to-one and social level.

No one expects you to be perfect, so why expect it of yourself? The lesson of the stars this weekend is that you need to let go of the unreasonable expectations you have for yourself. Be who you are, not who you think you should be.

If you want someone to do you a favour then you will need to flatter them shamelessly. Fortunately, that is something you are good at, so lay it on thick and get whatever it is you desire in return. It’s a perfectly fair exchange.

You may have to shut yourself away and be unsociable for a while this weekend but you really do need to concentrate and finish what you have started. There will be time for celebrations later – now you must knuckle down and get it done.

Try not to get caught up in the mechanics of making money. Yes, of course, those bits of green paper with numbers on them can be very handy to have but there are many more important things in life. The people you love for a start.

It may be the case that a friend or work colleague is holding out on you but is it important? There is precious little they can do or say to harm you – and that’s not their intention anyway – so don’t make a big issue of it.

Someone with a lot more experience than you will offer to show you how to do something this weekend and if you are smart you will watch, listen and learn. It won’t be long before you are passing this knowledge on to other people.

It’s no big deal if you fall behind in your schedule over the next 48 hours, so don’t strive too hard to stay on top of what you should be doing. Most likely you have set yourself targets that are unnecessarily tough – it’s something you do too often.

You may want to let your heart to rule your head but you know if you do you will lose out financially. Where business and money matters are concerned personal feelings must not be allowed to come into it. It’s all about the bottom line.

Don’t make any hard or fast plans for the weekend because almost certainly you will have to change them at some stage. If a friend or family member suggests you go off in a radically new direction you should agree with them. It’s time for a new adventure.

A Venus-Saturn link on your birthday means you must take care when dealing with people in positions of authority. Do what you can to stay on their good side, but don’t be afraid to speak up if you think they are taking liberties. They will respect that.

Don’t sit there wondering where the good times are going to come from – get out into the world and make things happen. Life will be as enjoyable as you choose to make it over the next few weeks, so do whatever it takes to banish the blues.

You could get a bit emotional over the next 24 hours, and that’s probably no bad thing as you have a tendency to keep your feelings trapped inside. Make friends with people who are not afraid to express themselves in ways you might find embarrassing.

If someone needs a shoulder to cry on you will be there for them with no questions asked. You know what it’s like to face life on your own, so you will go out of your way to be a friend. It’s one of the things you are good at.

You seem to be in an amazingly good mood at the moment, and long may it continue. The sun in your fellow water sign of Pisces will encourage you to be more adventurous, so much so that some people might start wondering what kind of medication you are on!

Life has been hectic of late and there may be times over the next few days when you want to call a halt so you can catch your breath. But don’t slow down, not yet. Now you have some momentum going you must find creative ways to use it.

You must let family members and other relatives know how much they mean to you. Don’t just assume that because everything seems to be ticking along nicely that you don’t need to remind them occasionally of your love and respect. Do it right now.

You expect so much of yourself but sometimes your efforts fall short, and that appears to be the situation you are in at the moment. It might pay you to lower your sights a little over the next few days. It’s time to get real about your aims.

It would appear that someone you have always been loyal to has let you down in some way and no doubt you feel betrayed. The important thing is that you don’t let your negative feelings about the situation grow worse. Confront them about it and then move on.

You need to get the attention of people who can assist you in reaching your goals. Both in your personal life and at work it should be obvious that you can’t do it all on your own, so speak up immediately. You can never have too many allies.

Start looking ahead and planning some fun things for later in the year. You can, of course, do fun things now but it may be the case that personal responsibilities and lack of cash are holding you back. Your imagination though has no such restrictions.

Cosmic activity in your next-door-neighbour sign of Capricorn is making it hard for you to see what’s going on from an unbiased position. Before deciding who is right and who is wrong, get some input from family and friends. They may see things better than you.

By all means let partners and loved ones know how you feel today, but don’t expect too much honesty in return. Not everyone is as open as you are about their emotions, so make allowances and don’t get upset if they sometimes fail to respond.

If you break one rule over the coming 12 months you will break a dozen or more. Your birthday chart suggests you are in the mood to push the boundaries of what other people say is permitted. Just make sure that what you do is always legal.

You may not be the kind to worry but it seems you are beginning to panic about something of a personal nature, which is making it hard for you to tell fact from fiction. Is there any real reason to be scared? No, it’s all in your mind.

Try not to be too aggressive when dealing with people on a one-to-one level today. Some of the things they do may annoy you but the planets suggest they will annoy you less if you lighten up a bit yourself. There is no need to get angry.

Whatever has been holding you back will loosen its grip today and you will start to make progress again. The only danger is that your previous failures may colour your judgement and make you less inclined to take risks. Be ambitious and be adventurous too.

The sun in Pisces at this time of year encourages you to expand your horizons and to look further afield for the answers you seek. If the meaning of life is something you wonder about this would be a good time to start looking for deeper answers.

You need to adapt to changing circumstances, not fight against them. Not even a Leo can turn back the tide of progress, so go with the flow and be in absolutely no doubt that where you end up will be better than where you are now.

A friend or family member will save you from yourself today. The only danger is that you may turn down their offer of assistance because you think it makes you look weak. Maybe it does but no one expects you to be strong all the time.

You need to be more aware of the way other people see you over the next two or three days. If they get the impression that you are just going through the motions on something you are working on together you could miss out on some big rewards.

Your confidence is sky high at the moment and that’s good, but if you are planning to take a chance on something you must do so today, because come this time tomorrow the cosmic picture will have begun to change. Act quickly.

The important thing today is that you stay calm and don’t let anyone upset you. Some people may be difficult to deal with but you won’t solve anything by coming down to their level. Spend your time and energy on more productive pursuits.

It’s not true that you are overly cautious, but it is true that you prefer to check and double check before making a move, and that’s good. Bear that in mind today if someone tries to push you to act faster. Move at your own pace.

If you need to make a decision about money then do so today while you are still thinking straight. When mind planet Mercury turns retrograde tomorrow the odds will be against you again, so gamble now or don’t gamble at all.

It is important that you don’t take too much for granted today because the planets warn there are things going on behind the scenes that could trip you up if you are careless. It’s okay to have fun but you must be sensible, too.

Try not to be quite so serious about what you do in your life. So many things that look important now may turn out later to be of no real significance at all. Also, recognize that it’s relationships that matter, not what you achieve in the material world.

You desperately need to rest and recharge your physical, mental and emotional batteries. Also, as Mercury, planet of the mind, starts its retrograde phase today, you are advised not to begin anything new. What a great excuse for doing nothing!

Question everything you are told today, even if those doing the telling are people you trust. According to the planets it is more than likely that they have got the wrong end of the stick. Check everything you hear – then check again to be sure.

You must be realistic about your ambitions. The planets indicate that you will taste success, but you will taste it sooner and the taste will be sweeter if you keep your feet on the ground. There is no point aiming for things you cannot reach.

The only thing that can hold you back today is if you let negative thoughts get the upper hand. Stop worrying about what might go wrong in your life and start thinking about all the wonderful things that could still go right – and believe that they will.

You seem to believe that people you live or work with have been talking behind your back, and maybe they have. However, as mind planet Mercury begins its retrograde phase today there is a very good chance that you are imagining things.

Don’t think too much of it if you find it hard to get your point across to others today. With your ruling planet Mercury turning retrograde in your opposite sign you just have to accept that communications will be more difficult than usual.

Work only at the pace you feel comfortable with, because if you push yourself too hard you could run out of steam and end up a long way short of where you hoped you would be. Everyone has limits – yes, even a Libra – so be sensible about your ambitions.

You don’t need to make excuses for your failures. And you don’t need to try again at things you got wrong in the past. Forget about everything you did or did not do before today and focus only on the future – it’s brighter than you think.

Someone you have dealings with will be rather irritable today, so watch what you say or you could find yourself arguing over the most trivial of things. If possible, put some distance between you – you don’t want to risk their bad mood rubbing off on you!

Make sure you know all the facts before offering an opinion on an issue of the day that tends to polarize people. It might even be best to pretend that you have no strong preferences one way or the other, at least for the next three or four days.

You need to slow your life down a bit today, because if you rush things you could make the kind of mistake that is hard to put right. Hold back for a while and let others take the lead – so you can learn from their mistakes.

Make sure you have a clear idea of what it is you are trying to achieve, because if your mind is confused you could find yourself going round in circles. Don’t rush yourself though – it may take several weeks before you know for sure what you should be doing.

You have come a long way over the past year or so and with a new moon on your birthday you will go even further over the coming 12 months. There is absolutely nothing you cannot do with your life – but it will pay you to be selective.

What’s done is done and cannot be undone, so stop the regrets and the feeling sorry for yourself and get on with your life. Today’s new moon means you must come to terms with the past – then put it behind you once and for all.

You will say or do something controversial today and it is sure to annoy some people who think you have no right to speak or act that way. You have every right. In fact it’s your duty. The world needs people who are not afraid to be different.

By all means stand up for what you believe, but don’t go to extremes and antagonize people just to prove how tough you can be. Give respect where respect is due and you’ll get plenty of respect in return. That’s the way the world works.

Anyone who thinks you lack a sense of adventure won’t think it much longer. What you do today may mark you out as a bit of a maverick but better that than being someone who always blindly follows the rules. You’ll find you are appreciated more, too.

You need to get to grips with your financial situation. To start with that means getting tough with yourself, in the sense that you have been much too wasteful of late. Then get tough with those who have been encouraging you. You no longer need them.

You will draw closer to someone today and the benefits will be worth all that has happened over the past few weeks. You have endured a lot together and now you will enjoy life together. Partnerships of all kinds will go well for you now.

If you are having troubling getting motivated on the work front take it as a sign that maybe you should be working on something else. If you can’t find the energy to get things done, just take it easy for a bit. Why exhaust yourself when you don’t have to?

Because today’s new moon falls in the most dynamic area of your chart you should have the courage and confidence to start something special. Today is the first day of the rest of your life, so make it a good day – and a good life.

It does not matter how many mistakes you have made or how many times you have failed, if you start something new today it is sure to succeed. You will also be amazed how easily problems become non-problems over the next few days.

Get out into the world and meet new people and visit new places. Don’t worry about work and money and family issues – they will take care of themselves in the fullness of time – your one and only aim now must be to have fun. You can do that!

You need to stop comparing yourself to other people. Life is not a contest where the winner takes it all, and those who think that way are simply wrong. Set your own targets, based on your own desires, rather than what others think your desires should be.

The world is full of possibilities and each and every one of them is up for grabs now. A new moon in your sign means you have first choice of all the good things that are available. You can’t have it all, but you can have the best!

A sun-Neptune union on your birthday suggests that feelings of a religious or spiritual nature will come to the fore over the next 12 months. And if you are an avowed atheist? Let your interest in humanitarian matters guide you. You will make a difference.

If you find your way blocked today just use your imagination and find another way around. There is no set path for the journey you are on:Aall roads lead in generally the right direction – it is just a matter of making constant adjustments.

You seem to believe that you are not getting the respect you deserve. It isn’t true, most people think highly of you, but that won’t stop you doing something today that is designed to draw attention to yourself. Make sure it’s for the right reasons.

Don’t let anyone take decisions for you today because the planets warn it could lead to trouble of one kind or another. Someone in a position of power and authority is watching you closely, so do whatever it takes to impress them.

It will pay you to be a bit more friendly today, especially if you have been tough on someone who let you down in some way. There is no point harboring a grudge, especially as you have to work together, so get over it and move on.

Today’s sun-Neptune link could make you a bit too easygoing about your money situation. You may not care how much you spend on this and that now but you will care later on when the bills come due and you struggle to pay them.

It is of the utmost importance that you make an effort to understand people. Partnerships in general are under excellent stars but there will be times when you struggle to communicate. Remember, it’s not just about words, it’s about body language too.

You are in one of those moods when you will happily do just about anything for just about anyone. Friends and even strangers will appreciate your kindness but watch out because the planets warn one particular individual may try to take advantage of you.

Don’t let anyone limit your actions today. Whatever your aims and ambitions in life may be they are perfectly legitimate, even if certain people say they are not. Anyone who tries to hold you back should be kept at arm’s length until they see sense.

You have never been the sort to adopt a low profile and you are not about to start now. Put yourself about today and make sure the world knows who you are and what you can do. Like-minded people will seek you out for good times together.

This could be and should be a lucky time for you, especially if you are on the move. The more you get out into the world the more likely it is you will see or hear something that can be turned to your financial or emotional advantage.

You are in such a generous mood at the moment that you need to be careful. Neptune’s influence in the financial area of your chart means you will be thinking about money matters with your heart rather than your head – and that could cost you.

Try not to judge people whose values may be very different to your own. Everyone has their own destiny to follow and to expect others to be like you is just as unreasonable as if they expected you to be like them. It takes all sorts.

The more people try to tell you that your ambitions are unrealistic the more certain you can be that they are well within reach. The only reason they have for being so negative is they fear that your success will show them up for the losers they are.

You will need to show some common sense where money matters are concerned today. If you spend cash as if it is going out of fashion now you may find yourself seriously short of funds later when you find something genuinely worth spending it on.

You will find it easy enough to get people to see things your way and do things your way. Whether your way is also the best way remains to be seen, but remember – whatever happens next you are the one who will be held responsible.

Anyone who thinks they can sweet talk you into doing something you don’t want to do obviously has no idea who they are dealing with. Play them along if you must but don’t create a situation where you have to let them down hard. They won’t like it.

This is a good day for dealing with influential people, the kind of people who you are going to want on your side when the going gets tough. Not that it will get tough today though. Most things will come easy to you over the next 24 hours.

You may be having second thoughts about something you started a short time ago but your fears are unfounded. It may now seem a bit of a risk but the planets indicate that it’s a risk worth taking. Keep at it Leo and you won’t regret it.

Cosmic activity in your opposite sign means you want to get along with people and you want to make a good impression. And you will. Just make sure that in your desire to keep things harmonious you don’t give too much away. Partnerships must be 50-50.

Take absolutely no notice of something weird or wonderful that a colleague tells you today, because they simply don’t know what they are talking about. Most likely they don’t even believe it themselves – they just enjoy a bit of meaningless gossip.

You may not agree with someone’s opinions but you have to agree they have every right to express those opinions. If you find that what they say rubs you the wrong way just remove yourself from their presence. You are under no obligation to stick around.

Everyone has limits – yes, even a Sagittarius – and it will be pretty obvious when you are approaching those limits today. If you are smart you will rein yourself in and live to fight another day. If you are not so smart . . . who knows what might happen!

You must not allow your personal feelings to influence any business or work-related decisions you need to make today. Whatever the rights and wrongs of a particular situation the only thing that matters now is how you can benefit materially.

The planets warn there is someone out there who is jealous of your popularity and is hoping to get a chance to make you look bad. That can only happen if you lower your guard. If someone starts to flatter you shamelessly today most likely it’s a trick.

Someone in a position of authority is not convinced that you have what it takes to reach the targets you have set for yourself. What can you do to prove them wrong? You can start by not worrying about it. Stay loose and just be yourself.

A sun-Saturn link on your birthday is good for friendships and also for partnerships that bring like-minded people together. If you can get together a group of people who share the same outlook on life you might even find ways to change the world.

The best way to get what you want this weekend is to pull a few strings from behind the scenes. If you approach tense situations head-on you will more than likely make matters worse, so make it look as if you don’t really care what happens.

Don’t let it worry you if you get cross with someone you usually get along with quite well today. Even the best of friends fall out now and again and on this occasion it will help clear the air. You’ll be buddies again tomorrow.

If you get the chance to enter a contest or a competition of some kind this weekend you must seize it with both hands. Today’s sun-Saturn link will give you the kind of drive and determination you sometimes lack. In short, you can’t lose.

Don't worry too much if you are a bit short of cash at the moment because the things you need will come to you anyway. Cancer is one of the more resourceful signs of the zodiac and you’ll find ways to satisfy your needs one way or another.

If someone says something to you today that seems designed to make you angry your best course of action by far is to ignore it. Almost certainly they are trying to goad you into the kind of reaction that makes them look good by making you look bad.

Someone you have dealings with on a daily basis is getting a bit too assertive for your tastes and at some stage you will need to remind them that this is supposed to be a partnership of equals. Let them know you are not afraid to walk away.

You will have to do something this weekend that you really don’t want to do, but being the kind of person who does not like letting other people down you will hold your nose and do it anyway. You might be surprised to find you actually enjoy it.

People you deal with on a one-to-one basis will give you whatever it is you desire today, because they know you won’t take no for an answer. Try not to be too imperious though. Co-operation is by far a better long-term tactic than coercion.

You may find it hard keeping certain feelings to yourself today, even though you know you should. If you do open up and criticize someone try not to be too negative about it. They will respond better to encouragement than they will to criticism.

Travel and social activities are under very good stars at the moment, so get out into the world and have some fun. Don’t worry that you might stray in the wrong direction, because even if you do the cosmic powers that be will guide you back safely.

The message of the stars now is that you should not push yourself too hard, not at home, not at work and not even in your social life. Next week is going to be rather busy, so save your energy over the next 48 hours. Breathe deep and relax.

You must refuse to accept second best this weekend. In every situation you find yourself in you must aim to be at the front where people can see you. The time for hanging back and hiding is over – get out there and put on a show!

Listen carefully to what your inner voice is trying to tell you and, once the message has got through, follow it to its logical conclusion. Intuition and intellect are not separate things and if you can get them working together this year no goal will be beyond you.

Don’t blame yourself if you have failed to reach some of the targets you have set yourself in recent weeks. The fact that Mercury has been moving retrograde of late has made it much harder to make plans. As from today though your mind will be razor sharp.

A decision needs to be made about your career, and now that mind planet Mercury is about to move in your favuor again you won’t let minor issues or petty people hold you back from doing what you know is right. As from today, it’s full speed ahead.

All sorts of weird and wonderful ideas have been going through your head of late and, of course, very few of them will come to much. However, one particular idea seems to have taken root and keeps nagging at you to do something with it. So get doing!

Something you thought was of vital importance a week or two back now does not interest you in the slightest, and that’s good. According to the planets you allowed other people to influence your thinking instead of listening first and foremost to your inner voice.

Make sure everyone knows how you feel. Don’t just assume they can see you are hurting, spell it out for them in words of three syllables or less. Because you look so confident others may think you have got everything under control, but that’s far from the truth.

Avoid trivial issues and trivial people over the next 24 hours. You have some major matters to deal with and the very last thing you need is to be distracted, so build a kind of exclusion zone around you where you control who and what comes in.

Your confidence may have taken one or two knocks in recent weeks but now that mind planet Mercury is ending its retrograde phase you will soon realize that what has been getting you down is of no consequence at all. Life is looking good again!

Anyone who thinks they can lead you astray is going to end up looking rather foolish. Even on the worst of days Scorpio is a sign that is difficult to fool, and today you are very much on the ball, which you will bounce right back in their face!

The more others try to predict what you will say or do next the more you will enjoy surprising them. It is a part of your nature to be original, and sometimes outrageous, and that part will come to the fore in a big way over the next few days.

Are the fun times coming to an end? Not if you have anything to say about it. The main trick in getting the most out of life is to do what you enjoy most, so put a smile on your face and create things that make other people smile as well.

You may have found it hard to express yourself of late, but now that communications planet Mercury is moving in your favor again the words will flow from you as if a dam has burst. Make sure they are good words. Build people up, don’t knock them down.

You may not have much time to yourself at the moment but you can, if you try, find time to think about some of life’s bigger questions. Find a quiet place where you won’t be disturbed and let your thoughts expand out into the universe.

Even if you are the kind of Pisces who never strays far from home the coming 12 months will see you heading off in all sorts of directions, and loving every minute of it. What you see and hear on your travels will transform your existence.

Someone you can usually rely on will say or do something today that makes you realize you may have been wrong to place your trust in them. But don’t put all the blame on them – it’s just as much your fault for overlooking their flaws.

You may think that your current idea is the best thing since, well, since your last big idea, but is it really that good or are you deceiving yourself? The planets indicate it may be the latter, so don’t commit time and money to it just yet.

You may feel confident and you may feel courageous but that is not a good enough reason to take on someone in a position of power. If you feel the need to prove yourself wait a week or so until the sun moves in your favour again.

Visualize where you would like to be a few months from now then start doing the small, everyday things that will move you closer to that goal. It’s all very well having a far-reaching plan but it’s what you do on a daily basis that makes it happen.

Something you have laboured long and hard to resolve, with no success, will sort itself out over the next two or three days. It may annoy you that you were unable to crack it yourself but don’t get too upset – even a Leo has some limitations.

Someone you have clashed with in the past will be unusually friendly toward you today and, of course, it will make you suspicious. It could well be that they are up to no good but can you be sure? Be nice in return but don’t let down your guard.

You are bursting with energy and will find constructive ways to release it. But while you may be in the mood to give 100 per cent don’t expect everyone around you to be on the same level. Very few will be able to keep up with you today.

Be careful what you say over the next 24 hours because if you hurt a friend’s or work colleague’s feelings it could rebound on you. Remember, a remark that sounds funny to you could sound insulting to someone else, so think before you speak.

Don't worry that you have fallen behind in your schedule, because with Mars in the work area of your chart you will catch up easily enough when you feel the moment is right. Today though, focus on relationships. Love, not work, makes the world go around.

Don’t waste your time arguing with people whose opinions you find ridiculous, just let them get on with their lives while you get on with your own. Nothing they say will ever change what you believe, so pretend they, and their opinions, do not exist.

If you have faith in your abilities then there is precious little you cannot accomplish. Yes, of course, you have doubts and fears like everyone else, but if you make an effort to shut them out of your mind today they won’t do you much damage.

Pisces is a water sign and emotional by nature, which has its good side but also its bad, and the planets warn you must not allow yourself to get emotional about issues you cannot change or people you cannot control. Look on the bright side every day.

There will be times over the year ahead when you wish those around you were a little more open in the way they think and communicate, but you have to accept that not everyone can be like you. Do wonderful things – so they can learn from your example.

Not everyone will approve of what you do over the next few days, but why should that worry you? Don’t make things difficult for yourself by trying to tailor your actions to suit other people – that will just encourage them to oppose you even more.

Travel arrangements are likely to go awry over the next 24 hours, so give yourself plenty of time to reach your destination. If possible, keep your journeys short. If that isn’t possible, make sure you have your route sorted out well in advance.

A financial loss of some sort may seem a big deal to you now but it won’t be long before you realize it is really quite trivial and not worth getting worked up about. The one thing you must not do is fall out with a friend over money.

Someone who thinks the world of you will make you happy today, simply by telling you what a special person you are to them. Make sure they know how much you appreciate them as well. When was the last time you let your feelings show?

Take note of the little things that happen today because it’s likely the universe is trying to tell you something and the messages it sends may not be obvious. You need to be subtle, not just in the way you think but in the way you act as well.

Don’t leave partners and colleagues guessing what it is you expect of them. This is one of those days when you need to spell things out for them in words of three syllables or less. Neither you nor they can afford any major misunderstandings.

Someone is getting on your nerves with their constant complaining and at some point today you must let them know, forcefully, that you’ve had enough. You can be a bit sharp-tongued when the mod takes you, and it will most likely take you today.

Okay, so you have almost zero enthusiasm for what you are expected to do, but you know you have to do it anyway, so make a good job of it. Try pretending that it is the most amazing thing you have ever done – it will make it much easier.

You are in no mood to waste time on fools and anyone who tries to get you interested in trivial matters must be told in no uncertain terms to get lost. Do you really need to be that brutal? Sadly, on this occasion, it’s the only way.

If someone you respect says something that hurts you today don’t automatically assume they have turned against you. It may just be that they don’t realize how sensitive you are about certain issues. Maybe, just maybe, it’s you who needs to toughen up a bit.

Do not – repeat, not – even think about cutting corners or taking the easy way out over the next 24 hours. If you have been entrusted with a task of some kind it is because others know you will give it 100 per cent. Don’t disappoint them.

Some people will say that you are dreaming your life away, and they may even be right, but don’t stop. You are at your best when you give your imagination its head, so by all means let your mind go where it pleases – and something very pleasing will occur.

A sun-Pluto link on your birthday urges you to do something with your ideas and ideals. What is the one thing that inspires you more than anything else? What is the one thing you dream most of doing for the rest of your days? So do it – now!

You will get an opportunity to improve either your career or your financial position today – if you are especially lucky it may even be both. It seems the powers that be have recognized your worth and are about to reward you for it. About time too!

If you let your imagination lead you in directions that don’t feel right for you this could be a difficult day. Stick with what you know and aim to do what you have done many times before, only better than ever. You don’t need to start something new.

It’s quite likely that you will swing between extremes in the way you look at the world today. Nothing bad will come of it so long as you keep your thoughts to yourself. The more radical your ideas the more you need to keep them to yourself!

You will want to help a friend or family member today but make sure they actually welcome your assistance before you go changing stuff for them. It’s quite possible that they are happy to wallow in their own gloom, at least for the time being.

What looks like a failure to you may seem like a success to someone else, so don’t be too eager to tell them where and why they are doing it wrong. Not everyone has the same sort of standards as you, so there is no point being too judgmental.

The whole world could be against you now and you would not care in the slightest. With the sun and Pluto on excellent terms you possess the mental power to see through the surface of things to the deeper reality – and the deeper reality says everything is wonderful!

You will get more than one opportunity to improve your work situation over the next few days and all you need to do is get it right once and your worries will soon be over. Show willing and show the world you’ve got what it takes.

Pluto, your ruler, is linked to the sun today, making it easy for you to turn ideas into realities, both in your personal affairs and in your work. Give yourself a break occasionally though – a walk in the fresh air will do wonders for your spirit.

This is potentially a very good day for money matters as wealth planet Pluto reveals the kind of opportunities that stay hidden from most people. But you’re not most people, you’re special, so get on and make something of what the universe shows you.

Sometimes in life you have to do things that other people don’t want you to do. Sometimes in life you have to act on what your inner voice tells you. Today’s sun-Pluto link will give you the courage to be radical, even ruthless, in pursuit of your ambitions.

You seem to be in two minds which direction to move in at the moment. In which case your best course of action by far is to stay right where you are. You don’t have to be on the go every minute of every day. Activity is overrated.

By all means get together with people who share your dreams and ambitions but don’t try to impose your will on them. You have so much in common that there should be no need for one to lead and the rest to follow. You’re all leaders – and winners.

You have a choice this year: Either you throw caution to the wind and, more likely than not, end up disappointed that your efforts fall short; or you take it a step at a time and build up slowly towards your ultimate aim. Be sensible and do it right.

If you find yourself in a heated discussion with a friend or work colleague over something that is really quite trivial then take a step back and resolve to just let it go. Why get yourself worked up about something that isn’t worth the effort?

By all means start planning your next big move but don’t commit yourself fully just yet. Today’s sun-Jupiter link warns you may be setting targets for yourself that are way too high, which will inevitably lead to disappointment. Know your limits and stay within them.

If you find yourself arguing with someone over a political or social issue today don’t back down but don’t take it too far and risk falling out with them completely. Find a way to change the subject so you can start moving away from what divides you.

The news you receive today will be neither good nor bad in itself, but how you choose to interpret it will define it as one of those things in your own mind. In which case you should strive to look on the positive side. Why make yourself unhappy?

This is a good day to get together with loved ones and talk through issues that concern you all. Any problems you’ve had in the past can quite easily be resolved now, just so long as you accept there is no “right” way or “wrong” way to do things.

Your workload has got a bit too much of late and you need to get a grip and get back on top of it. That means you will need to tell certain people that you can no longer do some things for them. Say it and mean it.

You will need to take some important decisions today and the most important one of all is whether to devote yourself to work or play. You know there is a lot to do and you don’t want to fall any further behind – so get on with it!

Whatever else you choose to do over the next 24 hours you must – repeat, must – keep your cash in your pocket. If you start spending money, even on small things, you may find it hard to stop. There’s nothing you need that you have not already got.

Even if you are one of those rare Sagittarians who prefer to keep their opinions to themselves you won’t hesitate to speak up today – and you must speak loud too to make sure everyone hears what you have to say. It’s too important to keep to yourself.

Cosmic activity in the communications area of your chart gives you the confidence to put across your point of view, but make sure you can back up your claims with facts. If you pluck opinions out of the air someone who knows their stuff could make you look silly.

Try not to focus too much on details today. It’s the bigger picture that matters and someone with your breadth of vision should be looking for ways to make life more satisfying, not just for yourself, but for those who rely on you too.

The sun in your sign does wonders for your confidence but with Jupiter getting in on the act as well you must be careful you don’t go too far and act in ways that invite a backlash from the universe – not to mention the people you work with!

The one and only thing you need to remember over the coming year is that your mind creates your world – always. If you keep that thought front and centre, and act accordingly, you will create the kind of life so many dream of, yet so few attain.

Make forgive and forget your motto, even if it is only for a day or two. It isn’t worth your precious time and energy carrying on some kind of feud, so pretend it never happened and that you are the best of friends rather than the worst of enemies.

You may be a touch ruthless today, especially where one-to-one relationships are concerned. Yes, of course, you need to protect your interests but don’t be too hard-hearted or you could drive away someone who should be one of your closest friends.

Be careful what you spend your money on today and over the weekend because someone out there has you marked down as gullible and may seek to take advantage. Just because you would not try to cheat them does not mean they won’t try to cheat you.

Give people you live, work and socialize with your support today, even if they do things that to your mind are stupid in the extreme. If they make an error of some sort just pretend you have not noticed and give them a chance to put it right.

You don’t lack for common sense but for some reason you will act in an illogical manner today. Nothing bad will come of it though, so do what feels right in the moment and don’t worry if it doesn’t work out quite the way you had hoped.

By all means be helpful today but don’t go any further than that. If you start doing things for other people that they should be doing for themselves there will be no end to it, so point them in the right direction but let them do the marching!

Does the ends sometimes justify the means? Not if the means are negative or nasty. Ultimately, life is about the journey, not the destination, so the way you achieve things today is going to mean more than the extent of your material success.

You don’t have to strive to get what you want. In fact you don’t have to strive at all. Find a comfortable place to watch the world go by and at some stage today what comes before you will be precisely the thing you most desire.

It’s unlikely that your secrets will stay secret for long. With communications planet Mercury at odds with your ruler Jupiter today you are sure to let slip facts and figures you really should keep to yourself. Why? Because you can’t resist showing off!

Let that special someone know how you feel. Let them see how much they mean to you and that you will always be there for them. You may not be the most romantic of signs but you have your moments, and this will be one of them!

Don’t be embarrassed to use people in positions of authority to get what you desire today. If you need a favour from someone higher up the professional ladder than you then now is the time to ask them. It’s highly unlikely they will refuse.

It’s okay to be honest about your feelings, but you need to be tactful as well. Just remember that while Mercury is undergoing its current retrograde phase what you say may come back to haunt you at some time in the future – so be careful.

A Mercury-Pluto link on your birthday suggests you will be attracted to questions and answers that go deeper than what most people might regard as “reality”. Just be careful you don’t get too close to people whose views are, to say the least, a bit extreme.

Take what a friend tells you this weekend very seriously indeed. It may seem as if they are being unduly melodramatic but the planets warn they know things that you do not. Listen to their concerns – because they are your concerns too.

There are a lot of wild ideas flying about at the moment and there is a danger you could get caught up in the hysteria and start believing some of the things you hear. What happened to that famous Taurus common sense? Don’t lose your head this weekend.

Someone in a position of authority has been giving you a tough time of late but that’s okay because you’re a pretty tough cookie yourself. What they try to do over the next 48 hours won’t do you any favours, so be brave and reject it.

Don’t waste your time and energy chasing after things you cannot have – and which probably would not be good for you if you got your hands on them. Apply your Cancer skills to something, or someone, more deserving of your attention.

For some reason or other you appear to mistrust someone without the faintest idea why. Is your sixth sense trying to tell you something? Or have you merely got the wrong end of the stick? What happens this weekend will answer those questions.

If you find yourself locked in some kind of dispute this weekend neither you nor your opponent will want to back down. Somehow you need to find a point of agreement where your minds can meet. You may have to give ground – a little.

If you find yourself working on something that does not interest you much don’t try to wriggle your way out of it. Instead, resolve to do it to the best of your ability. It may not be much fun but it will win you some useful new friends.

Anyone who expects you to compromise this weekend obviously has not had much experience of dealing with Scorpios. In your vocabulary the word “compromise” actually means “do it my way”. Refuse to back down and you’ll get what you want.

The current cosmic picture warns that you could easily overreact and start a fight over something that isn’t that important. If it happens, then fight to win – but a better strategy might be not to fight at all. What can you do to avoid confrontation?

You won’t have any doubts about what you intend to do this weekend, even though everyone and their dog seems to be against you. You enjoy taking on challenges – the bigger the better – but even more than that you enjoy proving people wrong.

Your mind is incredibly sharp at the moment, which could be useful if you are looking to make some money because the planets suggest that a business proposition of some sort is just what your bank manager ordered. Really go for it over the next 48 hours.

You will have no trouble making snap decisions this weekend, but will they be good decisions? That depends on how willing you are to listen to advice from people who have more experience than you. Use what they know to enrich yourself.

It may seem as if you have not moved much closer to your dream over the past 12 months but that simply isn’t true. Everything builds on what went before and the experiences you had then will make it easier for you to succeed now – so keep at it.

Success comes to those who believe they deserve it, so stop worrying that you are not up to whatever task is in front of you and just get on with it. Your mind creates your future, so make up your mind to be the best – and you will be.
