You are strongly advised to listen to advice from someone who clearly knows more about a certain situation than you do. Then act on what they tell you. It could save you from making a big mistake, as well as looking a little bit silly.

You will go out of your way to prove that you are not as indecisive as some people say you are. That’s fine, but you will also need to make sure that when you make a decision it’s the correct one. Get the balance right between thinking and acting.

There are so many opportunities available to you now that you may be having trouble deciding which direction you should be moving. The message of the stars is that it really doesn’t matter. Choose a goal – any goal – and stick with it to the end.

If you want to make the most of the opportunities that are going to be coming your way over the next few weeks then you need to know what it is you are aiming for in life. Identify your No.1 priority and organize everything else around that.

Just because you have your doubts about what a friend has been up to does not mean you should turn your back on them. Everyone is different and everyone can be a bit mule-headed at times – yes, even a Virgo – so give them your full support.

The most important thing now is that you have a clear picture in your mind of the kind of success you are striving for. That way, even when you wander off course occasionally – as you will – you can easily get yourself back on track again.

If you feel out of sorts in your present location then pack a bag and get out of there. You don’t have to ask anyone’s permission to move on, and neither do you have to explain what your motives are. You may not even know them yourself.

If you insist on seeing the negative side in every situation then, inevitably, that is how things will work out for you. Your attitude to what you experience is far more important than the events themselves, so change your outlook and your world will change too.

Whatever suggestions friends and loved ones might come up with over the next few days you don’t have to agree with them, and you certainly don’t have to do as they say just to keep them sweet. Trust your own instincts and act on them first.

The cosmic picture is about to change and for you it will be a good change, so stop fretting about all those minor issues that have been taking up all your time and energy and set your sights on reaching the big time again – it’s where you belong.

It may look as if everyone else is moving in one direction while you are moving in the opposite direction but looks can be deceiving. And anyway, whatever route you take you will all end up at the same destination eventually, so why worry?

A Mars-Mercury link on your birthday means you will find your voice over the coming 12 months, which is good, but also that some of your opinions may be a little “way out” for other people’s liking, which is not so good. Think twice before you speak up.

You are never afraid to work hard to get what you want but don’t try to do the impossible. Make sure the aims and ambitions you set for yourself are within reach, otherwise you could exhaust yourself and have nothing to show for it.

Start something new over the next few days, something you have been thinking about for quite some time but did not, until now, have the courage to go for. For best results, don’t try to do it on your own – get a small group of friends to help you.

You will have to make some kind of sacrifice today but you will make it gladly, not least because you know you will be rewarded in some way further down the line. Try to avoid conflicts on the work front – they’re just not worth it.

If you feel out of your depth today you must let other knows about it so they can help you. It would be nice if loved ones could read your thoughts and know what you need but they can’t, so you have to spell it out for them.

There is a chance that you will come into money over the next few days, and an even bigger chance that you will waste it if you do. Leo tends to extravagance and it seems you are in one of your spend, spend, spend moods at the moment.

Put your own needs first today and don’t feel guilty about it. Some people may say you are being selfish, and maybe you are, but the fact is you have done so many things for so many people in the past, so they have no cause for complaint.

You must not let your work get on top of you today. There are a number ways you can make life easier for yourself and the best is to refuse to take on any more commitments. Practice saying the word “no” – then say it loud and often!

Some of the people you meet over the next few days could become very important to you, professionally and financially, later in the year, so be on your best behaviour and make sure they like what they see. The more you impress them the more you will gain.

Look and act confident today, even if you doubt what it is you are doing. The planets warn if your rivals detect any hint of anxiety they will be on your case in an instant. You DO have what it takes to succeed Sag, so get on with it.

The approaching full moon will fill your head with big ideas, especially where your career is concerned, but not all of them will be right for you. Decide what your No. 1 priority is going to be and focus on it to the exclusion of everything else.

You will have to make some tough decisions over the next few days and some people will be annoyed by the path you choose to take. That’s too bad. No one has the right to tell you what you should be doing, so ignore the disapproving looks.

You are, of course, entirely free to make your own decisions, but while Mercury is moving retrograde through your sign you must be 100 per cent certain that the facts and figures on which you base those decisions are correct. Double check them.

According to your birthday chart your talents are being wasted in your current environment, so start thinking about where you could go to improve your chances of success. Take that next big step and move on to something bigger and better.

Once the sun moves into your sign tomorrow you will quickly find your feet again and before you know it you will be miles ahead of everyone else. But don’t do things just for the sake of it – do things because you believe in them.

Cosmic activity in the most sensitive area of your chart may make you a bit more fearful than usual over the next few days, but no matter. You don’t have to be out there doing great things all the time. It’s okay to go slow occasionally.

You may not be the sort to get carried away by magical thinking but the planets indicate that if you make some kind of wish today it might just come true. The universe is very much on your side at the moment, so let it work for you.

The sun is about to move into the area of your chart that governs your position in the world, making this the ideal time to decide what kind of life you want to be leading a year or even 10 years from now. Think big and aim high.

One of the best times of the year is about to begin, so banish negative thoughts from your mind and force yourself to believe that all things are possible. Some truly amazing events will occur over the next few weeks – and you will be at the centre of them.

Keep confidential information to yourself today, because if you let slip what friends and colleagues are up to the wrong people could find out and it will be you who gets the blame. You can be too chatty for your own good sometimes.

If you make an effort to be pleasant today – especially with people who actually rub you the wrong way – you will reap the benefits in the very near future. As the sun moves into your opposite sign of Aries tomorrow relationships will take on added importance.

Conserve your energy and pay attention to what your body is trying to tell you. Your drive and determination is such that you often push yourself way beyond your natural limits, but you cannot do that forever. Take a rest today – no one can say you don’t deserve it.

The sun’s change of signs tomorrow means you are about to embark on one of the best times of the year, a time for getting things done and a time for having fun. Anyone whose negative attitude annoys you must be banished from your thoughts and feelings.

Honesty is not just the best policy, it’s the only policy, and even if you know that what you say won’t sit well with certain people you must say it anyway. Not all criticism is bad and today you have a duty to call it as you see it.

As the sun is about to move into the communications area of your chart you won’t have much trouble putting across your point of view. But don’t be too pushy about it. Yes, most likely you are right, but others are entitled to their opinions too.

The past few weeks have been a lot of fun and there is no reason why the next few weeks should not be fun as well. However, you do need to take a critical look at your spending habits. Better still, find ways to boost your income.

A Mars-Pluto link on your birthday will endow you with almost superhuman levels of energy and encourage you to believe that with the right degree of ambition and application all things are possible. Those who stand in your way won’t be standing for long!

A new solar year begins for you today, and with your ruling planet Mars also on excellent form the omens are good for the coming month. Don’t let anything hold you back – if there is something you are keen to do then get on with it straight away.

Don’t be surprised if certain people are unreasonably critical of you over the next few days. And don’t react to it either. If you show that you are a bit thin-skinned they will try all the harder to rile you. Pretend you just don’t care.

Get out into the world and have fun with your friends. Some may say that it’s wrong to be so light-hearted when there are so many things that need changing in the world but the fact is you are more likely to change them with laughter than with anger.

If you dream about moving up in the world, or of doing something special, now is the time to stop thinking about it and start doing the things that will bring it about. Don’t be afraid to approach people in positions of power – they want to help you.

Restrictions that have been holding you back in recent weeks will lose their power over you as from today. The sense of freedom you feel will be amazing. Take advantage of it by going where you want, when you want, with whom you want.

It is important that you stick closely to the facts today, especially where anything to do with your financial health is concerned. It’s not like you to get sentimental, especially about material things, but there is a real danger of that now.

No matter how independent-minded a Libra you may be you will want to get close to people now that the sun is moving into the partnership area of your chart. Never doubt that you are loved and never miss a chance to give back love in return.

It’s one thing to have a head full of good ideas but quite another to take those ideas and make something of them. Over the next few weeks you should focus on one, maybe two, of them and go all out to turn great ideas into concrete realities.

You should be at your most outgoing and optimistic now that the sun is moving in your favour. You certainly won’t waste time worrying about issues you have no way of changing or controlling. Life is about what you can do, not what you can’t do.

Cosmic activity in one of the more emotional areas of your chart could make you a bit touchy, even more so as the moon is almost full. Whatever others might say and do try not to let it get to you. It’s a mistake to take everything personally.

Your words have more of an effect than you sometimes realize, so watch your tongue today and tomorrow because it will be easy for others to take what you say the wrong way, and with a full moon looming they may not be inclined to forgive you.

As the sun moves out of your birth sign today you have to come to terms with the fact that you no longer have the same room for maneuver as you did before. There is still plenty you can do, but you can’t do it all on your own.

A full moon on your birthday means you need to pay closer attention to what those around you, both at home and at work, expect of you. Compromise is essential – you will get nowhere if you expect your wishes to be paramount each and every time.

Someone will try to persuade you to do something today that you would not choose to do of your own volition. The trouble is you seem to believe that you owe them in some way. Maybe you do, but think carefully before saying yes – you could easily regret it.

The full moon will in some way or other tax your patience and it’s quite likely that you will have words with someone before the end of the day. On the work front especially you need to make allowances for people who are not as switched on as you.

Someone you usually get along with may act a bit negative toward you today, but don’t let it get to you and don’t think it is the end of your friendship. They may be emotionally touchy today but come the weekend they will be all smiles again.

You may not have a care in the world at the moment but someone you are close to emotionally is going through a pretty tough time and you must do what you can to help them. Give them a cuddle and let them know that you care.

You are advised not to make too many changes today or tomorrow because the current full moon could trick you into moving in a direction that is not right for you. Leave things as they are, at least until the weekend. The less you do, the better.

Wherever you go and whatever you do today you will have a lot of fun, but you will also spend a lot of money and need to know when you have gone too far. Unlike leaves, those little pieces of green paper do NOT grow on trees!

Because today’s full moon takes place in your birth sign it should come as no surprise if you get a bit emotional. But it must not be allowed to stop you from pushing ahead with your plans. If you offend someone, say sorry and then forget about it.

Stop worrying about minor problems and start looking forward to a time when you will feel on top of the world and be in the mood to challenge your rivals in ways you have not been able to do in the past. Remember, the future starts today.

If you need to get back on good terms with someone you have fallen out with this would be a good day to approach them and offer to talk through your problems. Chances are they are as eager as you to leave the past behind.

Try not to worry too much about what’s going on in your place of work at the moment. Yes, of course, it is more than a little unsettling, but the full moon indicates it is also temporary and will have no adverse effect on your job or career.

Travel and social plans may be high on your agenda but the full moon will in some way or other disrupt them, so be ready to change direction at a moment’s notice. Stay calm and deal with what happens in a logical, rather than an emotional way.

Your feelings could easily lead you astray over the next 48 hours, so be aware that what drives you is not need but desire. There is nothing wrong with desire, of course, but it cannot be permitted to govern your decisions, still less your entire life.

If you listen to and act on what other people tell you over the coming year you will probably do okay, but you won’t do anywhere near as well as you would have done if you had listened to your own inner voice. Always put your instincts first.

Flaunt your abilities. Let the whole wide world know what you are capable of. The sun in your sign gives you the courage and the confidence to move beyond what has limited you in the past. Today there are no limits – so shine!

If there is something you are not sure of today you must get a second opinion, even if it means admitting that maybe you don’t know as much as you thought you did. Most likely you are just missing a few facts and figures – nothing more.

A friend wants you to do one thing but a loved one wants you to do something completely different. It has to be one or the other – you cannot please them both – so make a decision and stick with it. Hopefully the consequences won’t be too bad.

The kinder you are to people who probably do not deserve it the less likely it is that you will get any thanks. But don’t let that stop you. It’s not about the way they choose to react, it’s about the kind of person you choose to be.

The message of the planets today is that you must resist the temptation to waste money on things you don’t need. The more cash you keep in your pocket now the more you will have to spend on something that is genuinely worth it early next week.

Keep personal information to yourself today. If you reveal things about yourself that other people don’t need to know you could find later on that someone who does not have your interests at heart makes use of it in a negative way.

No doubt you have many questions but are you ready for the answers? The planets warn if you go looking into areas that don’t concern you today what you discover may not be to your liking. Stick with the easy questions – they’re safer.

Someone in a position of authority wants you to do something that clearly is not in your interests. So what do you do? You let them know as politely as possible that, on this occasion, you cannot agree. Help them in other ways.

It may be tempting to believe that the best way to get your life moving again is to give up on everything that went before and start anew but don’t be hasty. There is a lot of good stuff in your past that is worth holding on to.

If someone throws your offer of help back at you today don’t get angry about it. Chances are they are under so much pressure at the moment that they just want to be left alone to sort things out their way. Respect that and keep your distance.

You may feel a sense of duty to a certain individual but you don’t have to do what they ask of you without thinking about it. If their suggestion is not to your liking make it your business to point out why and how they should change their approach.

Don’t take risks with money and certainly don’t take risks with other people’s money. The effects of yesterday’s full moon still linger and if you’re not careful you could easily make a mistake that results in the kind of loss that no one is happy with.

Make life easier for yourself over the coming 12 months by starting with the assumption that the world is a wonderful place and everyone in it has some good in them. The way you think as a matter of habit determines the nature of your human experience.

The way to deal with someone’s negative emotions is to not allow yourself to get negative or emotional in return. This is your time of year, so don’t let anyone spoil it. Life is good – for you – and about to get many times better.

You may be tempted to ignore a problem of some kind in the hope that it will go away of its own accord, but it won’t, so you really have no choice but to deal with the matter. Chances are that as problems go it’s actually quite minor.

Be careful what you say over the next 48 hours because if you are not absolutely clear about your meaning your words could be taken the wrong way by someone who won’t hesitate to cause a scene. Sharpen your communication skills – you’re going to need them.

The news you receive this weekend may seem a bit dark but nevertheless you have every reason to look on the bright side. No matter what other people might say, if you focus only on good things then only good things are likely to happen.

This is potentially one of the most exciting times of the year for you, so get your act together and start doing the kind of things you hardly dared dream about in the past. The bigger your sense of adventure the bigger your successes will be.

The planets warn you are taking a particular situation far too seriously – certainly more seriously than those around you are taking it. If it does not bother other people why are you allowing it to bother you? Think about that and then cheer up.

This may be a somewhat confusing weekend for you as Neptune’s influence leaves you wondering whom you can trust. Your best course of action is to ignore what others say and listen to what the logical part of your brain tells you. Avoid wishful thinking.

Try not to make any important decisions over the next 48 hours because what you decide now may have to be reversed later on. Above all, avoid allowing the emotional side of your mind to dictate your actions, because chances are it won’t end well.

It would appear that Neptune, planet of illusion, is clouding your ability to separate fact from fiction, especially on the home front where you seem to be on a completely different level of thinking and feeling to your nearest and dearest. Keep things simple if you can.

Be on your guard and take nothing for granted today and tomorrow. Everything is a bit up in the air at the moment and you could easily read too much into a perfectly normal situation and find that it spirals out of control. Keep it simple.

You appear to be worrying about something that in the greater scheme of things is not worth the hassle. If it has something to do with your finances then, by all means, get it checked out, but don’t read more into the situation than is actually there.

The message of the stars this weekend is clear and simple: Be positive in everything you think, say and do and don’t let people with a more negative approach to life get you down. Act as if you are master of your fate – because you always are.

A new moon on your birthday is a sign of better times to come, and if you are the sort of Aries who enjoys new beginnings then the next 12 months could be truly amazing. Remember though, that once you start something you then need to finish it.

New opportunities will arise over the next few days, and if you react quickly and decisively you could make a name for yourself, and maybe a nice chunk of money too. Don’t fight change – if you work with it you can make it work for you as well.

The best way to help yourself is to help other people first. Today’s new moon invites you to put yourself in the emotional position of someone you are close to and who is obviously struggling. It won’t take you long to work out what they need.

Try not to argue with people who seem to enjoy causing tension where none existed before. The planets indicate that the best way to deal with those kinds of individuals is to ignore them – or at least to ignore their provocative words and actions.

A new moon in the career area of your chart will see you much enthused about a new ambition, but you need to keep your feet on the ground because it’s unlikely to be as straightforward as you want to believe. Success takes hard work, and lots of it.

There is no way you are going to sway someone with facts and figures – they don’t care about stuff like that. What you must do is appeal to their emotions, so lay it on thick and make them believe the world might end if they don’t agree with you.

You may want to take something you are working on to a higher level but to do so you are going to have to invest quite a bit in it – not just time and effort but cash as well. So the first question you need to ask is: Can you afford it?

The more time you spend in preparation the less time you will waste fixing mistakes that could have been avoided. Today’s new moon will make it easy for you to reach out to people who have been there and done it before you. You can learn from them.

By all means work hard but don’t knock yourself out trying to do things that are clearly beyond your capabilities. Even a Scorpio, driven as you are, must be aware of what is and is not possible, so keep it real and keep yourself fit and healthy.

Spell out in clear and simple terms what it is you are trying to do, and what the universe can do to assist you, and it won’t be long before you are sailing along with the wind at your back. Good things come to those who follow their dreams.

You may be tempted to confess to family and friends that what you have been up to has gone wrong in a big way but the planets warn that might not be such a good idea. Why draw attention to your failings if others seem unaware of them?

An opportunity to mingle with interesting people will come your way today and you must not turn it down. You may be surprised to discover that your ideas and their ideas are in fact quite similar. You could even end up working alongside one another.

By all means look ahead and make plans, both short-term and long-term, but don’t forget that plans need to be paid for. The good news is that today’s new moon could bring a windfall of some kind, or make ready cash much easier to come by.

Not everyone born under the sign of Aries is outgoing and energetic and there will be times over the coming year when you want nothing more than to be left alone with your thoughts. Make room for your inner life and your outer life will flourish too.

Try not to be suspicious for no good reason as the week begins. Now that the sun is moving through your sign you must keep your outlook on life in general positive and constructive at all times. No one wants to hurt you. Most people want to help you.

It’s not like you to waste money on things you don’t need but with Mars moving through your sign in recent weeks you may have been a bit impetuous in some of your purchases. Start looking for ways to save cash rather than spend even more.

The pace of life may not be quite so frantic today but that’s okay. In fact you will probably quite enjoy the more relaxed atmosphere as the new week begins. Make the most of it because it’s unlikely to last more than a few days.

You will get the chance to deal with an issue that has been bothering you on and off for months. You may have to make a decision that won’t be popular in certain circles but if it’s the only way to move on then it’s got to be done.

Something will happen over the next few days that compels you to question some of your most deeply held opinions and beliefs. It may not be an easy experience but it’s something you need to do. Even a Leo is allowed to change their mind.

Refuse to settle for second best today. The standards you set at the start of the week are the standards you will be judged on throughout the week and well into next month, so aim high and don’t let anyone tell you certain things cannot be done.

You of all people should know that appearances can be deceptive and according to the planets you could easily get something back to front, inside out, or upside down today. It might be wise, for now, not to trust everything your senses tell you.

Try not to scatter your energy in so many directions that you risk failing to accomplish anything of note. There are so many things you could be doing now but there is one thing you need to focus on to the exclusion of everything else.

Make it look as if you are enthusiastic about what you are expected to do today, even if it’s actually the last thing you want to be working on. The fact is you have no choice in the matter, so smile and make an excellent job of it.

No matter how much someone might provoke you today you must not rise to the bait. Most likely they are doing it on purpose and hoping you will get angry, because they think it will make you look bad. They’re right, it will, so don’t fall for it.

If you hear something today that sounds too good to be true then, most likely, it isn’t true and you should stay well away from it. Also, if someone tries to sweet talk you into doing something for them, just say no. Put your own needs first.

There is something you need to let go of and no matter what it may have meant to you in the past if you let go of it now it will soon be a distant memory. Remember, you don’t have to ask anyone’s permission to make changes.

The way you choose to look at the world is the way the world will appear to you, so choose to be positive and loving and happy and that is what will be reflected back in your direction, not just this year but for many years to come.

Keep your wits about you today and don’t let anyone persuade you to do things that, deep down, you know are unlikely to be in your best interests. It’s good of you to want to help people but helping yourself must always be your first priority.

You will meet some rather strange people over the next 48 hours, the kind of people you might not always take to – but on this occasion they will delight you. Be aware that what starts out as a simple friendship could quickly develop into something deeper.

You need to break free of routines and habits that have been holding you back from reaching your potential. Above all you need to overcome your tendency to focus on details to the exclusion of everything else. It’s the bigger picture that matters, today and every day.

Do whatever takes your fancy today, then do it some more tomorrow. As values planet Venus moves into the most adventurous area of your chart you have nothing to lose and lots to gain by expanding the limits of what you believe is permissible.

A family or financial matter that has been causing you sleepless nights will take a turn for the better over the next few days. It may not be entirely resolved but you will realize quite quickly that it’s not nearly as important as you thought it was.

Wherever you go and whatever you do over the next two or three days you will meet people who inspire you to improve your life. One of those people could become a very close friend and together you will do things you could not have done on your own.

Something will throw you off your stride today and to begin with you won’t be happy about it, but as the situation develops you will realize that it might actually be a positive thing. Ultimately all change is good change, so go with the flow.

With Venus moving into the most dynamic area of your chart today, and linking with changes planet Uranus tomorrow, this is the perfect time to follow through on plans you have been working on for quite some time. Don’t let anyone hold you back.

A friend or relative will do something that shocks you today but if you are smart you won’t make an issue of it. It’s not as if you have never done anything shocking yourself Sag, so let them get on with it and resist the urge to be judgmental.

You seem to be flavour of the month wherever you go at the moment and long may it continue. Just be aware that some of the people who are flattering you may not have your best interests at heart. Don’t let their praise warp your view of reality.

Some people will need convincing that what you are planning is going to work but some people don’t matter – the only thing that counts is that you believe in it. Get started on it immediately and don’t worry if you have to start on your own.

Venus, planet of love and harmony, moves into your birth sign today and even if certain issues have made you a bit hot under the collar of late it’s unlikely you will want to pursue them any further. Your priorities now should be on two things only; loving and laughing.

Has your life got a bit too predictable of late? Then do something about it. The influence of Uranus, planet of changes, on your birthday will encourage you to throw everything up in the air, just to see how and where it all comes down again.

Make sure you are on the move today. The planets warn if you stay where you are you will probably miss out on something you would have enjoyed. You don’t have to plan where you will be going or what you will be doing – just let it happen.

Make the most of Mars in your sign to push ahead both at work and in your personal life. When Mars moves on at the weekend you may find it harder to motivate yourself, so whatever takes your fancy over the next few days just go for it.

When Mars moves into your sign on Sunday it will feel like you have been plugged into a brand new energy source. However, between now and then you are strongly advised to take things easy, physically, mentally and emotionally. Don’t exhaust yourself.

By all means help someone in their hour of need but don’t charge blindly into a situation you know nothing about. Cancer is a cardinal sign and active by nature but there is also a cautious side to your nature and that’s the side you must favour today.

Someone you don’t really trust will offer you something you desire today and you will be mightily tempted to take it. But what will you have to give in return? Make sure you know that before you make a decision. It could be the cost is too high.

Some of the things that take place early next week will require you to be at your most alert and your most energetic, so don’t do too much now. Conserve your energy and keep an eye on changes that begin to take place over the weekend.

You have absolutely nothing to prove, to yourself or to anyone else. Why then do you seem to think it is necessary to set your sights higher and push yourself harder? Whatever the reason you need to get over it. Libra is about balance, and relaxation, and fun.

Make an effort to build bridges to people you don’t always get along with. Venus in the sympathetic sign of Pisces makes it easier than usual to reach out to those who seem to be on a different level mentally and emotionally. Actually, you have a lot in common.

Don’t worry too much if you find it hard to get along with a loved one. According to the planets they have a lot on their mind and need to be left alone to focus on some rather intense personal matters. Give them the space they need.

Make time for people today – not just people you like and love but strangers you meet while socializing or walking the streets. If you make an effort to smile and talk to them they may surprise you, in a nice way, with some of the things they say.

Within a matter of days your confidence will soar. You may find that hard to believe at the moment but when Mars moves in your favour at the weekend the world will take on a much rosier hue. The world won’t actually change much but your attitude will.

You can be quite the romantic when the mood takes you and with love planet Venus now moving through your sign it will take you quite often. Today’s Venus-Uranus link suggests a new friendship could quickly develop into something more meaningful.

A change of emphasis is needed over the coming year, allied to a change of heart. Forget about what other people say you should be doing with your life and let your inner voice speak to you. It’s the part of you that knows all the answers – so listen.

You know what you want and you know that sooner or later you will get it, but don’t be impatient and don’t be pushy when dealing with people who can be every bit as assertive as you. You’ve got enough opponents as it is – don’t make more.

Any plans you had to put on hold a few weeks ago can be started up again as from today. Recent setbacks and hold-ups may have been discouraging but looking back from the not too distant future you will realize they served a purpose.

As Mercury, your ruler, ends its retrograde phase today your powers of persuasion will soon be back to where they were before and even if others were able to deny you in the past they won’t be able to deny you now. Move forward with confidence.

Go out of your way to talk to people today, even people you might prefer to avoid. What you hear from a stranger may be just what you need to raise your spirits and get you aiming high again, both in your private life and in your work.

If someone tries to get you to put in more hours than you are contracted for you can and you must tell them it isn’t going to happen. You may be a nice guy by nature but you don’t have to let people bully you. Stand up for yourself.

You will be able to express yourself more easily now that your ruling planet Mercury is coming out of its retrograde phase. Say what is on your mind and don’t be surprised if it shakes things up a little, or even a lot. Be controversial.

You have been less than happy with developments on the work front of late but you will soon get the chance to change things to your benefit. Speak up about what you see as an injustice and don’t be afraid to hurt other people’s feelings.

If you have a good idea today you would be wise to keep it to yourself for the time being. Your first instinct may be to tell as many people as possible but if you do that you run the risk of someone else making your idea their own.

What you hear today may not be “good” in the usual sense of the word but it does suggest that the tide is turning and it won’t be long before your dealings with certain people get back to normal – or as close to normal as they’ve ever been!

Mercury, planet of communication, moves in your favour today, making it easy to win round people to your way of thinking. Don’t waste your time on trivial matters though – focus on issues that matter in the wider world. Be a force for change.

According to the planets you have been expecting too much of yourself and will need to amend your plans over the next few days. The fact is you are human like everyone else and that means you have limits like everyone else. Know them and respect them.

You have found it difficult to trust certain people of late, and no doubt for good reason, but now that mind planet Mercury is ending its retrograde phase you can afford to be a bit more open with them. There is nothing they can do to harm you.

The moon’s eclipse of Saturn on your birthday warns you need to guide your mind away from negative thoughts and embrace a view of the world that is wholly positive. The universe has a plan and knows what it’s doing, so trust it!

Whatever you say today the people around you will assume that you mean it, so don’t joke or play games because they won’t understand and they won’t appreciate it when they realize you are just having fun. Some people have no sense of humour!

It may seem as if the battle you are currently fighting cannot be won but the planets indicate that simply isn’t true. You have a double advantage over your rivals that almost guarantees success – you believe in yourself totally and you never give in.

If you try to bluff your way out of trouble today you may just about succeed, but you will also be storing up trouble for later on when a similar situation arises. If you can’t do something then just say so. It’s not a sign of failure.

You can, if you wish, push yourself hard over the next 24 hours but you really don’t have to. The planets indicate that the serious stuff won’t start until the early part of next week, so by all means take a break over the next few days.

The moon’s eclipse of Saturn today means you are unlikely to be in an outgoing mood, and on the work front others will struggle to get a solitary word out of you. Don’t worry, you’ll make up for it later – Leo rarely stays silent for long.

Can you be bothered to defend your interests? Is it worth the effort? You may be feeling a bit jaded at the moment but if you give others the impression that you have suddenly become an easy touch they will try to take advantage. Get with it Virgo!

Don’t give up on something just because you are finding it harder than you expected. A little bit of extra effort now will pay off big time early next month, so get your act together and push yourself past whatever barrier is holding you back.

If you need to ask a friend for a favour of some kind them make your approach today. However, you must not be vague about what you want, or what you can offer them in return. Be serious about your aims – and they will be serious about supporting you.

Anyone who thinks they can get their way by shedding a few tears obviously does not know you too well. The lunar eclipse of Saturn means you are in no mood to allow yourself to be emotionally blackmailed. A hard heart is a good heart today.

By all means tread on a few toes if it makes it easier to get whatever it is you desire. The very last thing you should be worrying about now is hurting other people’s feelings. Would they worry about your feelings if the situation was reversed?

You may be in a playful mood but some of the people around you are in a ridiculously negative frame of mind. It might be best to steer clear of such people today and over the weekend. Don’t let them drag you down to their level.

You don’t have to let things hold you back from enjoying yourself. Whatever may be going on in the wider world you are still master of your own fate, so cheer up and find ways to have fun. You’re at your best with a smile on your face.

You will embark on a journey of inner discovery over the coming 12 months, one that never truly ends. Don’t be afraid to look deep inside yourself, because what you discover in there will have an enormous effect on the quality of your life out here.

You will want to do good deeds for people this weekend, which is wonderful, but don’t get carried away and let them have things you should be keeping for yourself. As Mars moves in your favor tomorrow you must remember to take as well as give.

Go with the flow over the next 48 hours and don’t worry if you end up some place you were not expecting to be. Wherever it is, and whoever you interact with while you are there, it is part of your life’s design, so embrace it and enjoy it.

The more you have focused on your inner life in recent weeks the more you will now move in the other direction and focus on the world at large. There is so much that is exciting and enticing out there. Get involved and make your mark.

You’ve got that feeling again that you must do something to prove yourself. You may have no idea where it comes from or why it should strike you at this particular moment but it’s there and you have to respond to it. Put on a show.

Instead of rushing into a new situation, or trying to bend an old situation so it works more to your liking, just back off and let things happen. The planets indicate that your best strategy by far is to respond to events rather than to initiate them.

Someone in a position of authority is going to get on your case this weekend and it won’t be easy to live up to what they expect of you. But the fact that it isn’t easy means you will strive harder, and in striving you may create something great.

All sorts of exciting things are going on around you at the moment but if you are smart you will ignore each and every one of them and focus on finishing something that, while maybe a bit dull by comparison, will give you a real sense of achievement.

Someone is sure to disagree with your plans this weekend but, of course, that won’t worry you a bit. It’s not what people think, or even say, that matters but what they do, and you are one of life’s major doers – that’s why others envy you.

You will have to make a difficult choice today: either you support a friend, even though you know that what they’ve done is wrong, or you turn against them and side with the powers that be. It’s got to be one or the other – there is no middle way.

Anyone who thinks they can do better than you by working harder than you has clearly never seen you in action. As Mars moves into the work area of your chart this weekend so your energy will soar – but that doesn’t mean you can afford to waste it.

You need to channel your talents in a direction that benefits you rather than other people. Yes, of course, you can still help those less fortunate than yourself but your good works must not take up most of your time. Be good to yourself.

Can you persuade partners and colleagues to follow your lead? Do you really need to? Or even want to? These are the sort of questions you will be asking yourself over the next 48 hours. Make sure the answers you get make life easier, not harder.

You may not be much for planning but the cosmic picture on your birthday demands that you look ahead and map out the route you intend to take. If you can do that then success beyond your wildest dreams is pretty much guaranteed.

If you can’t find a way to handle an important task on your own then you must ask for assistance. Friends and colleagues will do anything for you today if you ask them politely, but they won’t lift a finger to help if you don’t speak up.

This is a really good time to impress employers and other important people. You will find it so easy to put across your ideas that even those who are slow on the uptake will get it immediately. Make sure you get the rewards and applause.

There is no point trying to hide the truth from partners and loved ones because they know you too well and can tell when you are trying to pull the wool over their eyes. Admit what you did and ask for their forgiveness. You’ll get it, of course.

Your attitude toward a project you are committed to is beginning to change and it may be the case that you start looking round for ways to get out of it. It can be done, but at what cost? It’s not just about money, it’s about your reputation too.

You must let everyone know what it is you are planning today. If you try to keep anything hidden others are sure to find out about it and their trust in you will diminish. Most people value honesty, so be open about what you are up to.

You need to let certain individuals know that you have no intention of doing what they ask of you, not just because you don’t agree with it but because the situation is clearly set up to be profitable to them. Don’t let it be at your expense.

The sooner you start making changes the better, and today’s Mars-Saturn link should give you the touch of ruthlessness you have been lacking of late. Anything that does not contribute to what you are trying to do must be junked – and that goes for people too.

You need to prepare yourself for some kind of domestic showdown. You also need to promise yourself that you will stay in control of your emotions at all times – and mean it. A cool head and a calm heart are more essential than ever.

You won’t find it hard to persuade others to do what you want them to do today but try not to be too aggressive about it. Persuasion always works better than coercion, so spell out the benefits of why they should assist you. They’ll get the message.

Make sure you know what the facts are before getting involved in business deals of any kind. If someone suggests something they say will make you money, but can’t come up with the figures to support their claim, then give it a miss. It’s not worth the risk.

There can be no more excuses for putting off something you know has to be done. Today’s Mars-Saturn link in your sign demands that you get your act together and see it through to the end. No one can do it for you, so get on with it!

You must not allow vague worries and fears to hold you back in any way. If you attempt something and it goes wrong, at least you will have tried. If you fail to even try you may never forgive yourself – and your partners won’t forgive you either.

Make a list of all the things you do in your life that are wasteful, that don’t take you closer to your ultimate goal. Then junk them all. The message of your birthday chart is that you need to be ruthless this year, in particular with yourself.

Try not to do or say anything that might upset people in positions of authority. Yes, it’s good that you are not afraid to be outspoken but some days it’s wiser to keep your thoughts to yourself, and this is most certainly one of them.

Avoid conflicts and confrontations over the next few days, even if you know that you are in the right and even if you know that you can defend your position. The best path to take is the path of least resistance, at least for now.

You seem to be rather sensitive to criticism at the moment and if anyone even hints that you may be on the wrong track you will most likely give them a verbal mauling. Just be careful your touchy mood does not cause unnecessary trouble.

You may be tempted to ignore the advice of a friend and take the kind of risk you would usually seek to avoid, and you are perfectly entitled to do so. However, be aware that if you get it wrong the blame will be entirely on you.

You can, if you wish, force through changes that you know other people won’t like, but is it worth the aggravation? A few days from now the situation will look very different indeed, so try not to be hasty. Don’t rush things – time is your friend.

You will go out of your way over the next few days to prove the doubters and critics wrong. But it is of the utmost importance that you do so legitimately – that is, using facts and figures that are genuine rather than wishful thinking.

If a work colleague tells you one thing today but a family member tells you another, which one do you believe? According to the planets your colleague’s advice is likely to be more accurate, simply because they are not as emotionally involved.

This is not a time for talking, this is a time for doing, so get up and get on with what you know you should be doing. The more confidence you have in your own abilities the more likely it is your efforts will be a success.

You may be the sort of person who enjoys making quick decisions but the planets warn that you need to consider your options very carefully today before making your next move. Avoid taking unnecessary risks, especially where money and business issues are concerned.

Try not to fear the worst as the new week begins – despite what some people say there is no need to think that the sky is about to fall. Capricorns have a reputation for maintaining their composure even in the toughest situations. Live up to it.

You can usually be trusted not to let your emotions cloud your judgment but as some of your more deep-seated fears are being forced to the surface that may not be so easy today. Push past those fears and do what needs to be done.

What happens today may seem weird but it’s important that you take it seriously and don’t just ignore it. There are a lot of things out there in the big wide world that you don’t know much about, so be open to new ideas and new experiences.

Your imagination will run riot over the coming 12 months and that could be a good thing or a bad thing depending on your overall outlook on life. Always look for the deeper meaning in what happens, and always believe that good will ultimately prevail.

You want to get along with people but not everyone wants to get along with you. One individual in particular seems intent on starting a feud over next to nothing. You may be tempted to give them what they want but don’t – it’s not worth it.

You will find it easy to impress important people today but work colleagues and employers won’t be impressed if you exaggerate what you can do. Be honest with them about your abilities and your limitations. They don’t expect you to be Superman.

You cannot expect other people to believe in you if you don’t believe in yourself. Today’s Mercury-Neptune link may make you doubt yourself in various ways but you must not let that doubt show. Put on an act – pretend nothing fazes you.

What’s with the false modesty? Yes, of course, being a Cancerian you tend not to make a big noise about your talents but too much modesty can actually be a bad thing. Let people in positions of authority know who you are and what you can do.

There is no guarantee you will get what you desire but you must go all out for it anyway. If it is destined to be yours then the universe will find ways to give it to you. If it isn’t, then readjust your sights and aim for something else.

The only thing that can hold you back now is if you believe what certain people are telling you – in particular that some tasks are too much for you and you should lower your expectations. Chances are they just don’t want you to outshine them.

Despite what some people may be telling you the world is not about to end, so be positive in your outlook and work toward making things better in practical ways. Life is rarely, if ever, as bad as some people like to think it is.

It does not matter how many little things have gone wrong in recent weeks, what matters is that one really big thing is still going right. Focus on that one big thing today and ignore everything else. History is made a step at a time.

Your task today is to patch up a friendship that has gone downhill a bit of late. It does not matter who was to blame, it matters only that you are prepared to make the first move and make it a friendly one. They will respond to your generosity.

Anything to do with your material situation should go well today but don’t take unnecessary risks. If it’s your money that is on the line you must insist on guarantees so that, if things do go wrong, your personal exposure to loss is limited.

You need to get out into the world and let other people know you exist. The sun in Aries at this time of year makes that easier to do but the effort must still come from you. Don’t be afraid to stand up and make yourself heard.

Today’s Mercury-Neptune link in your sign means you will know without a shadow of a doubt what is right and what is wrong and what you need personally to do about it. Don’t follow the crowd, listen to your heart and trust your instincts.

You will need to reconcile conflicting ambitions over the coming year and it won’t be easy. The best way may be to compartmentalize your affairs so personal and professional aims don’t clash. Scheduling and time management will be of the utmost importance.

You enjoy taking risks and will take them by the dozen today. The sun in your sign gives you the feeling that whatever you do and however outrageous or impossible it may look to other people it will work for you. Let’s hope you are right!

Try to be a bit more assertive when dealing with family issues. Show loved ones that you won’t allow yourself to be pushed around, not even by them. Don’t worry if you put a nose or two out of joint – the only nose that matters is your own.

You won’t be lost for words today – in fact they will flow out of you faster than ever. Those who annoy you, even in small ways, could find themselves on the receiving end of a verbal blast they are unlikely to forget in a hurry.

If an opportunity opens up for you today you must go for it without a moment’s hesitation. You are not the only one looking to get ahead of the game, so make sure you are first when it comes to taking advantage of whatever changes take place.

You are in one of your devil-may-care moods at the moment and that’s good. Just remember that while your energy and enthusiasm may galvanize those around you not everyone will have the stamina to keep up with you. Some will inevitably fall behind.

Something unexpected is likely to occur over the next 24 hours and to begin with it may disturb you a bit, but if you stay calm and look at the situation logically you will soon realize there are ways you can benefit from the situation.

Don’t let anyone – not even the people you love most in this life – persuade you to give up on a goal that means so much to you. If you have made a decision then you must stick with it, even at the risk of falling out with them.

You are in one of those moods where you hate to waste time, and the way some people are so laidback about life really annoys you. In which case you should try to work on your own over the next 24 hours, for their benefit and your own.

Both in your personal life and at work you will be somewhat excitable over the next two or three days, but that’s probably no bad thing as life has been a bit short on thrills in recent weeks. Do whatever it takes to liven things up.

Do you stick with routines and methods you feel comfortable with, or do you strike out in a new direction and hope for the best? Listen to what friends and family members suggest – then do the opposite. You don’t have to play safe like them.

This has the potential to be a fun time of year but to make the most of it you need to stop worrying what other people might think about you. Even if they think the worst, so what? A hundred years from now who is going to care?

You must make sure you are working as much for yourself as you are for other people. By all means help partners and loved ones and friends in whatever way you can, but it must not be to the detriment of your own dreams and schemes.

Things will start to fall into place over the next 12 months and you will begin to understand that recent events are part of a wider and deeper cosmic plan. Once you have seen the bigger picture, make sure you don’t lose sight of it again.

Tomorrow’s new moon falls in your sign, making all things possible. This is very much a time of new beginnings, for heading off in a new direction and doing things that have not been done before, so get up, get at it and make your mark.

You need to face up to a problem that has been nagging at you for weeks, months, maybe even years. Don’t be afraid to look inside yourself and confront whatever feelings you discover buried under all the everyday stuff that keeps it hidden.

Allow yourself to dream. Allow yourself to believe that all things are possible. More than anything now you need something to aim for, something so big and so challenging that there is no room for half measures – it’s win or bust!

Your reputation is likely to blossom over the next few days as you rise to whatever challenges are in front of you and show the world you have what it takes to operate at the highest level. Cancer is a cardinal sign – you were born to succeed.

You seem to be in a thoughtful mood at the moment, and there is absolutely nothing wrong with that, but you need to be active as well. Take advantage of the approaching new moon to set yourself new targets – and make them not just big, but huge!

Sometimes you can be a bit too suspicious for your own good and the planets indicate you don’t want to say anything you think rivals and competitors may be able to use against you. That’s fine, but you’ve still got to say something.

You should put your own plans on hold over the next two or three days and do what you can to assist a loved one with some kind of emotional issue. Chances are you will quite enjoy helping them – it feels good to know how much they need you.

If you know what you want today you won’t have any trouble getting it. You are in one of those moods when you simply won’t allow anything to come between you and your goal. Others will sense this and keep out of your way.

Tomorrow’s new moon will do wonders for your confidence but there is a danger that, in typical Sagittarian fashion, you will go too far and say or do something that turns others against you. Will you care? Only if the moon really is made of cheese!

No matter what certain people may tell you there is no reason at all why you should change your ways or even your way of looking at the world. You are who you are and you do what you do and if others don’t like it, that’s too bad!

Something you say over the next 24 hours is unlikely to go down well with friends and relatives, but say it anyway. You are under no obligation to watch your words just because some people are ultrasensitive. Call it as you see it.

Your cash-flow situation needs looking at – not at some point in the future but right now. The simple fact is you cannot go on spending money as if you have an unlimited supply of the stuff. Earn more or spend less – even better, do both.

A new moon on your birthday makes this the perfect time to sweep away the past and start again from scratch. The less emotional baggage you have the more likely it is you will discover the destiny that was designed by the universe specifically for you.

Even if the odds are stacked against you at the moment you will find a way to win. The new moon in your sign means you don’t know the meaning of the word failure and with that kind of confidence in yourself all things are possible.

You may have all sorts of doubts swirling round your mind but you must not let them show. Even if you fear the worst you must act as if you are super-confident. The funny thing is the more you pretend the more likely it is to be true.

According to your solar chart you are trying far too hard to impress other people. Just relax and give expression to whatever thoughts come into your mind. You tend to be at your best when you don’t plan in too much detail. Live in the moment.

Self-improvement is the name of the game at the moment, so give some thought to what areas of your life you would like to expand and increase and then focus on them to the exclusion of everything else. Your talents are huge, so use them.

It’s okay to be easygoing. It’s okay to be laidback. In fact it’s more than okay now that the moon is new in one of the best areas of your chart – it’s essential. A laidback Leo is a creative Leo, and a creative Leo is loved by everyone.

Keep your guard up today because the planets warn that someone you work or do business with may try to cheat you. On the other hand, don’t be too suspicious. You should know by now who you can trust, so don’t treat everyone as a rival.

Go out of your way today to do what partners and loved ones want you to do. Don’t think of it as giving up your own freedom, think of it as expanding the freedom you have to do things together. Your ideas and interests will coincide almost perfectly.

Not everyone will approve of the methods you use today but that won’t worry you in the slightest. In fact you will take it as evidence that your way is the best way, and it’s that kind of self-belief that guarantees your ongoing success.

A new moon in the most dynamic area of your chart makes this one of the best days for getting things done, both in your personal life and on the work front. Don’t start in too mad a rush though – you’ve got all the time in the world.

Be positive about what you have to do today, even if you would prefer to be doing something else. Your efforts will have a hugely positive effect on other people even if they don’t much help you – but eventually the universe will repay you in kind.

Try not to waste time finishing tasks that should have been completed by now. If you have not got to the end of what you have been working on then chances are you never will, so junk it and start something new – and finish that instead.

Today’s new moon indicates that you can find a solution to a family or financial problem that has been keeping you awake at night. The trick is to stop trying to dictate events and to let them guide you instead. They’ll point you in the right direction.

You enjoy working on your own and you certainly get more done than most, but over the coming year you must join forces with like-minded people. Don’t think of it as losing your precious independence, think of it as being part of a powerful team.

The important thing this weekend is that you knuckle down and get things done. The planets indicate that if you are willing, especially socially and on the work front, you will impress the kind of people whose support could be invaluable.

Try not to get angry with someone who has let you down because it means you will most likely carry that mood with you well into next week. Whatever errors they may have committed they’re not really important in the greater scheme of things.

There is so much going on around you at the moment that you may feel a bit left out of things. But in a way that’s good because it means you can act as you please without getting noticed. That’s not an invitation to behave badly though!

Jupiter in the work area of your chart gives you so much physical and mental energy that you can get twice as much done as you usually do. But don’t go to extremes and take on too many duties and responsibilities. Know your limits and respect them.

This is potentially one of the best times of the year for you and to make the most of it you need to be involved in something of a creative nature and you need to be on the move. Aim to accomplish something that really stands out this weekend.

Don’t think you can bottle up your feelings and carry on as normal. The harder you try to disguise what is going on in your head and your heart the more clues you will give those around you that something is wrong. You must open up.

Partnership activities are under excellent stars at the moment, so don’t hide yourself away where you cannot be seen – get out into the world and give people the chance to experience your Libra humor and hospitality. You have so much to give.

This promises to be a good weekend for work-related matters, so forget about taking it easy and focus on tasks that need to be completed quite soon. It may surprise you how quickly and efficiently you work your way through them.

You may be in a dynamic frame of mind at the moment but that does not mean you have an excuse to brush other people aside while you pursue your goals. It’s not what you do on your own that will be remembered, but what you do with others.

At last you seem ready to accept the fact that the more you worry the less likely it is you will be able to overcome the obstacles that are in your way. Attitude is everything in life, so get your head right and your future will be bright.

Some people delight in being negative and trying to knock down your ideas. Ignore them. The planets suggest that if you believe in something enough you will find a way to make it happen, so close your ears to criticism and listen only to your inner voice.

You seem a lot less uptight now about taking on new responsibilities and that’s good because you are about to be asked to do something that will test both your existing knowledge and your ability to learn something new. Treat it as a challenge to be enjoyed.

Your energy levels will be extremely high over the coming 12 months, but for best results you should try to work consciously with other people toward shared goals. Small groups of people with burning ideals have been known to change the world.

If you are feeling a bit low at the moment then throw yourself into activities that require your full attention. One of the best ways to get over your worries and woes is to support people who are worse off than you – there are plenty of them.

A quick decision may not be the best decision but the planets indicate you may have no choice but to act quickly today. Be bold, on the work front especially, but be ready for a backlash from people who would prefer you not to rock the boat.

The planets warn if you come on too strong today you could put a friendship at risk. You may have strong opinions about something but this is probably not the best time to make an issue of them. Find something less controversial to talk about.

You may need to give a boost to your financial situation but you must not do so in ways that alienate other people, especially your friends. Money is important, of course, but cold cash can never replace the warm glow that comes from human communication.

You certainly don’t lack for energy or ambition at the moment but today’s Mars-Uranus link warns you could easily take things too far and turn against you the very people you most need on your side. Don’t just act and assume they will support you.

It’s true that you need to push a few boundaries, but you also need to be aware that the more risks you take the more likely it is that things could go wrong. The world can be a fulfilling place, of course, but it can be a dangerous place too!

If you are prepared to work, as an equal, with other people today then you could accomplish something very special. However, if you turn inward and choose to go it alone then your successes may seem a bit hollow. It’s all about sharing Libra.

Your destiny is not set in stone. It may be true that the general pattern of your life is established at the time of your birth but within that pattern you still possess free will. Watch out for those cosmic hints today, but always make your own decisions.

You will be tempted to rush things over the next 24 hours, but that may not be such a good idea. On the work front especially it will pay you to take what you are doing a careful step at a time instead of moving ahead in leaps and bounds.

You may be in the mood to take risks but today’s Mars-Uranus link warns you could end up in an untidy heap if you make the wrong call. You could also end up seriously out of pocket, so take your time, be cautious, and get it right.

As Mars in your sign makes a less than positive angle to your ruling planet Uranus you may find there are unexpected consequences to the actions you take. Try to look ahead and envisage what the effects of what you are doing might be.

You are usually good at keeping your emotions under wraps but the cosmic picture suggests that something could easily set you off and before you know it the whole wide world will know how you feel. It may take a while for the world to recover!

By all means be generous with your time, your energy and your money over the coming 12 months, but be sensible too. You only have so much to give, so make sure it goes to the right people for the right reasons. That means saying “no” occasionally.

No matter what some people may try to tell you there is no need to prove that what you are doing has value to the wider community. What matters is that it has value to you – everything else of importance will follow on from that.

If people you are negotiating with sense that you are desperate to get a deal they will most likely push up the price or make unreasonable demands. Pretend you don’t care if you reach an agreement or not, then they will act in good faith.

You may be ambitious by nature but you also need to accept there are some goals that are likely to remain out of reach, at least for the time being, and what happens today will prepare you for that. Be positive but know your limits too.

You may not be in the mood to work hard as the new week begins but that’s not a bad thing. Start at a slower pace than usual and build up speed as you go along. If you hit top speed immediately you may exhaust yourself by midweek.

You need to tighten your belt and you need to do so immediately. Any spending plans you have in the pipeline must be put on hold for a week, a month, maybe even longer, until you get your financial affairs under control. Everything else is of minor importance.

It may annoy you that certain individuals need to be convinced that you genuinely care for them but the fact is some people cannot take things like that for granted. Do something today that shows your heart was, is and always will be with them.

Mars in the most adventurous area of your chart boosts your imaginative powers but other influences warn you need to keep your feet on the ground. Whatever you choose to do over the coming week make sure it has a solid and practical foundation.

Your expectations, both of yourself and other people, are high as always but the planets warn you could be expecting too much of someone who clearly is not on your level when it comes to ability and commitment. Let them break free and move at their own pace.

You need to steer clear of other people’s fights and feuds, especially if there are relationship issues involved that you don’t know a great deal about. There are few things more dangerous than getting stuck in the middle of an emotional battle.

Do what you feel like doing, not what other people say you should be doing. Saturn in your sign boosts your sense of responsibility but you need to understand that your main responsibility is always to yourself and your own ideals and beliefs.

By all means pay out for something you genuinely need but don’t waste money on things that serve no practical purpose. Someone is watching to see how easily you can be parted from your cash – don’t encourage them to target your wallet.

No matter which way you turn there seems to be a hard luck story you have to listen to, but you are advised to ignore each and every one of them. That may sound harsh but, seriously, most of what you hear is likely to be grossly exaggerated.

Never think that you cannot make a difference in the world. Never think that your contribution is too small to get noticed. The message of your birthday chart is that you have something worthwhile to give, so start giving now and don’t ever stop!

It’s great that you can act on the spur of the moment and make a success of what you do but you still need to have some kind of plan in place for the next few days. Even an Aries can benefit from looking ahead a bit.

If you are not entirely sure that what you are about to embark on is right for you then call a halt. It’s better to lose a bit of face now than have to admit later on, after you’ve started, that you don’t know what you are doing.

It may look as if someone has more power than you and can therefore tell you what to do but chances are their authority is not backed up by anything that need scare you. Call their bluff and see what they do about it – most likely nothing at all.

Just because a friend is having a hard time expressing themselves does not mean they have nothing to say. On the contrary, the planets suggest that what they have to tell you is going to be of huge importance, so be patient and listen carefully.

You rarely take kindly to advice and almost certainly you will pay no heed to what a work colleague tells you today. That’s a shame because they appear to know something that you do not, and career-wise it could be a very important something.

Some people like to take the credit when things go right but make out it’s nothing to do with them when things go wrong. But you’re not some people, you’re a Virgo and honest by nature, so admit your mistake and then put it behind you.

The more you try to figure something out the further away the answer seems to be, so take the hint and give your brain a rest. This is one of those problems that can only be solved by standing back and letting the whole picture come into focus.

You are no stranger to dealing with unpleasant situations but that does not mean you have to clean up a mess that is not of your making. If it’s for someone you love then do what you can to assist. If not, give the Good Samaritan act a miss.

There is no point trying to hide your feelings from people who know you well because even if you manage to keep the look on your face neutral your body language will give you away. It’s okay to be open about how you feel.

It’s unlikely that you will see eye-to-eye with people in authority today, and if it’s you who is the boss then it’s unlikely that your employees will understand you. No matter. Whether you are giving orders or receiving them don’t ask questions, just act.

You can’t seem to put your finger on what’s going on at the moment, but is that because other people are being evasive or because you’re not as clued in as you think you are? Quite likely it’s the latter, so wake up to reality.

You may think that you have covered every angle but can you be sure? The planets suggest that something you have missed, even something quite small, has the potential to stop you in your tracks – so open your eyes and find out what it is.

The coming 12 months won’t always be easy but there will be something new for you to learn each and every day. What is your philosophy of life? What ideals sustain you? You need to have some kind of belief system to fall back on.

If you make a mistake today you must expect your rivals to make a big thing of it, because if you look bad it makes them look good, or so they think. Don’t let it get to you. Keep doing what you’re doing, only even better than before.

You may be tempted to bluff your way out of a tight situation but with the sun at odds with Saturn today your efforts could easily backfire. If you have made an error of some kind then why not just admit it? No one expects you to be perfect.

It is of the utmost importance that you stay on good terms with partners and colleagues over the next few days. There are a number of issues you could fall out over but none of them are worth the time or the effort. Find ways to compromise.

If a friend has been taking you for granted of late then you really must do something about it. Find a way to let them know that you are quite capable of going off on your own, that you don’t actually need their friendship. They’ll get the message.

The people who do best in life are usually the ones who know how to quit when they are ahead. Are you one of them? The planets indicate you have gone as far as you can with one particular course of action. Time to cash in and move on.

Jupiter, planet of good fortune, begins one of its retrograde phases today, and as it occupies the domestic area of your chart it means you need to be extra careful when dealing with family issues. Remember, some people can be incredibly touchy.

You need to accept that there is something you want to change that you are not going to be able to change. Once you recognize that fact you will find it easier to move on to situations that you can influence in some way. Choose the right battles.

Something really trivial will annoy you today but you must not let your anger show. Put on your poker face and pretend that you could not care in the slightest what certain people say and do. And get over it as soon as you can.

Don’t worry if something you had high hopes for has not worked out. The sun at odds with Saturn means you are not the only one who will experience disappointment. But you are one of the few who has what it takes to get past your frustration.

You are on the verge of taking an important decision but with your ruling planet Saturn at odds with the sun today you are strongly advised to wait a bit longer. There could be other options available, options you have yet to consider.

Don’t waste your precious time asking other people what they think of your aims and ambitions – it’s what you think that will determine whether or not they are successful. It’s never too early, or too late, to trust yourself – and be a winner.

If you make an effort to help someone in need today it’s unlikely you will get any thanks for it, but make it anyway. The universe will notice your act of kindness and at some point in the future you will receive an act of kindness in return.

The most important thing over the coming year is that you rely on your own ideas and your own ingenuity. Yes, of course, you should listen to what other people tell you, but there is precious little they can tell you that the inner you does not know already.

Try not to make too big a fuss about something today or others may start wondering if you’ve got a guilty conscience. Saturn’s influence in the career area of your chart means there are people out there who would like nothing more than to see you squirm.

According to the planets you are not making nearly enough noise on the work front at the moment. If you want to get noticed – and you should – then you must find a way to raise your own voice above the verbal chaos that surrounds you.

Your best chance of success is to approach your objective from an unusual angle. If you telegraph your intentions it will make it easier for rivals to get in your way and block you from reaching your goal. Be smart and don’t let that happen.

You may not want to hear what a friend or loved one tells you today but you know they are right and you know you must follow their advice. There is no point being stubborn just for the sake of your ego – your money situation matters more.

It’s never easy for you to keep your opinions to yourself but the planets warn in no uncertain terms that if you open your mouth you will create all sorts of bad feeling. You don’t have to be critical Leo – you can just let it pass.
