Try not to be quite so intense over the next 24 hours. Yesterday’s sun-Saturn link may have knocked your confidence a bit but it will pass and it won’t be long before you are back to your best, so lighten up and let the sunshine in.

A lot of people will be saying how much they love and respect each other today, but you may be reluctant to give your own feelings their head. Which does not mean you don’t have feelings, only that you would prefer not to make them known.

Something that looked simple from a distance may turn out to be rather difficult when seen close up. Be that as it may you have the tools to make a success of it, so get stuck in and enjoy the flattering feedback when it is finally done.

Let someone know why you are not happy with them but do so in a way that does not turn them against you. You may have a right to be annoyed but there is no point making a scene of it. Criticize them in private, not in public.

You have been trying too hard to please other people when you should be doing what pleases you. Make it your priority now to put your own needs first and give no thought to what others say you should be doing. Trust your instincts – and act.

If you turn on the charm between now and the weekend no one will be able to deny you. Both in your personal life and at work you will find it ridiculously easy to persuade people that their needs and your needs are one and the same.

Try not to be too aggressive today. It may be necessary to get vocal about what needs to be done but there is a fine line between looking dynamic and looking despotic. Persuasion is always better than coercion, so talk your way to success.

Something (or someone) that has been holding you back from being more adventurous needs to be dealt with – not tomorrow or the day after but right now. Free yourself from restrictions then strike out in a new direction. The world is yours to enjoy.

Make a point of ignoring a friend’s bad points and focusing just on their good points today. They may be in need of correction but they will respond better to positive advice than they will to criticism. They’ll get the message – and you’ll stay friends.

Try not to put pen to paper on any kind of deal today. In fact, don’t even make verbal promises. Why? Because communications planet Mercury warns you cannot be sure that the other party is going to keep to their side of the bargain.

If someone asks what you think or how you feel today they had better be ready for some straight talking. You are in no mood to pretend that everything is fine when it clearly is not. The truth needs to be said – and you’ll say it loud!

If someone asks you to help them out with their workload today by all means do what you can, but make sure you don’t end up doing it all. Sometimes you can be a bit too nice for your own good. Don’t let them take advantage of you.

You have no intention of pulling your punches today – you have something to say and you are going to say it long and loud. Anyone who cannot handle the truth had best move as far away from you as they can. Take no prisoners.

Try not to read too much into a situation that is actually quite simple. Most likely someone is deliberately making it look more complicated than it is so they can get your sympathy, and maybe your money too. You’re not that gullible – are you?

It is of the utmost importance that you watch what you say over the next 24 hours. You may be tempted to target someone who is getting too big for their boots but that could have serious repercussions. Resist the urge to make fun of them.

You believe in yourself 100 per cent but it seems not everyone thinks you have what it takes. Go out of your way to prove you’re not just good, but great, at what you do. Make it so that even your enemies can no longer deny that fact.

Try not to get carried away with your own importance today. Yes, you are enjoying a run of good fortune that is thoroughly deserved but it’s not smart to make a big noise about it if it makes you a bigger target as well.

No matter what you say over the next 24 hours someone is sure to misinterpret your words. Whether they do so deliberately or by mistake is neither here nor there – you can and you must spell it out for them so the confusion doesn’t linger.

You may be inclined to do something dramatic to get yourself noticed but it isn’t necessary – in fact it could be counterproductive. The planets warn that certain people are watching your every move and checking your every word, so be careful.

Mercury in your sign is poorly aligned to Jupiter, planet of excess, today, which means you need to take extra care when you open your mouth. Yes, of course, you are entitled to your opinions but that does not mean other people have to agree with you.

A sun-Pluto link on your birthday means the coming year will be make or break for you. The more ambitious an Aries you are the more you will find yourself in the spotlight. It may not always be comfortable but you can learn to enjoy it.

You will be challenged like never before this weekend, and you will rise to that challenge and overcome it with ease. But don’t start thinking it will be this easy every day – on the contrary, there are even bigger challenges to face up ahead.

You must listen to what other people tell you over the next 48 hours. The fact that you don’t want to hear means that you need to hear for the sake of your own mental and emotional wellbeing. Don’t be too headstrong for your own good.

If you want something done this weekend you will need to get help from people who know their business inside out. You may be a gifted amateur but the planets indicate that only a true professional can make it happen for you.

It may seem as if someone in a position of authority has got it in for you but it’s more likely that you are reading too much into the situation. Keep your doubts to yourself and, as much as you can, keep a low profile as well.

Promise yourself that you won’t get involved in any kind of fight or feud, and make sure you keep that promise. As the sun, your ruler, is at odds with Pluto today, a minor falling out could easily turn into a full-scale war. You don’t need that.

Most of the time you think with your head first and only bring in what your heart tells you later on. However, the planets warn that everything will be more emotionally charged than usual this weekend, so don’t be surprised if, this time, your heart wins.

If a partnership is not working out the way you wanted it to most likely it’s because you are expecting too much of each other. Sit down together and discuss your individual needs and desires – and be honest, because without honesty it may never work.

Keep your more outrageous thoughts to yourself over the next 48 hours. They may not seem outrageous to you but very few people share your ability to look at life in a dispassionate way – and even fewer have the guts to act on what they see.

The sun in Aries at this time of year makes you feel like a winner, and indeed you are, but because the sun is currently under the influence of power planet Pluto you need to take care when dealing with authority figures. You’ve got enough opponents.

Leave the past where it belongs and focus only on the future. Today’s sun-Pluto link will give you the touch of ruthlessness you need to cut out of your life anything that is not beneficial. That doesn’t just mean possessions, it means people too.

Generally speaking you don’t like taking orders but the current cosmic picture demands that you follow what someone higher up the professional ladder says you should be doing. The most important thing by far now is that you stay in their good books.

Who do you trust? How do you know you can trust them? These will be the kind of questions you will be asking yourself this weekend, and there may be no easy answers. All you can really do is stay alert and – most importantly – trust yourself.

You have never been scared of taking on the powers that be, and that’s good, but you really must choose your battles carefully over the coming year. Better still, don’t get involved in any battles at all. Co-operation is always possible if you strive for it hard enough.

You can at times be too assertive, even aggressive, for your own good and the planets warn if you go too far today you could annoy people who have the power to hit back at you in ways that hurt. Tone down your act Aries, at least for now.

You can watch the world go by if you like but would it not be more productive, and more fun, to get involved and make things happen? Don’t take risks but do make sure that others know you’re up for the challenge.

Don’t shoot the messenger if what you hear is not to your liking. Just because a friend or family member delivers bad news does not mean they want to do so, nor does it mean they are happy about it. Also, it’s not the end of the world.

The sun in the career area of your chart makes you intensely ambitious, but ambition alone won’t get you where you want to go. Forge friendships and alliances with people who can help you climb the ladder of success – and help you stay at the top.

Your self-control will come under pressure today and you may well arrive at a point where you just have to yell at people who don’t see what you see. Will they see it then? Probably not. Sadly, some people seem to enjoy being willfully ignorant.

You may have the power to force others to do things your way at the moment but that does not mean you have to use that power. Today’s sun-Pluto link warns there could be hidden costs if you push too hard. Lead by example, not by coercion.

Relationships of all kinds are under difficult stars today, so you will need to be careful when dealing with people whose feelings seem more important to them than facts. Make allowances for their inability to reason things through as easily as you do.

Today’s sun-Pluto link could do some strange things to the way you choose to look at the world. But the important word here is “choose” – because ultimately it is up to you what you decide to believe. Choose to believe that the universe is always on your side.

Try not to let a difference of opinion with someone get out of hand today. You know from long experience how quickly quite minor matters can escalate into major confrontations, so stay calm and refuse to be provoked into any kind of intemperate action.

It may annoy you that someone you depend on is taking their time over a task that should have been completed by now but there’s probably not much you can do about it. Don’t let your frustration show or they may take even more time getting it done.

By all means be friendly over the next few days but be cautious too. The planets warn that someone you think is on your side could in fact by plotting behind your back, so don’t do anything they may be able to use as a weapon against you.

What seems like such a good idea now could end up costing you a lot more money than you expected, so make sure you know what you are doing. Also, be wary of people who preach doom and gloom at every turn. Avoid them completely if possible.

Venus and Jupiter, the two most positive planets, are strong on your birthday this year but there is a danger you will take too many risks or take too much for granted. Yes, you can have the good things in life, but you still need to work for them.

No, people are not talking behind your back. No, the world is not out to get you. There may be one or two individuals who say things about you in a less than friendly way today but no way can they harm you – so stop worrying!

Your confidence is high at the moment, not least because a friend or family member has made it clear just how much you mean to them. It’s nice to be appreciated. It’s even nicer to be loved. And you are both appreciated AND loved.

The more you worry about something the more power you give it to disrupt your life, so make a conscious decision to put it out of your mind and never think about it again. By far the best way to deal with your fears is to ignore them.

Usually you prefer to keep your feelings to yourself but with Venus at odds with Jupiter, planet of excess, today that may not be possible. If you do go over the top emotionally don’t get too embarrassed about it. It won’t be the last time!

It seems like everything you touch at the moment turns, if not to gold, then at least to something very good. And with the sun moving in your favour toward the end of this week you have even better days to look forward to. Lucky you!

Romance is very much in the air at the moment, but you need to be careful. With Jupiter, planet of exaggeration, linked with Venus, planet of love, as the new week begins there is a danger you could read too much into one particular relationship.

If you intend to make changes to your work schedule over the next few days you are advised to let your colleagues know what you are doing well before you actually do it. They have a stake in what you are doing too, so be smart and keep them informed.

Social activities are under favourable stars at the moment, so don’t be afraid to get out into the world and make new friends. You may not be the most open and outgoing member of the zodiac but you have your moments – make this one of them.

Good news of one kind or another will come your way today and it’s likely you will be on the move either this evening or early tomorrow. Make sure you plan your route well in advance. And have a fallback plan ready, just in case there’s a hold-up.

Whatever duties and obligations you have as the new week begins you don’t have to get on to them immediately. In fact the planets indicate that, as the full moon approaches, it might be a wise move to postpone them for a few days, or even a week.

Don’t let fear of failure hold you back from doing what your instincts tell you is right and proper. And certainly don’t let the thought that other people might not approve of your actions slow you down in any way. Stay true to your beliefs.

Make the most of Venus in your sign to build bridges with people you have not been on good terms with of late. Don’t let your ego stop you from making the first approach – let them know you hold no grudges and want to be friends again.

You will need to develop a thick skin over the coming year as a number of people seem determined to criticize your every move. Maybe they are right, maybe you are doing it wrong, but if you do it with belief it will still work out well for you.

Play by the rules today or you will leave yourself open to accusations that you only do what you want to do when it suits you to do it. A little bit of selfishness is no bad thing but too much could lose you friends faster than you expected.

Be a bit more daring today, especially with money and material objectives. According to the planets you are close to success but you need to break through the mental barrier that keeps you from taking the occasional risk. You can’t play it safe all the time.

Think only of the future and don’t let yesterday’s failures and disappointments hold you back. It’s no big deal that you made mistakes – everyone does – and if you find ways to learn from them they could actually make tomorrow’s successes even greater.

Make things happen over the next few days. The planets indicate that if you have confidence in your own abilities and are willing to let the universe guide you then you cannot help but accomplish great things. Fame and fortune are yours for the asking.

If you need to get on the good side of someone in a position of power now is the time. Let them know you are ready to move up in the world and make sure you are ready to act quickly and decisively when they give you your chance.

Do you meet a challenge head-on or you do you hide and wait for it to go away? It may be that the latter proposition looks more attractive to you at the moment but you can and you must be more dynamic. Life is what you make of it.

You have set your sights on a goal and won’t rest until you have reached it, but with a full moon in your sign later this week you need to be quick. Do what has to be done now, this very moment. Stop thinking about it and just act.

Keep your thoughts and feelings to yourself over the next 24 hours because the planets warn it’s unlikely you will get a sympathetic hearing, not even from family and friends. The less they know about what motivates you the better – for now.

You don’t usually let criticism get to you but you seem a bit touchy at the moment and if someone says something a bit negative about you today chances are you will snap back at them. Good. You may not be perfect but you’re better than they are.

You are closer to making a success of something than you appear to realize and if you push yourself just a little bit harder today it should all come together. Just because you cannot yet see the bigger picture does not mean it does not exist.

With Mars, planet of energy and ambition, moving through the most dynamic area of your chart you are sure to accomplish something significant over the next few days. Try to make it something that benefits other people as well as yourself.

If you spend too long weighing up the pros and cons of a certain course of action you may find that the decision has been taken out of your hands. Follow your instincts and believe that the universe will both guide and protect you.

As Mercury moves into your sign on your birthday the link between your brain and your vocal chords will shorten considerably. Try to think about what you are going to say before you actually say it. Failing that, be prepared to say “sorry” often!

You are who you are and there is no point trying to be someone different. In fact, as first Mercury, today, then Venus, later in the week, move into your birth sign you must at all times and in all situations be true to your own nature.

You may prefer to do things in the open where everyone can see what you are up to but the planets urge you to be a bit more secretive today. Do other people actually need to see what you are doing? If not, keep it to yourself.

You will find it easier to put thoughts into words now that Mercury, your ruling planet, is moving in your favouur again. Don’t worry that what you say might seem outrageous to some people – it’s their fault for having such tiny minds.

At some stage today it will occur to you that there is an easier way to deal with a problem of a personal nature. Most likely that way is simply to ignore it. If you refuse to focus on it chances are it will lose most of its power.

You may have to put certain plans on hold in the run-up to Friday’s full moon but after that you will be free to push ahead again – and this time you’ll have the wind at your back. The future is bright Leo, so keep faith and keep working hard.

You are about to discover that someone you thought you could trust has been leading you on in ways that are designed to make failure more likely. You should have noticed before but, as they say, better late than never. So, what are you going to do about it?

A mental block of some kind will start to crumble over the next few days and come the weekend you will see both where you have been going wrong and what you now need to do to get back on track. After that, it’s up to you.

A work-related issue should seem less of a problem now that mind planet Mercury is moving into the area of your chart that governs, among other things, your mental ability. Chances are you have overlooked a minor, yet rather important, detail.

The planets are beginning to move in your favour and by this time next week your confidence will be sky high again. Between now and then try letting go of any negative feelings you have about other people – then you can leave them behind too.

A situation you once feared no longer holds any terrors for you and most likely you will seek it out over the next few days, just to prove to yourself that it no longer controls you. If you can, find time to help others with their fears as well.

Don’t worry if you have found it hard to express yourself clearly in recent weeks because communications planet Mercury moves in your favour today and soon the words will be flowing again. Don’t say too much though. Some things are best kept to yourself.

The cosmic picture is about to change and in a matter of days you will no longer be under the kind of scrutiny you are now. No doubt you will be relieved but don’t think it means you can hide yourself away again. It’s too late – you’ve been noticed!

If you’ve got talent – and according to your solar chart you have far more than most people – then you need to shout about it. The fact is you are here for a purpose and have a duty to make the most of your creativity, because the world needs it.

You need to get back in the good books of someone you clashed with recently and you need to be quick about it. Tomorrow’s full moon warns that if you don’t make your peace with them now it may not be possible at all. Say sorry – it won’t hurt!

Pace yourself carefully today because if you go too fast you could end up in an untidy heap. Although you may not be able to see them yet there are a number of obstacles in your path that will trip you up if you rush ahead blindly.

Why focus on the things that have gone wrong in your life when there are many more things that have gone right? You seem to be in one of those perverse moods where you actually enjoy being negative about yourself. Get past it!

The approaching full moon means you may have to apologize for something you said or did that a loved one took the wrong way. Yes, maybe they should have a better sense of humour, but you should know by now what is likely to annoy them.

You may want to be on the move now but certain people will demand that you stay right where you are. The planets warn if you ignore them and push ahead regardless you could damage friendships it will take a long time to heal.

You can’t just forget about what you have to do. There are certain tasks that need to be completed and, like it or not, you will have to get on with them over the next few days. Don’t be half-hearted about it. Aim for excellence as always.

According to the planets you have a crush on someone and are thinking seriously about being honest about your feelings. Is that really such a good idea? The approaching full moon warns that your hopes could be dashed if you speak up too soon.

Try to be a bit more understanding today, especially when dealing with people who are down on their luck or who don’t share your confident outlook on life. Merely telling them to get their act together is unlikely to help very much.

Forget about details now and focus on the wider picture. Leave the small stuff for the kind of small-minded people who seem to enjoy losing themselves in meaningless detail. Your big brain needs something deeper and wider to challenge it.

If you say the right thing in the right tone of voice today then you will undoubtedly get what it is you desire. The only problem is that what you desire may not be good for you. On this occasion it might be better to say nothing at all.

Don’t try to force your ideas on other people, because even if you are successful in the short-term you will create so much resentment that eventually they turn against you. If you cannot persuade them with logic, maybe it’s you who has got it wrong.

Once again you are worrying about issues that are not worth the time or the energy. Take a few minutes out of your busy schedule to breathe deeply and clear your mind of troubled thoughts. Fear is a luxury you can do without.

There will always be some people you like and some people you can’t stand the sight of, and if you can recognize and accept that fact the coming year should be a good one, not least because you won’t be inclined to waste time on the latter.

This is probably not the best time to make a far-reaching decision about an important relationship. The full moon warns you should hold off for a few days to see how things develop. In the end you may have to make no decision at all.

Try not to take what happens today too seriously. If someone you live or work with gives you a hard time just let it go and chances are the situation will eventually fizzle out. The only importance it has is the importance you choose to give it.

You may think you can handle a situation on your own but the planets warn you are going to need assistance. Why even think of tackling it alone when you have friends you can turn to for help? Be smart and ask for their advice.

You may not be comfortable with some of the feelings that seem to have taken you over of late but that’s a sign you need to deal with them. Full moons always bring emotions to the surface – you cannot hide from what you feel forever.

Keep what happens today in perspective. The full moon could bring a nasty shock or three but if you stand back and look at what happens from a wider viewpoint you will realize that it’s not worth getting worked up about. Stay calm.

Try not to be too suspicious over the next two or three days. It may seem as if someone is trying to get rich at your expense but are they really or is it your own overactive imagination leading you on? It’s almost certainly the latter.

No matter what setbacks you may now be encountering you must not lose faith in yourself or in what you are doing. The full moon in your sign may make you doubt that you have what it takes but it is only a passing influence. Stick at it!

You are in one of those typically Scorpio moods where you seem to believe that the whole world is against you. Not only is it not true but by thinking that way you limit your options. Reach out to people today, don’t push them away.

Why are you worrying what other people might say about what you are doing? Since when have their opinions meant so much to you? Keep moving in the direction that seems right to you and ignore those who pull disapproving faces.

Because today’s full moon takes place in the career area of your chart you can probably sense that you need to tread carefully when dealing with people in positions of power. They could be a bit touchy at the moment, so keep your distance.

Don’t try too hard to make people around you smile today because your attempts at humor will most likely fall flat. It’s not because you are no longer funny, it’s because everyone is a bit on edge right now. Give them time – they’ll get over it.

You must not be half-hearted about what you are expected to do today. Even if you would rather be doing something else you must give it your full attention and total effort. Why? Because you are being watched and assessed. Make a good impression.

You cannot deny your desires and if you try they will only grow stronger. That is the message of your birthday chart this year and what it means is you need to find a positive outlet for your passions. Look for more creative ways to express yourself.

Money matters will be high on your agenda this weekend and that’s good because you need to find ways to boost your cash flow. If you want to get out of debt now is the time to start doing the smart things that can make it happen.

There is nothing you cannot do and no one you cannot impress now that the sun is moving into your sign. Life will bring opportunities aplenty, so set your sights on your No. 1 goal and let no one tell you that you are aiming too high.

You will accomplish more in the long term if you co-operate with people you work and do business with. Life is not a zero-sum game – one side does not have to lose so the other side can win. Bear that in mind at all times.

Your sixth sense should be telling you that something is amiss, that while on the surface everything seems calm, deep down some rather scary passions are beginning to stir. But scary for who? Maybe it’s time you engineered a few changes.

The sooner you accept the fact that ambition is not something to be ashamed of the sooner you will find yourself in a position where you are able to make things happen, both for yourself and for other people. Never feel guilty about your desires.

Yes, of course you are entitled to your opinions, just like everyone else, but the value of those opinions depends on the facts on which they are based. Don’t be afraid of changing the way you look at the world if new information makes it necessary.

You want to prove yourself but that is not an excuse to make trouble. As the sun moves out of your opposite sign today you may be tempted to say and do things just to get a reaction, but it may not be the sort of reaction you expected.

You don’t need to take control of each and every situation. In fact the planets suggest quite strongly that if you let others make all the decisions today you will come out of it very well indeed. And if things do go wrong, it won’t be your fault!

The planets warn if you push yourself too hard now you will pay for it later on, so slow things down and try to get into a smooth and easy groove, especially on the work front where you cannot possibly do it all on your own.

You have so much to be thankful for and so much to look forward to, so why the long face? As the sun moves into the most dynamic area of your chart this weekend it really is time to cheer up and start making plans – the bigger the better.

The planets warn if you take on too many things this weekend you will struggle later on when, inevitably, even more chores and responsibilities come your way. Cut back on your commitments and try not to do more than one thing at a time.

Don’t let anyone tell you what you should think or how you should feel. If someone tries to poke their nose into your private affairs this weekend make the consequences painful for them. If nothing else it will deter others from trying.

A sun-Saturn link on your birthday will shine a spotlight on your career and it may well be that by this time next year you will be in a completely different line of work. Ask yourself what kind of job would bring you true satisfaction – then go for it.

A financial setback may have left you with a bit less money in your pocket but is that such a bad thing? You can be a bit of a spendthrift at times, so maybe you should take this as a reminder that cash does not grow on trees.

You may want to get along with everyone you work with but one particular individual is giving you such a hard time that it may not be possible in their case. You need to get tough with them Taurus or the situation will only get worse.

Saturn’s influence should stop you getting carried away by your own magnificence today but other people will still praise you to the skies, and with good reason. Don’t let what they say go to your head or you’ll regret it later in the week.

All things are possible for you now, but even so you still need to take other people’s wishes into account, especially on the work front where you don’t yet hold all the cards. There is more you can do with others than you can do on your own.

If you take a risk over the next 24 hours it could pay off in a big way, but it could just as easily lead to a massive loss, so think before you act and do what you so rarely do – proceed with caution! It’s really not that hard Leo.

By all means find a quiet place where you can be alone with your thoughts for a while. There is so much chatter in your life at the moment that your senses are suffering from overload. Find ways to escape the chaos and confusion.

If you say one thing in public while believing something different in private you could leave yourself open to charges of hypocrisy, or worse. Don’t tell people what you think they want to hear – tell them the truth as you see it.

It’s good that you are cautious by nature but today’s sun-Saturn link could make you so careful in what you say and do that you get nothing worthwhile either said or done! Remember, you are a free-born human being, so be free in word and deed.

If a creative project hits a wall today don’t try to force your way past it. Take it as a sign from the cosmos that you need to stand back for a while and give yourself time to think it through. It could be that changes are needed.

You are not the sort to put profit before principle and that’s good because someone will try to tempt you today. Your reputation means more to you than a few extra dollars, so tell them to find someone else to corrupt. Self-respect is everything.

What other people expect of you is of no importance – the only thing that matters is what you expect of yourself. What you are about to do may make you unpopular with the powers that be but that won’t worry you. It means you are doing something right.

Something you thought would make your life more exciting has begun to lose its lustre, and hopefully that will remind you that just because something is shiny and new does not mean it is valuable or worthwhile. All that glitters is not gold.

Try to be a bit more assertive in one-to-one relationships over the coming year, but at the same time don’t go too far and risk alienating people whose assistance you may need. Get the balance right between promoting yourself and working with others.
ARIES (March 21 - April 20):

If you are not in a particularly good mood as the new week begins try cheering yourself up by treating yourself to something nice. It does not have to be costly – there are plenty of fun things you can enjoy that don’t cost a cent.

Today’s sun-Uranus link in your sign means you are not in the mood to focus on mundane and tedious things, you need something that excites you. Let other people take care of the small stuff, especially on the work front, as you indulge your passions.

Don’t wait for others to give you permission to do things, just do them and accept that it will make a few waves. Since when have you been the sort who cares to any great extent what other people think? Be bold. Be brave. Be a true Gemini!

You may be reserved by nature but you have your moments of inspiration and if the planets are to be believed you may have several such moments today. Don’t try to ignore the passions that are raging inside you, let them all out to play.

Both in your personal affairs and on the work front you will be the center of attention today, which is exactly where you feel most at home. The sun in the career area of your chart will highlight the positive side of your nature. You were born to lead.

Someone who is as different to you personality-wise as it is possible to get will catch your eye today and it won’t be long before you form a close and enduring relationship. Will it be a romantic one? Stranger things have happened.

You seem to be enjoying more than your fair share of creative ideas at the moment, and that’s great. You do, however, need to be aware that you cannot expect other people to automatically fit in with your plans. They may have very different ideas to you.

You will be on the best of terms with everyone as the new week gets under way, but one particular individual will feel the full force of that legendary Scorpio passion. If you’re not a pair already the planets suggest you very soon will be.

You will need to juggle your commitments over the next few days, not least because you have signed up for too many things. Just make sure that everyone you have made promises to, be they personal or professional, feels they are getting value for money.

You seem to have offended a few people of late, but it’s no big deal. All you have to do is turn on the charm and make them believe that it was all a misunderstanding. You’ll get away with it this time, but next time watch what you say.

You must not allow yourself to get annoyed because once your temper starts to fray it will unravel quicker than you expected. Uranus, your ruler, warns that family-related issues could be especially challenging, so treat partners and loved ones with respect.

Be careful what you say over the next 24 hours because your words may not sound as wonderful to other people as they do to you. Try to remember that not everyone shares your rather zany sense of humor. Some people have very literal minds.

Sometimes you can be a bit too eager to help other people and end up doing things for them that they really should be doing for themselves. Keep that thought in mind this year. Sometimes the best way to help is to not do so much.

Make the most of Venus, planet of love, in your sign to let partners and relatives know how much they mean to you. You don’t have to make a big thing of your feelings but there is no harm in spelling out for them how much you care.

It will pay you to lower your sights a little today and not expect to be No. 1 in everything you do. You have absolutely nothing to prove, so don’t waste your time and energy trying to look good – because you already do.

Someone you have always been loyal to may let you down today and, not unnaturally, you won’t be too happy about it. However, it might pay you to find out what really happened – it’s quite possible it’s just a big misunderstanding.

If you need to get the attention of someone on the work front then now is the time. You will know exactly what to say and exactly how to say it for maximum effect. You will get employers and senior colleagues on your side with ease today.

It’s always a good idea to take a break occasionally and even though the week is just beginning you are strongly advised to take things easy for a bit. You will need all your energy to deal with what happens later in the week.

You may find it hard to be honest about your feelings but you should make the effort anyway as you have a great deal to offer. The problem is you don’t like to risk getting hurt – but unless you open up to life you won’t ever achieve much.

With Venus, your ruler, moving through the partnership area of your chart you won’t find it difficult to let others know how you feel, and they, in turn, will be a lot more open with you. New friendships will develop and existing friendships will grow even stronger.

Don’t sit there worrying that you may not be able to make ends meet or that your work no longer interests you – get out into the world and find reasons to be cheerful. Once you are on the move your problems are sure to disappear.

Stop pretending that you are happy with what’s going on and let everyone know how you feel. Even if you go over the top a bit – and you will – the fact that you are willing to speak up means that others will start taking you more seriously.

A friend will need a shoulder to cry on today and you will do everything in your power to console them. However, once you have got them calmed down you must then make it clear to them that they need to toughen up. Tears solve nothing.

You are in a sociable mood at the moment and that’s good because the more people you interact with the more likely it is you will discover new opportunities, both on a personal level and in your career. The world thinks you’re special – and you are.

As life is likely to get a bit hectic later in the week you are advised to take things easy while you can. It’s not just your body that needs a rest – your mind and your emotions have been through some tough times of late. Be kind to yourself.

Power relationships of one sort or another will play a large part in your life over the coming year and it’s quite likely that your own position will change dramatically. No matter what happens, be it good or bad, never forget that you are captain of your soul.

Resist the temptation to live too much of your life in the past. It’s okay to look back now and again but if you keep doing it then something is wrong. Aries is supposed to be a go-ahead sign, so get going and start creating your tomorrows today.

People you meet while out and about today could be less than helpful, so try not to get yourself in situations where you have to rely on the generosity of strangers. In fact, for best results you should stick as close to home as you can.

According to the planets you are aiming too low and the reason for that is your fears have started to get the better of you. That’s a shame because the planets indicate if you raise your sights a bit you could accomplish something amazing quite soon.

You’ve hardly had time to draw breath of late and it’s unlikely that will change over the next few days. What will change though is that a relationship will go into a kind of limbo for a while. Don’t expect too much of it for the next few weeks.

Something you have been worrying about for ages will resolve itself today, or at least appear to, and your relief will be immense. But don’t start thinking that’s the end of the matter. You should know by now that causes always have consequences.

You have the power to make far-reaching changes, but because Pluto begins one of its rare retrograde phases today it might be wise not to make too much of it. The best changes are the ones that come from evolution, not revolution.

You need to get your head around the fact that change is inevitable, and once you have managed that you will realize that worrying about change is a waste of time. Instead of trying to avoid what is changing, try using it to improve your position.

There is nothing you cannot do, nothing you cannot accomplish. Even though your ruling planet Pluto is now beginning its retrograde phase you still have the power to make things happen, simply by trusting your instincts and acting on them.

The world around you may seem chaotic at the moment but if you stand back and try to see the bigger picture today you will recognize the outlines of a design that has always been there. Your life still has, and will always have, meaning and purpose.

People are what they are and you won’t change them by wishing they were more like you. What happens today will not only remind you of that fact but also highlight what a boring world it would be if each and every one of us were the same.

According to the planets you have been pushing yourself too hard and need a rest. And not just a physical rest but a mental and emotional one too. There is only so much sensory input an Aquarius can take and you are now way past your limit.

Something dramatic will happen over the next 24 hours and while it may not be possible to say exactly what that something might be it will certainly be linked to friendships and group activities. Looks like Pisces will have to come to the rescue again!

If you are planning something big – and according to your birthday chart you are – then you need to go about it in an organized and logical way. Look ahead to how you would like things to be a year from now, then start moving step by step in that direction.

Avoid extremes today, both in your personal life and, in particular, at work. Tread especially carefully when dealing with employers and anyone else who may be in a position to harm your career. Don’t let that mouth of yours get you into trouble!

You know that something is wrong but you can’t quite put your finger on what it might be. Stop fretting about it and focus on the task that is in front of you right now. The answer will come when your mind is busy on other things.

There is a danger that you will take too much for granted and end up feeling disappointed when something doesn’t work out the way you thought it would. Also, if you come into money over the next few days save it, don’t spend it.

Someone who does not share your outlook on life will give you a hard time today, Just ignore it. Keep having fun and make sure they can see you are having fun. Annoying them with your enjoyment of life will be a lot of fun in itself.

You must not give up on something just because it is harder to master than you thought it would be. On the work front especially it will be tempting to act as if something is no longer worth your time and energy, but it is, so keep at it.

Try not to be too pushy today. The planets warn if you attempt to impose your will on other people they will react in ways that make life difficult for you. You don’t have to make demands to get others to follow you – just lead by example.

The more you do for someone the more they seem to expect of you, so you need to call a halt and let them know that from here on in they are on their own. That may sound unkind but they will benefit from it in the long-term.

Your thoughts create your world – what you think today will be your reality tomorrow – so it is of the utmost importance that you control what goes on in your mind. Strive to be positive at all times and in all situations. Above all, keep smiling.

Under no circumstances should you make claims you don’t actually know to be true. Inevitably, those claims will be challenged and if you cannot come up with the facts and figures to back them up it could be highly embarrassing.

The moon’s eclipse of Saturn in your sign means your emotions will be all over the place today. One minute you’ll be on the highest of highs and the next you’ll be on the lowest of lows. There’s not much you can do except ride it out.

You need to quit worrying about things over which you have no control. It may be that something has not gone in your favor but it’s no big deal in the greater scheme of things. Lighten up, it’s life. You can still find ways to have fun.

If someone starts laying down the law and demanding that you do things their way, your best course of action is to remove yourself from their presence. You don’t have to put up with their annoying behaviour. You don’t have to do anything.

If the pace of life seems a bit slow at the moment don’t worry, it will pick up considerably over the next 12 months. There may even be times when it gets too much and you wish it were slow and boring again. But not for long!

You should know better than to provoke someone whose power is more than a match for your own, but if you don’t then expect life to be tougher than it need have been today. Be smart and do whatever it takes to stay out of their way.

You can give your reputation a much-needed boost today by doing what needs to be done without being asked or instructed. Get your act together and make sure those above you on the professional ladder know who you are and what you can do.

You may not be able to explain how you have reached a certain conclusion but you know in your bones it is the right one, so be bold and stick with it. Not everyone will agree with you, of course, but don’t let that worry you.

Whatever negative situation you find yourself in today you can be sure that help will arrive when you need it the most, so don’t panic. Believe it or not you are being watched over by cosmic powers that won’t let you come to any great harm.

Think back to what occurred around the start of the week. Most likely you were given the opportunity to do something out of the ordinary but did not follow up on it. You are about to be given a second chance. This time you must act.

Methods and routines you have relied on for years need to be replaced – not tomorrow or the day after but right this very minute. You know what they are and you know why they need to go, so what are you waiting for? Get on with it.

Avoid arguing with people whose outlook on life differs radically from your own. Your views are so far apart that a compromise of any kind is highly unlikely. It’s no big deal though. The world would be a boring place if we all agreed.

You need to resolve any outstanding differences of opinion you may have with the people you work with. If you allow them to carry on into the weekend you could find that your social and travel plans are affected in negative ways.

You won’t have to open your mouth to let others know how you feel today – the look on your face will be more than enough to inform them that you are not in the least bit pleased. If they have got any sense they will quickly change their ways!

Focus more on the fun side of life. You can be a bit too serious at times and the planets indicate you will do yourself a lot of good if you forget about money and work for a while and just enjoy what the day brings your way.

This is an excellent time for social activities and if you make an effort to reach out to people, even strangers you meet along the way, you will have a really fun day. It could be a profitable day too as friendships bring financial opportunities.

You are being far too cautious Pisces. You need to get past what you fear and recognize that the universe will always protect you. It’s not the worst that could happen you should be focusing on now but the best. Take a chance on life.

If you are not happy with the direction your life is taking then it’s up to you to pick a new course. On just about every level you will have the power to change things over the coming year, not just for yourself but for those who depend on you too.

You will come alive again over the next few days. That get-up-and-go that got up and went will be back with a vengeance and before you know it you will be cruising along as if there had never been anything holding you back. It’s good to be free.

You need to get past some sort of obstacle or obstruction and with mind planet Mercury moving into your sign today that should not be too much of a problem. Show those who say you are too inflexible to change just how wrong they can be.

There is a danger that you could get too obsessive about something that isn’t really of any great importance. By all means fight for some kind of cause but don’t turn it into a life or death struggle, because it’s really not worth the effort.

You need to be more positive about a relationship. If you let your negative thoughts about it get the upper hand you could actually cause the sort of breakdown you are so desperate to avoid. Thoughts are very real things, and always have consequences.

You would prefer life to be less complicated but the fact is you are where you are and it doesn’t look as if much is going to change for a while. You can though start making plans, the kind of big plans that only a Leo would dare to consider.

You need to make a conscious effort to break free of the mental and emotional bonds you have imposed on yourself. No one can do it for you Virgo, so get your act together and start looking at the events of your life as an opportunity, not a burden.

You will have words today with someone who is about as different to you in outlook as it is possible to get. No matter how robust your exchange of views may be you both have a story to tell, so speak up – but remember to listen as well.

Like everyone else you are good at some things and not so good at others, and cosmic activity in your opposite sign will not only help you get to grips with that fact but make it possible to get assistance from those who can do things that you can’t.

The most important thing over the next few days is that you don’t let fear hold you back from doing the things you most want to do. Forget about what the neighbours might say and do what feels right to you personally. Nothing else matters.

Someone will try to stop you doing what you enjoy today but it’s up to you whether they succeed or not. Cosmic activity in the most dynamic area of your chart encourages you to follow your own path – but there are limits beyond which even you cannot go.

You should find it easier to get your message across about family issues now that Mercury, planet of communication, is moving into the domestic area of your chart. Once loved ones know what you think, encourage them to speak up as well.

You may be somewhat vocal in your opinions today and not everyone will be happy about it, but don’t let that prevent you from speaking your mind. Too many people have been trying to evade the truth for too long a time. Shake things up a bit.

Take a few minutes out from your birthday celebrations to ask yourself what you would most like to accomplish over the coming 12 months. Keep it short and simple and make sure you write it down. A year from now your “wish list” will be a reality.

You are perfectly within your rights to refuse a request if you don’t believe it is the correct thing to do. Even if you owe someone a favor that does not mean you have to give them what they ask for. Your needs must come first – always.

If you use your imagination this week you can find ways to make the creative side of your nature pay. That may be “pay” in the financial sense, or it may be “pay” in the more general sense of improving your standing in the world at large.

There is a danger that you are becoming too generous with people who don’t really deserve it. You have never expected something for nothing in life so why should you let other people expect it of you? Get rid of the freeloaders Gemini!

The sun in the friendship area of your chart makes it easy to get along with people you meet socially and in the course of your work. Even if you are quite different in terms of personality you will find things that bring you together.

Generally speaking you don’t like it when others depend on you too much, not least because it limits your own options, but this week you will quite enjoy the fact that someone needs your assistance with something. Show them how it should be done.

You will get through a lot of work this week without working up much of a sweat. If you can clear the backlog of jobs that have built up recently you can start next week with a clear slate – a very nice feeling indeed.

There may be times this week when you believe that others don’t really mean what they say, but why should that worry you? They can say what they like but there is nothing they can do to force you to act. You’re still your own boss.

Let others make the first move this week, especially if you are hoping to travel together or meet friends in a social situation. Any suggestions you come up with will most likely be rejected, so let them do the thinking and the planning.

You won’t hesitate to help someone who needs assistance this week but you must also make it clear to them that this is a one-off and that you won’t be there for them every time, or even the next time. They need to take responsibility for themselves.

The more you give this week the more you will get in return. Put your competitive instincts on hold for a few days and make it your one and only aim to make other people feel good. It will make you feel good as well.

There is no point taking on someone who is clearly stronger and better connected than you. Admit to yourself that on this occasion the sensible course of action is to back off. Don’t think of it as a defeat, think of it as a strategic retreat.

You like to look confident, but something has been bothering you to such an extent that you are having a hard time keeping up appearances. Let it go. Forget about it. You only give it power because you think about it so much.

Jupiter’s influence on your birthday suggests you will be tempted to throw caution to the wind and do something that has never been done before. Instead, how about doing something you have done before, only to a much higher standard?

If you have your doubts about a scheme that everyone seems to think is wonderful then you must speak up. Chances are you are not the only one who feels uncomfortable about it, so say what is on your mind and start a much-needed debate.

Do what you feel like doing, not what other people feel you should be doing. Too many times in the past you have gone along with what the crowd demanded because you did not want to rock the boat. Now rock it as hard as you can!

Like it or not you have to accept that other people are calling the shots at the moment. There is no point sulking about it – instead, do what they ask of you but in such a way that your needs are met first and foremost.

Go some place different and do something different over the coming week. It’s always easy to hang around the same old haunts and do the same old things but there is an adventurous side to the Cancer nature that for too long has been denied.

The sun, your ruler, makes a difficult link to Jupiter, planet of excess, today, so there is a danger that you will go over the top in some way – and, yes, you will regret it later on. You cannot control other people but you can control yourself.

Either start something new today or relaunch something that has already been started but, for one reason or another, has been in limbo for quite some time. It’s never too late to pick up on an old plan, especially if it’s a good plan.

You may think that you need to act fast and that if you don’t get the ball rolling right this very minute you will lose out in some way, but it isn’t true. The planets urge you to wait a while and watch how matters develop. Don’t rush.

This is a great day for meeting up with people who share your general outlook on life. Together you will be able to do things that you might not have been able to do on your own. You will accomplish so much – and have a great deal of fun.

You may be eager to climb the ladder of success but watch out. Today’s sun-Jupiter link warns it may not be as easy as it looks, especially if you are the sort of Sagittarius who rarely plans ahead. Tailor your aims to suit your abilities.

Anything to do with art or other creative activities should go well for you now, but you need to make sure that your imagination is under control. Don’t get carried away with ideas and visions that are so far out they can never come true.

You need to be brutally honest today, both with yourself and with other people. Ask yourself if what you are working on can ever truly be a success. If the answer is “yes” then carry on. But if the answer is “no” then end it right now.

What a friend or family member suggests may sound enticing but the planets warn it won’t be as simple as they make it sound. If you get carried away with “what ifs” and other flights of fancy today reality is sure to bring you crashing down.

Travel plans and social arrangements are unlikely to run smoothly over the coming 12 months. What are the planets trying to tell you by this? That you need to stay where you are and sort out personal issues rather than try to run away from them.

As Saturn begins one of its retrograde phases today you would be well advised to hold off making any major decisions, in particular about your career. The only thing you can be certain of is that nothing is for certain, at least for now.

The answer to a problem that has been nagging at you for weeks will pop into your head at some point today and no doubt you will be delighted. Be careful though. The planets warn there could be more than a bit of wishful thinking involved.

Sometimes the best way to deal with a troublesome issue is to pretend it does not exist, and if you do that today then the rest of the week should be worry free. You will, of course, have to deal with it eventually but don’t think of that now.

Do whatever it takes to stay on good terms with the people around you today because if you fall out in any way it could be difficult making up with them again, especially if they are as stubborn as you! Don’t let petty issues divide you.

You may not believe in miracles as such but there have been a number of strange coincidences of late that make you wonder if you are being watched over by a higher power. Someone – or “something” – up there definitely likes you Leo!

You will rediscover your enthusiasm for a plan or project that faded in importance a while back, which is good, but you must not let it take up all of your time. Do you really need to revisit it, or is it just a way to avoid something else?

No one can force you to do things against your will but you are certainly open to persuasion. Someone who knows how your mind works will make the right noises today but you must check that what they tell you is true. What are the facts?

Don’t even think that you can solve a problem by running away from it. That may have been possible in the past but it isn’t possible now, so face up to what seems to be going wrong and find ways to put it right. Use your imagination.

According to the planets you are either a lot richer or a lot poorer than you thought and with luck it will be the former, but if it isn’t you will have to adjust your spending habits. Do you really need to possess so many luxury items?

Saturn, your ruler, begins its retrograde phase today, so something that has been moving along quite smoothly may come to an unexpected stop. Take that as a sign you need to look at what you are doing more closely. Could you be doing it some other way?

You have never been the sort to stand there and take it while other people criticize you but you may have to do just that today. The fact is they have a point, if not several, and you need to accept that fact, learn from it, and make changes.

You won’t hesitate to speak your mind over the coming year and for the most part what you have to say will be treated with respect. Make sure everything you say is uplifting in some way, even on the rare occasion when you find it necessary to be critical.

You won’t be much in the mood for work today and there really is no point doing things you have no interest in. Give yourself permission to take life at a slow and easy pace and let others do the heavy lifting. You owe yourself a break.

The new moon will do wonders for your confidence this coming weekend but between now and then you are advised not to challenge yourself to any great extent. Save yourself, mentally and physically, for when your efforts will be most effective.

Someone will make out they have been hard done by today but you must have none of it. If they’ve had problems it’s because they ignored your advice and pushed ahead with something you knew would not work. It’s their fault if it hurts.

You must not let people you live or work with tie you down to promises and timetables today. Be vague about where you are going and what you are doing so they can’t back you into a corner from which you have no escape.

Mercury, planet of communication, is well placed in your chart at the moment but it is also at odds with Saturn, planet of authority – a clear cosmic warning to steer clear of arguments with people in positions of power. Why? Because you will lose.

You may want to make a good impression but that is not an excuse, still less an invitation, to cut corners and break rules. Just be who you are and do what you do best and that should be enough to get you noticed for the right reasons.

The planets warn you could be “seeing” things that do not exist outside the confines of your own overactive imagination. Try to stand outside yourself and observe what’s going on from a neutral position. Most likely nothing bad is happening at all.

A friend or family member will say something today that surprises you, not least because it never occurred to you that they might see things that way. Maybe it’s your fault for having too narrow a focus. Try recognizing that it’s not all about you.

Don’t be surprised if some of the people you deal with today are a bit evasive in their answers. It doesn’t mean they have done something wrong, it means they don’t like you probing them about their personal affairs. Which is perfectly fair.

You should know by now that if you try to solve the same type of problem with the same type of solution you will fail in the same way as you did before. You need to up your game Capricorn, and that means finding new ways to win.

The more cold water a critic pours on your plans today the more determined you must be to stick with them. The fact that they are being so negative suggests they are seriously worried that you will show them up. And they’re right, you will.

You seem to be in two minds at the moment about how best to make use of your time and your energy. What you eventually choose to do is of less importance than that you actually make a decision and stick to it. Focus is essential.

Something you feel strongly about will be challenged over the next few months and you will need to react in a way that shows you won’t be silenced or denied. You have something important to say and you have every right to be heard.

As Mercury in your sign squares up to power planet Pluto today you will find that in some areas you are able to set the agenda but in other areas you can only react to events. Either way you will have plenty to do, so be prepared!

The most important thing today is that you avoid wishful thinking, because you will most likely be disappointed if you expect fantastic things to occur. Make sure your aims are well-defined and make sure you know what you are talking about.

What you discover over the next 24 hours may be unsettling but it will also make you aware that some of the things you profess to believe in may not be as cut and dried as you thought. Try not to be quite so rigid in your thinking.

Before you make any sort of offer, to friends or business partners or people in positions of authority, you must make sure you can deliver. Pluto in your opposite sign warns that others won’t be amused if what you say falls short of what you can do.

It seems that someone has taken a shine to you and will do whatever it is you ask of them. That may set your mind, and your pulse, racing but don’t go over the top. You’ll stay in their good books longer if you don’t ask for the world.

Mercury, your ruler, is under a fair bit of cosmic pressure at the moment, so be on your guard and don’t be surprised if someone you thought was on your side goes over to the opposition. It’s nothing personal – everyone is a bit mixed up at the moment.

The more someone tries to persuade you to do things their way the more you should ask yourself what’s in it for them. Cosmic activity in your opposite sign of Aries means others are sure to put their own needs first. Be aware of that fact.

You have no option but to knuckle down and complete what you started. There may be a dozen more interesting things you would rather be doing but the fact is there is one, and only one, thing that must be done. Do it now and do it right.

If you are planning to start something new over the next few days then you need to plan it in as much detail as possible. Saturday’s new moon will help you but it will go better if you are clear in your mind what it is you are after.

Other people will make all kinds of demands on you over the next few days and you won’t want to disappoint them. That’s good. If you assist them now you will be in a much stronger position to make a few demands of your own later on.

Your powers of persuasion may be formidable but with communications planet Mercury under a fair bit of pressure at the moment even you will find it hard to get your own way. Just accept that some people will never share your ideals.

Although you may receive good news concerning a money matter today you are still not out of the financial woods, so don’t take it as an excuse to go on a spree. If anything you need to be selling the things you don’t need, not buying more.

Go your own way and do your own thing over the coming year – and if certain individuals don’t like it then do it some more! You have done some good things for other people over the past 12 months or so – now do something good for yourself.

If you have been thinking about taking a risk of some kind then do so today. With luck planet Jupiter firmly on your side you will probably win, but even if you lose it’s unlikely the consequences will be too bad. It’s really not much of a gamble.

Not only is the sun moving through your birth sign but with a new moon approaching as well you stand an excellent chance of success, whatever it is you choose to do. With that fact in mind why not choose to do something spectacular?

Go out of your way to help someone in need. The planets suggest that if you show your generous side over the next 24 hours the universe will be generous to you in the very near future – not that you will be looking for reward, of course.

The planets suggest this is one of those rare occasions when you can say what you please and get away with it. Today’s Mercury-Jupiter link is especially good for work-related matters, so speak up if you think the powers that be are doing it wrong.

If you honestly believe that you should be getting more in the way of rewards and applause then now is the time to press your claim. Important people are very much on your side at the moment, so make sure they know what you’ve been up to.

You don’t need anyone’s permission to follow what your instincts tell you to do. Today’s Mercury-Jupiter link and tomorrow’s new moon will encourage you to be bold in thought, word and deed. Go for it Virgo – and you are sure to get it.

You like to be generous but there are times when you go too far, give too much away, and give others the idea that you will always be there for them. You know that isn’t possible, so stop promising what you may not be able to deliver.

Before you go charging to someone’s rescue today make sure they want to be rescued. It could be the case that they are not in any great trouble at all, which could be embarrassing for you when your gallant entry is met with looks of disbelief.

You are in a forceful mood and unlikely to take “no” for an answer, but you need to be aware that your overbearing attitude could rub certain people the wrong way. Worse, they could be the very people whose support you are going to need.

The next two or three days should be good for you. Whatever you may have achieved in the past you can achieve something even better now, so aim high, believe you can make a difference, and get out there and engage with the world.

Highly positive cosmic activity in the domestic area of your chart promises that good things will happen over the next two or three days if you reach out to the people you love. Forget about past differences – it’s what unites you now that matters.

If you have something to say then speak up and make sure you get heard. Too often in the past you were a bit too timid and your voice was drowned out by noisier individuals. Your message is too important to be overlooked – so start shouting!

A new moon on your birthday spells success. It’s that simple. Decide what it is you most want from life, then get out into the world and make it happen. Your head and your heart are in perfect alignment, and the universe is very much on your side.

If you start something new this weekend you must make sure you can afford to see it through to the end. If money is tight you might like to consider other options that don’t cost so much. You can do just as much on a smaller budget.

Today’s new moon will encourage you to pull out the stops and really go for it. Others may say you are going to extremes, and maybe you are, but it won’t worry you in the slightest. As far as you are concerned it’s about having fun.

There is something you need to deal with and you need to deal with it now, immediately, this very moment. You may have avoided the issue a number of times in the past but you cannot avoid it today, so get your act together and get on with it.

Chances are you will say something today that causes a bit of an uproar, but the fact is it needs to be said and it needs to be you who is doing the saying. There is only one thing worse than censorship and that is self-censorship.

Even if you are one of those rare Leos who like to keep a low profile you will be putting yourself about this weekend and letting important people know who you are and what you can do. The new moon is sure to bring new opportunities.

It’s not like you to be so outspoken but you have something to say and you intend to make sure your voice gets heard. You won’t care in the slightest that some people might be hurt by your words – as far as you are concerned only the truth matters.

Take a bit more notice of what is going on in the world around you. You can learn a lot from what other people say and do, and from the mistakes they make, and the more you learn now the more you will prosper in the near future.

Today’s new moon will throw up some interesting possibilities and perhaps the most interesting of them all will be a new friendship. You will form an instant bond with someone who, while different in many ways, complements your Scorpio nature.

If there is a task you have been ignoring in the hope that someone else might do it for you then, sadly, you are out of luck. The cosmic powers that be will insist that you see it through to the end – so you may as well get started!

Most things are coming easily to you now but that is not an excuse to take your foot off the gas and coast at a comfortable speed. At this time of year more than most you have the potential to accomplish something remarkable, so push yourself harder.

If you need to resolve a crisis of some kind now is the time to get people together and discuss what needs to be done. You must though keep your personal feelings out of it. A logical and fair-minded approach is not an option but a must.

It’s unlikely you will be able to focus to any great extent on everyday chores, not when there are so many wonderful things going on in your world. Socially this is one of the best weekends of the year for having fun. So go for it!

A Mars-Pluto link on your birthday means you are determined to make something of yourself in the wider world. To get where you most want to go you will have to be ruthless with yourself. But be kind to other people – it’s always good politics.

What you need to remember today is that while talent is a good thing to have nothing beats commitment. You’ve got what it takes – of that there is no doubt – but do you have the staying power to see what you are doing through to success?

Others can get involved in plots and schemes if they want to but you know it’s best to steer clear of that kind of thing. If you don’t, the upcoming full moon will find ways to remind you to mind your own business, not other people’s.

The planets urge you to finish what you started before taking on anything new. No matter how desperate you may be to make a good impression the most important thing is to get on top of your workload while you have the chance. That means right now.

Focus your energies in a single direction over the next 24 hours. If others try to get you to do more just refuse. The planets warn it will be all too easy to waste time on non-essentials, so list your priorities and then tick them off one by one.

If you find yourself getting into an argument with someone who is clearly better informed than you then find a way out of it before you make a fool of yourself. You may have strong convictions but how will they hold up when confronted by facts?

You have never been the sort to give in to intimidation and that’s good because as the full moon draws closer you may find that some people start throwing their weight around. Let them say what they want to say, then just smile and walk away.

If you come on too strong or make too many complaints over the next two or three days you could turn important people against you, which in turn could damage your earning power. Yes, they may be a pain, but learn to put up with them.

Something that starts out simple could develop into something a lot more complicated today, so keep a cool head and, most importantly of all, keep your eyes and ears open. You may find yourself having to help people who are not as clued in as you.

You may be able to see the funny side of what’s going on but not everyone shares your offbeat sense of humour, so don’t be surprised if you get some less than positive looks when you laugh out loud. Some people just can’t take a joke.

You must not let your emotions get the better of you today, because once you start down that route you may not be able to turn back. No matter how upsetting a scene may be you must force yourself to look at it in a dispassionate and logical way.

Give yourself a break Aquarius. You don’t have to be on the go all the time. Stand back from the chaos that is taking place all around you and just be a spectator for a while. If nothing else you’ll get a better sense of perspective than most people.

It’s quite likely that your past will catch up with you over the next few days but the good news is it won’t cause you too much embarrassment. Friends and loved ones have far more important things to worry about than your minor indiscretions.

No matter how emotional or irrational certain people may get over the coming year you must stay calm at all times and in all situations. With Mercury moving into your sign on your birthday your most potent weapon will be common sense. Use it well.

Mars, your ruler, will encourage you to be assertive as the new week begins and that’s a good thing. You need to push your own interests a little more forcefully than you have done of late – on the work front, of course, but in your private life, too.

Don’t worry too much if you seem to have lost your way recently because with mind planet Mercury moving into your sign today you will soon be on top of things again. What you thought was a major problem will turn out to have a simple solution.

Mars remains in your sign only until the middle of next week, so make the most of it. Decide which of your many ambitions means the most to you, then go after it with everything you’ve got. Success is not a matter of IF but WHEN. Make it NOW!

Relax. Take it easy. Don’t wear yourself out. There may be a dozen and one things you think you need to do but nothing is as important as keeping your body and mind in good working order – and that means being kind to yourself.

You are not responsible for the world and its woes, so stop letting every little thing that goes wrong get to you and try enjoying life for a change. It might help if you switched off the news for a day, or even a week. Avoid doom and gloom.

Say what you have to say today but say it in a way that does not antagonize those on the receiving end of your words. You can at times be a bit too critical, so try looking at people’s good points rather than their bad this coming week.

You may be impatient to be on the move but there is something that you need to take care of close to home, and if you don’t do something about it now it will nag at you all week. Focus on what has to be done – and do it!

Do you have the confidence to take control of a situation that is getting out of hand, and show the leadership skills to bring it back under control? Of course you do. Be decisive and make sure everyone knows that you are the boss.

Mars in the partnership area of your chart means you will encounter some forceful people over the next few days and the threat of falling out with them will never be far away. But now that you know that you will be less confrontational – won’t you?

A little bit of effort will go a long way today, and it will go further still if you put some serious thought into what you are doing. Too often you switch to automatic mode and go through the motions. Focus on being present in every moment.

You may be the sort who prefers to forgive and forget but today the universe will demand of you that you counter a wrong with a right. Some things are too important to just forget about, even if it means getting tough with someone you love.

Even if the questions you ask over the next 24 hours are simple it’s unlikely you will get any straightforward answers. Does that mean that people are trying to deceive you? Maybe, but more likely it means they are just utterly confused themselves.
