Now that Mars is moving into the area of your chart that governs what you own and what you earn you will find that matters of a financial nature will be on your mind a lot more than usual. Just remember it’s not all about dollars and cents.

Don’t follow the herd Virgo, do your own thing. In recent weeks there have been times when it seemed as if the whole world was against you but somehow you survived and now you will thrive. Trust your own instincts and go it alone.

What happens over the next 48 hours may be unsettling and may even plant a seed of doubt in your mind, but there is actually very little to worry about. Try spending a bit less time socializing and a bit more time exploring your own thoughts.

You will deal with a crisis of some sort with the minimum of fuss this weekend – if there is one thing Scorpio does well it is staying calm in times of trouble. Avoid petty issues and petty people though – you have more important things to deal with.

Don’t try to do everything in one mad rush over the next 48 hours. That applies doubly on the work front, where the planets warn that a rival is hoping you will slip up and make him or her look good at your expense. Don’t let it happen.

You will enjoy yourself if you are on the move this weekend. If you are in a position to take a short vacation then don’t hesitate – it is sure to be eventful in the best possible way. If you have to stay close to home at least start making plans.

You will need to find a balance between your work and your social life over the coming 12 months. By all means go out and have as much fun as you can handle but don’t forget you have commitments too. There will always be those who depend on you.

You won’t know for certain how to get a job done until you make a start and see where it takes you. Fortunately, you are the sort of person who enjoys a challenge, so roll up your sleeves and get stuck in – not tomorrow or next week, but now!

It may at times feels as if the world is against you but it isn’t true and as the cosmic picture shifts in your favour this week your outlook on life will change for the better. Believe you have what it takes to succeed – and you surely will.

It’s not that you made a mistake that matters so much as you tried to pretend, both to yourself and to other people, that you did not. Everyone gets it wrong sometimes – yes, even a Gemini – so own your error and then put it right.

If a partnership seems a bit too restrictive then maybe you should end it. That may seem ruthless but deep down you know the time has come for a radical adjustment in your personal life, one that puts you at the centre of things rather than other people.

If you feel that you are in some way out of your depth then ask for assistance. The real problem, of course, is that you don’t like others to know that you cannot handle everything yourself – you think it shows weakness. No Leo, it doesn’t, so get help.

Your interest in a project you appeared to give up on a while back will be rekindled over the next few days and this time you should have the self-belief, and the know-how, to make a success of it. It’s all about timing Virgo – so do it now!

Your self-belief may take a dive over the next few days as the planets start to emphasize the area of your chart that governs your fears and your feelings. Don’t try to avoid the difficult questions your mind starts asking – embrace them and seek out the answers.

Your freedom to come and go as you please has been hampered of late but over the next few days the bonds that have held you back will start to loosen a bit. Just don’t go mad and start acting as if there are no restraints at all.

Try not to let annoying people get under your skin as the new week begins. Keep telling yourself that your success depends entirely on you and that you can safely ignore the critics and cynics. Their negativity means they fear you could succeed.

Whatever happens over the next few days, be it good, bad or indifferent, you must continue to believe that in the long-term everything will work out right. The way you choose to look at the world to a large extent determines what kind of world you see.

You of all people should know that nothing stays the same forever, nor should you want it to. Your revolutionary spirit has not been much in evidence of late and over the next few days you need to rediscover what you used to be so passionate about.

They say that what does not destroy you makes you stronger and over the coming weeks you will get to see if that is true. Whatever trials and tribulations you face you must remember that they will be less of a trial if you face them with friends.

You may prefer to trust what people tell you rather than be doubtful or cynical but your birthday chart warns you must check facts and figures for yourself. Hopefully your honesty will be matched by their honesty but you can’t take that for granted.

Try not to dwell on minor problems to such an extent that you build them up in your mind to major levels. In the greater scheme of things everything is progressing exactly as it should, so stop worrying and start smiling. Find reasons to be happy.

It seems you have been so busy pointing out the mistakes other people have made that you somehow overlooked the fact that you’ve made a few of your own. Look in the mirror today and be honest about what you see. Then start making changes.

There is no need to rush things today, not even if there is a task that needs to be done as quickly as possible. Quality is always more important than quantity and you will somehow find the time you need to make a good job of it.

Life is too short to waste time worrying about who is for you and who is against you, so put that kind of nonsense out of your head and follow your heart wherever it leads you. Act with confidence and in time even your critics will love you.

Someone you thought was a friend will try to take advantage of your generous nature either today or tomorrow and you won’t be too pleased about it. But don’t get angry. In fact, if you can, give them what it is they desire. Rise above pettiness.

Yes, you have a way with words, but before you open your mouth today you should think long and hard about what you are going to say. How you say it will be important, too. If you must be critical add a dash of praise as well.

You may be tempted to push yourself extra hard today – especially if you have a deadline to meet – but the planets warn that might not be a good idea. Start the week at a leisurely pace and build up speed as you go along. Deadlines can wait.

It may seem as if everyone but you has been having fun of late, but don’t worry about it. By the time the sun moves in your favour again on Thursday you will be the one with a smile on your face and the wind in your hair!

It’s quite likely that you will encounter fierce opposition to what you intend to do today but don’t let that stop you. Keep your eye on the prize and keep moving relentlessly forward. Don’t stop for anyone, not even those you love.

This should be a good week for you socially but there is a danger you could spend far too much money on luxury items and have to cut back on essentials later on. There are ways to have fun without breaking the bank – well, your bank at least.

Your powers of persuasion are high at the moment, so if there are things that you need don’t hesitate to let others know about it. Nothing comes for free, of course, but if you ask nicely there is a very good chance you will get a sizeable discount.

Try not to let your excitement for a new plan or project show today, because you need time to get it off the ground properly before other people start getting involved. You will get more done over the next 24 hours if you mainly work alone.

You may be hugely ambitious, and that’s good, but you also need to recognize that you won’t always be able to get your own way. Try being a bit more laidback about your career goals this year. There are so many other ways you can enjoy yourself.

If someone tries to take liberties with you today you must not let them get away with it. Cosmic activity in the area of your chart that governs your standing in the world demands that you talk and act tough. Your reputation depends on it.

If you lock horns with someone who turns out to be bigger or better connected than you today it may pay you to back off a bit and let them know it’s really no big deal. The planets warn you need to choose your battles carefully.

If you react to some kind of provocation today, you could quickly find yourself at a disadvantage. Don’t play into your rivals’ hands by getting worked up about issues that, in the greater scheme of things, are really quite trivial in nature.

A clash of wills may be inevitable today as Mars links with the sun in a less than helpful way. Be patient with people who annoy you by saying one thing and then doing another. They want you to get angry, it’s part of their plan.

Be prepared for a certain amount of stress today, especially on the work front where some of your colleagues are clearly not up to whatever tasks you are working on together. But don’t do it all yourself. They need to improve their game.

This is a good day for getting things done but you must not make promises you won’t be able to keep. It is no doubt flattering that others believe you can work wonders but don’t forget you have limits like everyone else. You’re human Virgo!

If you let your anger get the better of you today it could be you who suffers the most as a result. As one of those pleasant, balanced Libra types people expect you to stay calm and won’t be impressed if you lose your head.

Don’t just sit back and let things happen – get out into the world and make them happen. The sun leaves the career area of your chart on Thursday, so use the next 48 hours to push ahead on the work front. It’s impossible to be too ambitious.

If someone questions your ambition and desire today you will of course do everything in your power to show you are still on track for success. Just be careful you don’t overdo it and damage yourself physically. You’re flesh and blood like everyone else.

Mars in your sign makes it easy for you to open up and let the world know what you think but others influences warn if you say too much it could cost you financially. Never let potential rivals know what your tactics are likely to be.

You may have a soft spot for someone but it seems you are the only one. Don’t be surprised if friends and family try to pressure you to cut ties with them today – for your own good, of course. It’s your call to make and it won’t be easy.

You may be surprised by what happens today, and delighted. No matter how many times you have fallen out with certain people of late they will now rally round and help you hit whatever target it is you are aiming for. They’re still on your side.

You need to define what you want most from life. For too long you have been drifting without an obvious goal and it is beginning to get you down. What is your highest ideal? How can you change the world for the better? Answer those questions, then act.

Spread your workload around as much as you can today. If you try to do it all on your own you will exhaust yourself and actually fall further behind. Get partners and colleagues to do some of the heavy stuff for you – it’s what they’re there for!

The more you push yourself now the more you will benefit over the next month or so. You have been grappling with some serious issues of late and it’s not always been easy for you, but as from tomorrow a pattern will begin to emerge.

Partners and loved ones may be difficult to get along with today but you must not let it get to you. They can approach life with a negative attitude if they so wish but you have no intention of doing likewise. The world is still a wonderful place.

It’s time to get serious about a relationship that until now you have approached in a lighthearted manner. It can still be fun, of course, but you need to start asking yourself what you can do to make your time together more productive.

If you have been wasteful with money in recent weeks you will soon have to look for ways to balance the books. The planets warn you are getting near the point where what comes in may not be able to cover what goes out. Start making savings!

You know what you want and you know how to get it, so all you have to do now is get on with it. Right? It won’t, of course, be quite that simple but once the sun moves into your birth sign tomorrow you can start making serious progress.

You may think that your life is tough but if you take a look around you will realize that compared to most people you’ve got it quite easy. Stop feeling hard done by and find ways to help yourself – and in doing so help others too.

A friend or work colleague will give you some excellent advice today but because it isn’t what you want to hear you may ignore it. That’s fine, of course, but don’t go running to them for sympathy if it goes wrong. You won’t get it!

You will be put to the test over the next few days, especially on the work front where you will be expected to take on more responsibility, whether you want it or not. Throw yourself into the situation and don’t doubt for a moment that you will succeed.

Everyone makes mistakes – yes, even a Capricorn – so don’t beat yourself up about something that recently went wrong. If you expect perfection of yourself you are sure to be disappointed. Aim for mere excellence instead – you know you can do that!

If something you value is taken from you today don’t rant and rage about it. Find out why it happened and, most importantly, what you can do differently next time to stop it happening again. Turn a short-term loss into a long-term gain.

If you fall out with someone at home or at work you must – repeat, must – make up with them quickly, if possible by the end of the day. The sun’s move into the relationship area of your chart tomorrow means you cannot afford to let feuds fester.

There will be times this year when you wonder if the world has finally gone crazy. Maybe it has but that does not mean you have to act in foolish or fanatical ways as well. Stay calm on the inside and don’t let the outside world affect you.

The sun in Leo over the past few weeks has done wonders for your confidence (not that it needed much of a boost) but now you must slow things down a bit and pay more attention to the specifics of what you are working on. Details matter.

The sun moves into the sympathetic sign of Virgo today, marking the start of what should be one of those most creative and productive times of the year. Put any failures and disappointments you might have suffered behind you. The future is bright.

Now that the focus of your solar chart is moving toward feelings and affections you need to open up and let others know what is going on in your heart. Don’t keep family members at arm’s length any more, let them get as close as they like.

No matter how busy you may be at the moment you must make time for social activities of one sort or another. The more of an effort you make to mix with people from all walks of life the more your own life will benefit. It’s all good.

Try to be a bit more selective about how you use your time and energy. In recent weeks, while the sun was moving through your sign, you did so many things on the spur of the moment, but now you need more structure to your activities.

As the sun moves into your sign today you will start to feel on a deep inner level that the world is full of opportunities. Nothing is beyond you. Nothing is out of reach. Aim as high as you can, then aim a little higher each and every day.

Make time today to look back over the past four weeks or so and evaluate what you have learned both about yourself and other people. Most likely you will come to the conclusion that friendships are the key to what makes the world go round.

You have never been one to follow the accepted way of doing things and you have no intention of changing your ways now. If others want to play by the book today that’s fine, let them get on with it. It makes it easier for you to be different.

Even if you are the sort of Sag who could not care less about climbing the ladder of material success you can still be ambitious in other ways. What happens over the next few days will inspire you to make your mark on the world. Go for it!

Cosmic activity in one of the more positive areas of your chart will bring the adventurous side of your nature to the fore today. Don’t hesitate to strike out in a completely new direction – you could end up in the land of your dreams!

Before making changes to a business arrangement of some kind make sure you get expert advice from a trusted source. There could be a lot more than money at stake, so make sure you don’t make any silly and avoidable mistakes.

You will be confronted by a situation that forces you to compromise. You may not be happy about it but the fact is you are up against forces that are too strong to oppose. You can still strike a good deal but it may not be the deal you envisioned.

The only way you are going to create the amazing life you dream of is by getting rid of all the emotional and mental baggage that is holding you back. A brave new future is yours for the asking – IF you can let go of the past.

Someone will point out where you have been going wrong today and you probably won’t be too happy about it. Be that as it may you would be wise to listen to what they have to tell you. Don’t let your ego override common sense.

Forget about pleasing other people and do what seems best for you. The approaching full moon is likely to bring a certain amount of opposition from people who appear to believe you exist solely to benefit them. It’s time you put them right!

Your judgment could be a bit off today, so if you are thinking of making changes of one sort or another it might be wise to wait a while. Everything that is meant to happen will happen in its own good time, so don’t push too hard.

A situation that you find funny may be no laughing matter to friends and work colleagues, so be careful what you say and do. It might be a good idea to at least pretend you share their serious outlook, even if you want to laugh out loud.

There will be times over the next few days when you come dangerously close to panic but there is actually precious going on in your life that you need to be worried about. Slow down, calm down and stay in control. You’re jumping at shadows!

The sun in your sign gives you no end of confidence but as the moon is nearing its full phase, it’s quite likely that a relationship issue will come to a head and in some way upset you. Don’t lose your grip Virgo – it’s really no big deal.

Promise yourself now, this very moment, that whatever happens today and over the weekend you won’t overreact. So long as you stay calm and refuse to get caught up in the general feeling of hysteria there is precious little that can hurt you.

No matter what happens over the next 24 hours, friends and family will rally round and help you feel good about life. Not that you should be feeling bad at all, as compared to most people your fortunes are clearly on the up. So smile!

The approaching full moon cuts across the home/work axis of your chart, which suggests you need to find a better balance between the two. It’s good to be a success, of course, but ultimately it’s still love that makes the world go round.

It’s not often you let down your hair and act as if you just don’t care but now the sun is moving through the most adventurous area of your chart you may well go over the top. You can worry about the consequences later – or not!

Your cash-flow situation could be better but it could also be worse, so stop worrying that the sky is about to fall and enjoy what the day has to offer. Always live in the present moment, because you can’t change the past or control the future.

The approaching full moon will make it abundantly clear that you need to make some pretty big changes in your life. A plan or project you once had high hopes for is no longer worth the time or the effort. Ditch it and move on to something better.

Both Saturn and Uranus are strong on your birthday this year, which suggests you are now at a major crossroads. What you do is less important than how you choose to do it, so identify your goal, then go after it with all your body and soul.

Anything of a professional nature should go well for you now, but it will go even better if you let go of old-fashioned ideas and methods and try something new. Show those who doubt you that you have what it takes to be a serious player.

Something that has been worrying you for ages will no longer get under your skin as from today. No doubt you will be a bit concerned that you allowed your fears to get out of hand but you overcame them eventually. Better late than never.

You may think you are above petty jealousies and squabbles, but the planets warn you could easily get involved in a feud that on most other occasions you would avoid like the plague. Strive to keep your more extreme emotions under control.

Lady Luck is smiling on you now and you have every right to make the most of it. Don’t listen to those who say you don’t deserve your good fortune because they have no idea what they are talking about. On the contrary, no one deserves it more.

The most important thing this weekend is that you make sure at all times that it is your aims you are working toward and not other people’s. That does not mean you should not help them when you can but you must help yourself first.

Yes, it would appear that someone is being deliberately obstructive at the moment but that does not mean they should be thought of as an enemy. It seems they honestly believe they are slowing you down for your own good. Maybe they’re right!

If you deal in anything but rock solid facts today you could be setting yourself up for a serious fall. Steer clear of gossip and rumour and don’t think you need to exaggerate to make yourself look big. You’re already as big as you need to be.

Spell out in words of three syllables or less what it is you expect of other people. If you fail to do that there will be no end of confusion and no end to accusations that you deliberately made your message hard to understand.

You seem strangely reluctant to give orders at the moment. Why is that? Maybe it is because you don’t want to be responsible for other people’s failures. But how could they fail if they have been instructed by you? Get on with it.

Either you will go too far or you will fail to get started at all today. You are in one of those moods where only the extremes seem attractive, so make more of an effort to follow a middle path. Above all, control what you say and do.

Even if you are the sort of Aquarius who prefers to keep a low profile, the current cosmic climate won’t allow you to stay in the shadows. In some way or other, today’s sun-Uranus link will inspire you to put on a show. Make it spectacular!

This is a good time to ask for a favour from a friend or family member but bear in mind you won’t get it for free. At some stage they will expect you to do something equally as helpful and valuable for them. It’s a fair swap, so do it.

A Venus-Uranus link on your birthday suggests that something dramatic is going to happen in your love life this year. Not everything that occurs will make sense but, strangely, the things that make the least sense will be the things that are the most fun!

Tell a friend or work colleague how much you appreciate their advice and assistance today. As an Aries you know how to lead and inspire all sorts of people but it’s still a good idea never to take anyone’s support for granted.

You are in no mood to do as you are told and anyone who thinks they can issue orders to you will have to learn the hard way that your bite can be as bad as your bark. Some of the language you use will leave them reeling!

The planets warn that unless you truly have no choice in the matter you should not be starting anything new. Conserve your physical and emotional energy over the next week or so because you are going to need it all later in the year.

Someone you meet on your travels may be a lot of fun but be on your guard because the planets warn they may be out to deceive you. You don’t have to erect a barrier between you but you do have to keep personal details to yourself.

People come to you with their problems because they know you are a very good fixer, but unless you want your life to be taken up listening to sob stories you have to make it clear that enough is enough. Maybe find a convenient place to hide.

Push problems on the work front to one side today and focus on having fun. Whatever those problems may be they will most likely resolve themselves around the time of Friday’s new moon. The less you fret the more of a success you will be.

Life may not be a bundle of fun at the moment as cosmic activity in the most sensitive area of your chart makes everything seem a bit gray, but don’t despair. Better times are coming and soon the picture of your life will be multicoloured again.

By all means go out and enjoy yourself as the new week begins, but be careful how much money you spend and be even more careful who you choose to spend it on. Some of your so-called friends would be better described as freeloaders.

Time spent planning is rarely time wasted, so don’t worry that you seem to be thinking more than doing at the moment because the time to take action will be here soon enough. Later on you’ll have more fun than you know how to handle.

Look for compromise solutions in everything you do and make sure you ask friends and work colleagues for their opinions every step of the way. The planets warn if you try to push ahead without support your vision is unlikely to see the light of day.

No matter how settled and secure you feel at the moment there are some major changes on the way, so don’t get too comfortable. The good news is these changes will benefit you in ways that you cannot foresee, so welcome them rather than try to avoid them.

You must not let anyone, not even your family and your closest friends, talk you down over the next few days. Yes, the way the planets are aligned you will most likely be taking orders rather than giving them, but you are a free spirit too.

With energy planet Mars so strong on your birthday you must set yourself challenges for the coming year that really test your limits. You may be surprised, and delighted, to find that you are capable of much more than you imagined. Be amazing Virgo!

Mars, your ruler, ends its retrograde phase today, making this the perfect time to start pushing ahead on the work front. Make sure employers and other important people know who you are and what you can do. And try to be more of a team player!

No one has the right to tell you that you must believe certain things and disbelieve others. You are big enough and old enough to come to your own conclusions about what goes on in the world. Your viewpoint is as valid as anyone else’s.

If you have been a bit wasteful with money of late you will get the chance to get back some of what you lost. Sacrifices will have to be made but in the long-term they will be worth it. And next time, try not to squander your resources.

If you have fallen out with a friend or family member, this is the time to approach them and try to get things back to how they were before. Don’t blame yourself for what happened but don’t blame them either. Differences of opinion will always occur.

You need to lighten up a bit and stop worrying about things that most likely will never happen. As Mars moves in your favour in the well-being area of your chart today you must not overdo it physically – or mentally or emotionally come to that.

Something that previously seemed difficult if not impossible to get your head around will now be easy to understand. The situation itself has not changed in the slightest but your mind has – it has expanded to a level where much more makes sense.

Family problems should be less intense as from today and if you recently fell out with a loved this is the ideal time to kiss and make up. Don’t worry that you or they or both of you got a bit emotional – it no longer matters.

The time has come to open up and let others know what issues have been on your mind these past few weeks. The planets indicate that you no longer have to keep your thoughts to yourself or your ideas under wraps. Let it all come flooding out.

According to the planets you have been deceiving yourself about the true state of your finances and need to do something about it pretty quickly. That should be easy now that Mars is moving in your favour again, but it may also be painful.

Mentally, emotionally, and maybe physically too, you have been carrying more weight than you can comfortably handle but as from today it will feel as if the burden has been lifted from your shoulders. Next time, try not to take on so much.

You have been worrying far too much of late and need to adjust your mind so that it focuses on the good things in life rather than the bad. Think of what is to come and how you can shape the future in a way that pleases you.

If a project is still not going the way you want it to go then maybe you should take it as a sign that you need to get help. There are plenty of people who would love to assist you, but they won’t do so unless you ask.

Mercury, your ruler, links with luck planet Jupiter on your birthday, but because the angle between these planets is challenging, you need to be on your guard. Use your imagination by all means but don’t let flights of fancy tempt you to take foolish risks.

Focus on what you are good at and forget about trying to impress other people. The more certain individuals encourage you to take risks the more likely it is they are hoping you will make a fool of yourself. You don’t have to make it easy for them.

So many people need your assistance but the simple fact is you can’t help them all, so focus on the most deserving cases and give them 100 per cent. If you truly want to be a force for good you may need to be ruthless too.

Pace yourself carefully today and resist the temptation to take on more tasks than you can comfortably handle. With Mercury, your ruler, at odds with Jupiter, planet of excess, there is a danger you could go too far and fall off the edge!

Common sense is not as common as some people imagine and the planets warn you need to think carefully before you act. If you take risks that are not called for it could cost you dearly later in the week, not only financially but emotionally, too.

Put recent upsets and upheavals behind you and focus on more important matters. According to the planets a partner or loved one feels a bit left out of things at the moment and you need to reassure them they are still very much in your thoughts.

Stop kidding yourself that you are happy with your lot and start making changes that can make your life more enjoyable and fulfilling. The sun in your sign will help you get on in the world, so socialize more and get yourself noticed.

Some people may say you are being too pushy but don’t listen to them. What they actually mean is they are not comfortable with the fact that you refuse to do what they want you to do. And why should you? They don’t own you.

Don’t waste precious time and energy on a new project when there is an existing one that needs to be completed. It’s not like you to leave any kind of task half finished, so get your act together and get on with it. Do it now Scorpio!

What you lack in experience you more than make up for in enthusiasm and over the course of the next few days you will impress a lot of people with your can-do attitude. Important people are watching you closely – make sure they like what they see.

If someone tries to convince you to invest in a scheme you don’t know much about you are strongly advised to give it a miss. With mind planet Mercury under the influence of Jupiter there is a real danger you are not thinking straight!

You have been pushing yourself extremely hard of late and will reach a point over the next 24 hours where you find it impossible to keep going at your current speed. Slow down before you break down – there is no glory in making yourself ill.

The line between fact and fiction may be a bit blurred at the moment, especially where relationship issues are concerned, so don’t be too eager to support one person over another. Chances are you may have read the situation wrong.

Your birth sign is associated with clear thinking and common sense but the planets indicate that you will be guided more by your heart over the coming 12 months. Nothing wrong with that, so long as your head always gets the final word.

The more your rivals criticize you today the more determined you will be to prove them wrong. There is no reason at all why you should change your routines or methods – on the contrary, keep doing what you are doing, only more so!

There may be disagreement with a colleague about the best way to proceed over the next 24 hours but don’t take it too seriously because you are still basically on the same page. Everyone seems a bit touchy at the moment, so make allowances.

Compromise solutions seem hard to come by of late but while you are right not to back down from your position you could try to see things from opposing viewpoints once in a while. Failing that, avoid people who rub you the wrong way.

You cannot stand by while some sort of injustice is occurring. Do what you can to remedy the situation but don’t take it all on your own shoulders. You may be in the right but it helps if you have might on your side too. You need powerful allies.

The changes you make today, at home as well as at work, won’t easily be changed back later, so think before you act and if there is any doubt at all maybe refrain from making changes at all. There’s a lot to be said for inaction!

The sun in your sign adds a dash of fearlessness to your nature but you would be wise not to take on people who are bigger and better connected than you. Do you really need to make a big issue out of a minor disagreement? Probably not.

Cosmic activity in the most sensitive area of your chart urges you to steer clear of people and events that depress you. What you need most at the moment is to be part of an environment that is cheerful and uplifting. Where might you find it?

You must – repeat, must – stand up for yourself and make sure everyone knows you are not going to be their dogsbody or doormat. You don’t have to be a tough guy about it but you do have to show you can bite as well as bark.

If you find yourself up against forces that are clearly way out of your league then you must back off. If you get all stroppy about it and try to take the fight to them there can be only one winner, and it won’t be you! Know your limits.

This is potentially a fun time for you, especially if you are on the move and meeting people. Don’t worry too much about your work, and don’t tie yourself down to a heavy schedule – just follow your instincts and let life come to you.

Just because you would never take advantage of someone in need does not mean that kind of person does not exist and the planets warn you could meet one of them today. Don’t be fooled by their lies –and don’t let others be fooled either.

If someone tries to stand in your way today just shove them aside and continue with your journey. You don’t have time for fools and still less time for those who think it’s fun to cause avoidable problems, so get tough and get the job done.

Your task for the coming year is to live in the moment and not give too much thought as to how your dreams are going to come true. The universe will both guide and protect you, so there is no need to make plans or promises.

An offer you think cannot be refused MUST be refused, at least in the short-term. The planets warn that if you take it at face value you run the risk of giving far more than you get, so tone down your excitement and maybe think again.

Somewhere along the line you made a promise that you would like to get out of but friends and family are demanding that you live up to it. And so you must. If you go back on your word the damage to your reputation will be immense.

If you reveal too much about your plans today you are sure to regret it. Keep your thoughts to yourself and keep in mind at all times that the less others know about what you are up to the more successful you will be.

Mercury’s link to Pluto warns that if you make claims you don’t know are true you will open yourself up to all manner of criticism. You may say you don’t care what others think of you but a harsh judgment could still do you harm.

You may be of the opinion that to get ahead in the game of life you have to push yourself hard but that’s not true. The best way to get ahead is to know that what you are doing is morally right, then you won’t have to force it.

You may find it hard to believe that everything is going to work out for the best but there’s no doubt it will, so stop worrying and start looking on the bright side for a change. How you view the world is how your world will be.

It may at times be annoying that not everyone sees things the same way as you but if they did life would be hugely boring, which is far worse. Enjoy the different people you meet and the different opinions they hold, today and every day.

Mercury’s link to your ruler Pluto suggests you are now in a position to impress some very important people, but you must not exaggerate what you can do. Just be yourself and let them take you or reject you as you are. They’ll take you!

You have a tendency to put off making decisions until the last possible moment and sometimes it works and sometimes it does not. Today’s cosmic alignment suggests most strongly that if you hesitate you could lose out big time, so act now!

You need to let certain people know that you will never allow them to have any kind of hold over you. You don’t have to be nasty about it but you do have to spell out in plain language that you are your own boss – and mean it!

If you feel like doing something out of the ordinary today by all means go right ahead, but don’t make it so outrageous that you leave yourself open to criticism – or worse! The last thing you need is to give your enemies a weapon to hurt you with.

You need to take care today that your sentiments about a certain issue are not so obvious that it encourages others to play on your feelings for their own benefit. Try to disguise your sensitivities so they don’t make you such an easy target.

Virgo is the sign of schedules and details and small print and if you remember that fact and play to your strengths you won’t go far wrong over the coming 12 months. Leave grand plans and the “vision thing” to other people. Keep life simple.

Assess your priorities and devote your time and your energy only to those things that you consider to be worthy goals. There are only 24 hours in a day, even for an Aries, and you cannot possibly get everything done at once. Think quality, not quantity.

The sun in the sympathetic sign of Virgo at this time of year means there is no limit to what you can accomplish. Career-wise, as well as creatively and romantically, just about everything you turn your hand and mind to will go amazingly well.

Loved ones may be rather demanding but if you put yourself out for them now they will do just about anything for you later on. You may not agree with all their aims and ambitions but don’t let that deter you. Humour them and help them.

What you do with your life is limited only by the boundaries you choose to impose on yourself, so start believing that all things are possible and before you know it, you will be heading for the top. As a cardinal sign it’s where you belong.

The sun in the financial area of your chart makes this a good time to look at what you own and what you earn and how you can improve your cash-flow situation. Worldly things are important to you now, so by all means aim to be rich.

Most things you tackle now will work out well. This is one of the best times of the year for getting things done, so don’t hold back – go all out to be a winner in the game of life. And do so with a smile on your face.

You might prefer to disguise your feelings and pretend that nothing fazes you but the sun in the most sensitive area of your chart means you won’t fool anyone but yourself. There is nothing wrong with showing your emotional side Libra.

Don’t waste precious time dreaming about what might have been if you had only done this or done that. You should know by now that the only day that truly matters is today, so aim to make each 24-hour period better than the one before.

You have never been the sort to keep your opinions to yourself and you are not about to change your ways now. Having said that, you need to recognize that if you say the wrong thing to people in positions of power it could rebound badly on you.

If you feel like packing a travel bag and heading off into the unknown then by all means do so. At this time of year more than most you need to get away from your usual environment, if only for a few hours. Give your wanderlust its head.

It may be that for every step forward you take the universe shoves you two steps back but don’t be disheartened. If nothing else this particular phase in your life will teach you how to be patient, something that does not always come naturally to you.

You may look at life in terms of black and white, good and evil, right and wrong, but deep down you now it isn’t like that at all. It’s time to admit, if only to yourself, that the world is a far more complicated, and more interesting, place.

Life will have its ups and downs over the coming year but on balance you will end up in a higher, brighter place then where you are at the moment. If you truly want to be happy and fulfilled try to focus more on matters of the heart.

You may have your suspicions about the motives of some of the people you currently do business with but try not to let it show. If they get the impression that you no longer trust them they may decide to take their business elsewhere.

It appears you have the Midas touch. Okay, so not everything you come into contact with will turn to gold this weekend but both in your personal life and at work you can do no wrong. Make the most of it – you know it’s unlikely to last.

Keep reminding yourself how fortunate you are. It may at times seem as if life itself is conspiring against you but it isn’t true – in fact the universe wants you to be happy and successful. Your mind creates your world, so dream up something amazing.

The planets indicate that almost anything you ask for over the course of the weekend will be yours in a matter of days. You can, if you wish, focus on material things but for best results spend time with your family – love is the greatest prize.

Everything that is meant to happen will happen, not a moment too early and not a moment too late. It may seem silly to believe that your life is unfolding according to some sort of cosmic design but it is – and it’s a design that is wholly benign.

Your open and outgoing attitude will draw people to you over the next 48 hours and there may be times when you wish you were a little less popular. Be that as it may you are in demand for a reason – because your friendship is of infinite value.

If you have made a mistake of some kind now is the time to own up to it. Others will readily forgive you and even if there is money at stake they won’t hold you personally responsible for their loss. Next time though, think before you act.

The more you confide in friends and relatives this weekend the more likely it is they will be in a position to help you. You don’t have to let them in on all your secrets, of course, but trust them enough to know one or two.

Try not to push yourself too hard this weekend. You won’t lose out, financially or personally, by sitting back and taking it easy for a while. Let the world come to you for a change – better still, let it pass you by completely.

Even if you are the kind of Capricorn who always seems calm and quiet you will make some noise over the next few days. Why the sudden change in attitude? Because some things are worth shouting about even if you don’t like to raise your voice.

Put career issues on hold over the next 48 hours and focus on your family. Yes, of course, you still have so much work to get through but do you really have to do it right now, this very minute? Probably not. Loved ones are more important.

If a friend or family member is feeling low this weekend you must make it your business to cheer them up. A few words from you could be just what they need to raise their spirits and get them going again. You have the healing touch.

By all means put everything into reaching your life’s dream this year but don’t forget that other people have a claim on your time too. Make sure those you love know what it is you are aiming for – and find ways they can help you to succeed.

Make sure it is you who is in control of your emotions today and not your emotions that are in control of you. If you let your more negative feelings get the better of you there could be less than enjoyable repercussions a little further down the line.

Try not to be too aggressive today. With the sun linked to energy planet Mars in the most dynamic area of your chart you may think you can do as you please but there will be comebacks if you go too far. Remember, life isn’t a war.

If a family member makes you an offer of some kind today you would be wise to consider it seriously, even though your first reaction may be that it is too risky. Maybe it is, but since when did you start favouring the easy path through life?

Today’s sun-Mars link urges you to speak up and let the world know what it is you most desire. You may prefer to keep your passions to yourself but your instincts tell you that, on this occasion, secrecy is not the smartest option.

A money-making opportunity could land in your lap over the next few days and the planets suggest if you get it right you could make a sizeable profit. Remember though that you’re not the only one after this prize, so think and act fast.

Today’s sun-Mars link in your birth sign means it is time to start something fresh. Get out into the world and make yourself known to people whose friendship might be of use to you career-wise. A little networking now could pay big dividends later on.

After a series of recent highs it’s inevitable that you will experience some sort of reaction but that’s okay. If you feel disconnected from the celebrations going on around you today it’s nothing to be concerned about – you just need some time on your own.

No matter how many times you have promised yourself that this week, month or year will be the one when you make your mark you must not lose heart. The omens are good for a big breakthrough this week, so be ready to act when your chance comes.

Your big task now is to get your act together on the work front. You can be a bit too laidback at times and if you let current opportunities pass you by you may look back later on and wish you had been more dynamic. Go for it Sag!

If you have an urge to travel then start making serious plans, because there will be opportunities aplenty to spread your wings over the next few weeks. Give your mind permission to roam as well. What’s in your head today will be in your life tomorrow.

You will begin to notice over the next few days that the world is full of opportunities you were previously unaware of. Someone with your huge talents should be out there making a name for themselves, so get busy. You have a destiny to fulfil.

Partners and colleagues will help you out if they can but how can they assist you if they don’t know what it is you need? Speak up today and make sure everyone around you knows what they can do to get you through your current difficulties.

A Venus-Mercury link on your birthday means that your powers of persuasion will be high over the coming 12 months. Both at home and at work you should be able to find just the right words to get others to work with you rather than against you.

No matter what you may have planned for the rest of the year, the rules of the game will change over the next few days, so try to keep your options open. The less you commit yourself to now the more room for manoeuvre you will have later on.

What occurs over the next three or four days will remind you that you should never take anything for granted. You should know by now that it is just when you are most satisfied with your lot that the earth shifts beneath your feet!

You will get the chance to make your dreams come true over the next few days but it will cost you in various ways and not just financial. You may even have to make a choice between your principles and material gain. What will you decide?

You need to come to a final decision about a partnership matter that has been causing you no end of problems. Deep down you know you need to cut the knot but you can’t work out how best to go about it. You’ll find a way today.

A work or health issue has been annoying you for quite some time but when Saturn moves in your favour again later in the week you will get the chance to deal with it once and for all. Be ruthless with yourself but lenient with other people.

You are allowed to be less than perfect. Too often of late you have been unnecessarily hard on yourself because, in your own mind at least, you failed to reach a certain level of success. Time to remind yourself that you are human like everyone else.

According to the planets you have been taking too much for granted, especially in one-to-one relationships and maybe even at home, and what happens over the next few days will remind you that you should always be on your guard.

What occurs today or tomorrow will force you to think again about something you have always taken for granted. It’s okay to have strong opinions about the big issues in life but sometimes you need to be able to change your outlook. Can you do that?

A solution to your cash-flow problem is about to reveal itself but it may not be entirely pleasant. Saturn, planet of restriction, warns you may have to make some major cuts in your spending, some of which will go deeper than mere luxuries.

You may not be in the mood to make compromises at the moment but when Saturn, your ruler, ends its retrograde phase on Thursday you will no longer have any say in the matter. Do what is required of you and do it with a smile on your face.

Why are you running away from your problems? You should be running straight at them. As is so often the case what scares you the most right now will most likely turn out to be something you can quite easily handle. Face up to your fears.

A friendship has been going through a tough time of late but before this week is over you will be back on good terms again. Don’t bother trying to work out why you fell out, just agree to get past it and start doing good things together again.

For quite some time you have been torn between two very different ambitions in life and your birthday stars indicate you need to find a compromise course. It does not have to be one or the other, it can be both. Get creative about it.

You must not assume that because you recently came through a difficult phase unscathed you will be able to do the same thing as easily in the future. The planets warn that too much optimism could be a bad thing over the next few days.

Like it or not it’s time to get tough with someone who has been abusing your generous nature. It’s okay to feel sorry for this person but it’s not okay to allow them to take, take and take again without giving anything back in return.

Take good care of your health over the next few days because the influence of Jupiter, planet of excess, warns you cannot go on burning the candle at both ends without serious consequences. Everyone has their limits – yes, even a Gemini!

There are things going on behind the scenes, both in your personal life and at work, that will answer so many of the questions you have been asking of late. Be patient a little longer and soon you will understand what has been going on, and why.

You may think you are a law unto yourself but you are about to receive a rather big reminder that it isn’t true. Even a Leo must toe the line in certain situations, so be smart and do what the powers that be expect of you, for now.

You may think that you can make a better job of something than other people, and maybe you can, but the simple fact is you have not been asked, nor will you be. Focus on what is directly in front of you today and ignore everything else.

You don’t seem to have a care in the world at the moment and that’s great, but don’t relax to such an extent that events you should be able to control start getting away from you over the next few days. Have fun but stay sharp too.

It’s not like you to lose touch with reality but the planets warn you seem to believe that nothing can possibly go wrong with your life at the moment, and that’s asking for trouble! Keep your feet on the ground and keep your eyes and ears open.

You will have to deal with some pretty big challenges over the next few weeks but you are up to the task and will come through with flying colours. Just remember you don’t have to do it all on your own. Get help if you need it.

According to the planets a rival has set some kind of trap for you but you will see it with ease and take whatever evasive action you think is necessary. Don’t bother trying to hit back at them. Why would you want to stoop to their low level?

It seems like every time you want to do something the people you want to do it with say they want to do something else. Maybe you should take the hint and accept they have plans of their own. Go off and do your own thing instead.

Life has been moving at such a hectic pace of late that you probably feel drained. In which case you need to slow things down and give your mind and body the break they so obviously crave. Let the world know you’re taking time off.

You will go all out to prove yourself to the powers that be over the coming year, but be careful you don’t overdo it and end up physically and mentally exhausted. Know your limits and be smart enough to stay within them. You can still be a star.

You have begun to realize that you are putting far more into a partnership than you are getting out and it cannot go on that way. You may have to get tough over the next 24 hours – sadly it’s the only language some people appear to understand.

Someone you meet while on the move will influence your aims and ambitions and maybe even change the direction your life is to take. Once they have opened your mind to new possibilities you will understand how limited your horizons have been.

Today’s Mars-Mercury link will encourage you to be more assertive, which is good, but there is also a danger that you will go too far and get aggressive for no good reason. Be confident by all means but don’t say things you may later regret.

You may be unaware of the fact but someone you work or do business with resents your popularity and success. For that reason alone you would be wise to question what others tell you today. Don’t make it easy for them to make you look bad.

If you offer someone an inch don’t be surprised if they take a mile. Some people cannot resist being greedy, especially when they think no one will stand up to them. You’re hardly “no one” though, you’re a Leo, so don’t offer them anything at all!

You are not short of energy and enthusiasm at the moment but today’s cosmic picture warns you may be short of common sense, so think before you act and, if there are any doubts in your mind, maybe don’t act at all. What’s the rush?

Anyone who is unable to think and act as quickly as you do will be in for a rough ride today. You have no time, and no inclination, to carry passengers. Push yourself hard but push friends, family and work colleagues hard as well.

If someone says something damaging about you today you must, of course, hit back and let everyone know it isn’t true. Beyond that you need to find out why they thought it necessary to make an enemy of you. It’s hardly a smart move.

You can, if you wish, use scare tactics to get people to do things for you today but it would be a lot simpler, and more efficient, to use your considerable charm. Why risk making enemies when you can just as easily make friends and allies?

Mars in your sign makes you hugely assertive and with communications planet Mercury coming into the picture as well you must watch what you say over the next 24 hours. Keep your tongue in check or it could get you into lots of trouble.

It may feel as if you are losing control of events but how can you lose control of them when they were never yours to direct in the first place? Stop worrying and start enjoying life again. If you’re not smiling then you’re not doing it right!

You may be enthusiastic about a new plan or project but don’t fall into the trap of thinking that enthusiasm alone will be enough to see it through to completion. Work with people who share your ambitions. There’s strength in numbers.

Saturn, planet of restriction but also success, is strong on your birthday, which means you must expect some heavy responsibilities to come your way this year. Don’t try to avoid them – if you embrace them willingly they could be the making of you.

Don’t let people who have no right to know what you are up to quiz you about your private affairs. The planets warn that any personal information you let slip may be used against you by your rivals later on, so keep your lips zipped!

Mind planet Mercury moves into the most dynamic area of your chart today, so any doubts that have been plaguing you will disappear as if they never existed. Believe in yourself and believe that you were put on Earth to make a difference.

Cosmic activity in the domestic area of your chart will make it easy for you to say the right things and smooth over any cracks that may have formed in family relationships. Spend time with your loved ones and give them your undivided attention.

You have become a touch too predictable of late, so what can you do to remind friends and colleagues that you should not be taken for granted? Whatever strategy you decide on make sure you don’t go too far – avoid extremes at all costs!

This is a good time to start thinking of ways to make some extra cash. With Mercury, planet of the mind, moving into the financial area of your chart today you won’t be short of money-making ideas. You’ll also know how to spend it!

Something that seemed vague or muddled will come into sharp focus today as Mercury moves into your sign. Not only will you understand what has been going on but you will know in an instant how best to take advantage of it. Go for it Virgo!

The moment you resolve one crisis another seems to pop up to take its place. Is the universe having fun at your expense? Maybe it is but there is no need to worry. What looks like “bad” news now will look extremely good later on.

You don’t have to put up with situations that are not to your liking. Don’t be afraid to let others know that you have your doubts and don’t hesitate to question the accepted wisdom. Some so-called “experts” may turn out to be nothing of the kind.

It’s not like you to keep a low profile and you have no intention of changing your ways now. On the work front especially you will let everyone know who you are and what you can do – and, more importantly, what they can do for you.

If you need a break this is the time to give it some serious thought. Cosmic activity in the area of your chart that governs faraway places will encourage you to think global rather than local. Before you know it you could be on your way!

Sometimes you just want to be left alone with your thoughts and as mind planet Mercury moves into one of the more secretive areas of your chart today that won’t be a problem. No one will bother you if you don’t bother them.

You need to let partners and loved ones know what you are thinking. It’s not enough to expect them to read your face or take clues from your actions, you must spell out for them in plain and simple language what’s going on in your head.

Partnerships are under good stars on your birthday, as are creative activities. If you can find ways to combine the two you may be able to break through to higher artistic and scientific levels. Where you are is not enough – aim to go higher still.

At last you are willing to admit that something you have been working on is not worth the effort. It may be disappointing but you have also learned some valuable lessons – not least that you should listen to your instincts before you listen to other people.

Don’t worry if you have to put a project of some sort on hold today, because you can always come back to it later. You have so much on the go at the moment that you have no choice but to focus on the most important things first.

You may not trust what a colleague is telling you but it seems you have no option but to act on what they say. Yes, there is a possibility that you are being lied to but the planets indicate it won’t be your loss. The universe has your back.

You may not be in the most outgoing of moods at the moment but that’s okay. As a Cancer you need to hide away once in a while to replenish your energy and revive your interest in life. You’ll bounce back bigger and better than ever.

The best way to deal with people who insist on making a drama out of the most mundane of things is to ignore them and take whatever action is needed yourself. They are unlikely to thank you for it, of course, but everyone else will.

If there is something you have wanted to do for years but for one reason or another never quite got around to then get your act together and get started on it immediately. You can and you will make a huge success of it – IF you start now!

Start looking for ways to turn the tables on people who have given you a hard time. You don’t have to be blatant about it – as a Libra you can do subtle – but you do have to let everyone see that you will NOT be taken for a fool.

If you insist on taking an opposing view to whatever the accepted wisdom happens to be you must expect to be attacked for it. Will that bother you? Of course not! The fact that you are attracting criticism means, in your mind, that you are in the right.

Cosmic activity in the career area of your chart is piling up a great deal of pressure, but you won’t let it get to you. Anyone who thinks you are going to roll over and play dead obviously knows nothing about who and what you really are.

Someone you work alongside may say something about you that is less than flattering. Don’t go off on your own and sulk about it – confront them directly and ask how they have come to that opinion of you. It could be a case of mistaken identity!

Yes, this may be a frustrating time for you, but it won’t last much longer, so keep smiling and keep reminding yourself that behind those big black clouds the sun is still shining brightly. Always imagine you can feel its warmth on your cheek.

You may be tempted to let a rival off the hook this weekend but is that really such a good idea? If you give them the impression that you are too soft-hearted they won’t hesitate to take you for a ride again and again. Stand up for yourself – and mean it.

Venus and Mars, the relationship planets, dominate your birthday chart, which means you would be wise to take other people’s feelings and opinions into account before taking action of any kind. What you do with others is what you will do best.

This would be a good time to make peace with someone you recently fell out with. You may genuinely feel that they were mainly at fault but don’t let that stop you from making the first approach. Life’s too short to hold petty grudges.

Your creative powers are at a peak right now, so make good use of them. The sun in Virgo encourages you to take the kind of chances you usually try to avoid, so be brave and be ready to move in a new direction at a moment’s notice.

Venus, planet of love and harmony, moves into the work and well-being area of your chart this weekend, which means you will do best if you take life as it comes. Why try to force the pace and risk exhausting yourself for no good reason?

Cosmic activity in the most dynamic area of your chart means you will find it easy to reach the targets you have set yourself. Don’t let anyone tell you that you should lower your sights – on the contrary you should be aiming higher than ever before.

Sometimes you get so caught up in the daily struggle for existence that you forget how loved you are by family and friends. Pull your mind away from “serious” things for a while and focus on what truly matters – your home and your family.

If the pressures of life are beginning to get too much for you just cut loose for a while and have some fun. There is only so much you can accomplish at any one time, so give yourself a break and rejoin the fray much refreshed later on.

If you find yourself losing interest in what you are working on you should take it as a sign that it’s not the right thing for you. In the past it may have been about how much money you could earn, but now you need something more intellectually fulfilling.

Don’t be afraid to open up and show the world your vulnerable side. There is no point pretending you are as tough as old boots when, deep down, you are as lost and bewildered as everyone else. You’re only human Scorpio. Don’t laugh, it’s true!

If you are feeling a bit more touchy than usual that’s a sure sign you need to confront whatever inner demons are tormenting you. Most likely you have blown the situation out of all proportion, so get your head together and get back on track.

Take a break if you need it, even if it means leaving a pile of unfinished work behind you. Social activities are under excellent stars this weekend, so seek out people who think and act like you and have a good time together. Like attracts like.

If nothing else this weekend you will be more relaxed about your status and position than you have been in recent weeks. Most likely you have finally accepted that life is too short and too precious to waste time on social climbing and petty feuds.

Money may be important but it must not be allowed to come before love. If you get the chance to make someone you have feelings for happy then you must take it, no matter what the financial cost may be. It’s cheap at twice the price!

Positive cosmic omens on your birthday indicate that the coming year will be both intense and rewarding. Get out into the world and let everyone know who you are and what you have to offer. You won’t be short of opportunities to shine.

You will have a great deal of fun this coming week if you get rid of inhibitions that have been holding you back and just speak and act as the feeling takes you. Don’t worry that some people won’t be impressed – most people will love you for it.

Try not to let a difference of opinion degenerate into an out and out fight. Use your charm and way with words to smooth over any bad feelings that might arise, especially on the home front. Peace and quiet is what you should be aiming for.

Be careful what words you allow to pass your lips today because partners and loved ones are rather sensitive at the moment and if your words sound harsh they could take it personally and hold a grudge. A little bit of thought will save a lot of anguish.

You will need to be on your guard over the next 24 hours, especially when dealing with people whose outlook on life is radically different to your own. If you let slip information of a personal nature you could find it being used against you later on.

If someone approaches you with what sounds like a brilliant idea by all means consider it. But be aware too that the reason they want to get you involved is so they can lay off most of the risk on you. Do you really want that?

By all means help someone in need but don’t let them get the idea that you will be there for them every time they slip up. Sometimes you can be a bit gullible and certain people won’t hesitate to take advantage if you let them. So don’t let them.

If you sixth sense warns you that someone is not to be trusted then you must listen to it and act on what it tells you. But don’t go overboard and think the whole world is against you. You have many more friends than enemies.

Speak plainly and clearly so others know where you are coming from, but try to keep any harshness out of your words or you may scare more sensitive sorts away. The way you deliver your message is almost as important as the message itself.

Don’t turn down an opportunity because you are not sure you will be up to the task. Not only will you be up to it but you will make such a success of it that you’ll get asked to take on more responsibility. Make sure you get paid more too.

You rarely take kindly to criticism and what you hear from a work colleague today will annoy you intensely. Even so, they may have a point, so listen to what they have to say and make whatever changes seem necessary. Never stop learning.

You cannot and you must not take anything for granted over the next few days. The cosmic picture is beginning to change and you will have to change with it if you want to move up in the world. Life rarely stands still for long, and neither should you.

Someone you have long admired has done something silly and inevitably your opinion of them has taken a nosedive. But haven’t you done worse things in the past? Try not to be quite so judgmental. Mistakes are a fact of life for everyone.

Your social life will improve dramatically over the coming year and your popularity will lead to all kinds of invitations, both personal and professional. Be selective about who and what you get involved with. There’s only so much of you to go around.

You have nothing to fear and everything to look forward to, so why are you so determined to take a negative view of life? You need to understand that bad thoughts can sometimes lead to bad things. Think positive Aries, today and every day.

You may have to postpone something you were looking forward to today, but come the end of the week you will be glad you were forced to change. The universe knows better than you do what direction your life is destined to take.

You don’t have to beat your rivals into submission, no matter how much you think they deserve it. Whatever conflict you may be in the middle of at the moment, you can and you must find a compromise solution – there’s always one available.

If something you are being asked to do does not fit in with your long-term plans then just say “No”. You are who you are for a reason and you do what you do because it feels right to you, not because others expect it of you.

No, your hopes and wishes have not been dashed. It’s just that the universe knows better than you do that you should be doing something else, something better, something more fulfilling, and is dropping you a massive hint. Take it.

The good times just keep on coming but you must not allow yourself to be lulled into a false sense of security. By all means enjoy what is going on in your life but don’t expect it to last forever. Change is coming – be ready for it.

You seem rather touchy at the moment, due no doubt to the sun’s journey through the most sensitive area of your chart. Just be careful you don’t say anything that might turn people against you. Look on the bright side and see the good in everyone.

Not everyone believes in the same causes as you, so give friends and loved ones and work colleagues a pass if they don’t seem to care about what maybe you care about too much. Lighten up a little Scorpio, life is supposed to be fun.

There is no point arguing with someone in a position of power, because they clearly have no intention of listening to what you have to say. Either hold your tongue and go along with their plans or cut loose and work for someone else.

You may be out of favour with someone at the moment but don’t let it worry you. You don’t need the patronage of those higher up the ladder of success, you are more than capable of looking after yourself. Maybe that’s what they are worried about!

You may be tempted to get your own back on someone who gave you a bad time recently, but is it worth the time and the effort? Probably not. You will feel better, about them, about yourself and about life in general, if you forgive and forget.

You may find it hard to put your feelings into words over the next 24 hours but your body language will speak volumes. Let those you love know by your actions that you still think the world of them, no matter what they may have said or done.

Self-belief is not an option, it’s a must. With both Jupiter and Pluto strong on your birthday you clearly have what it takes to reach the top but deep down you still have a few nagging doubts. Get rid of them. You’re not just good, you’re the best!

Others can follow the herd if they wish but you are far too independent to do the same thing. Start a new trend over the next 24 hours, one that tells the world you have a mind of your own and that you are not afraid to use it.

Mars, planet of energy and ambition, moves into the career area of your chart today, giving your passion to succeed the kind of boost that cannot be ignored. Employers and other important people can see you are going places – first stop the top!

One of the best times of the year begins for you today as Mars moves into your fellow air sign of Aquarius. You will become a lot more adventurous over the next few weeks and won’t be afraid to broaden your horizons, mentally and professionally.

You need to face up to an issue that you have been doing your best to avoid. The sooner you find the courage to deal with it the sooner you will be free to move on to better things. Leave yesterday in the past where it belongs.

As Mars moves into your opposite sign today, you will become much more dynamic in one-to-one situations but you could also be a bit too abrasive when dealing with people who get on your nerves. Try not to offend everyone you meet.

You have no choice now but to show the ruthless side of your nature, especially on the work front where if you don’t get on top of a rebellion quickly it could get out of control. Do what you have to do without worrying about other people’s feelings.

As from today you will start to feel more confident about what is going on in your life and by the end of the week you will wonder how on earth you allowed yourself to get so worked up about next to nothing. Don’t let it happen again.

You may prefer to keep your emotions to yourself but that won’t be so easy over the next few days. Loved ones will demand that you open up about your feelings and you know if you don’t they may start thinking you have something to hide.

Be bold, be brave and be the very best Sagittarian you can be today. If you want to get on in the world – and you do – you need to push past the mental and emotional barriers that are holding you back. It’s time to reach your full potential.

As Mars leaves your sign today you will need to be a bit more careful about how you use your personal resources. You can no longer afford to scatter your energy in all directions. Focus only on those things that genuinely matter to you.

You can and you must set your sights higher over the next few days. For too long you have been moving ahead but with one foot on the brake. Now you must give yourself permission to move at speed. There is everything to play for and everything to win.

If you need to ask a favour of someone in a position of power you must do so in a positive manner. If you give them the impression that you don’t expect your request to be granted then most likely it won’t be. Body language is so important.

You will find it remarkably easy to get friends and family members to do your bidding over the coming 12 months. For some strange reason all they want to do is to please you, so you might as well please them too and let it happen. Everyone wins!

Some say that ignorance is bliss but the planets warn if you ignore your problems today not only will they not go away but they may get worse. You need to make a final decision about a very personal issue. You’ve avoided it too long.

By all means speak your mind but try to understand that too much frankness could lead to problems, especially on the home front where loved ones won’t take kindly to being reminded of their flaws. Be a little more sensitive to their feelings.

Now that Mars is moving in your favour again you will be more efficient of mind and more decisive in action. But don’t get so caught up in details that you risk losing sight of the bigger picture. You need to keep reminding yourself what it’s all for.

Start making plans for something big, something that will put you on the map. You have all the courage and confidence you will ever need to tackle problems that on other occasions might have been too much for you. Nothing can defeat you now.

You need to recognize the fact that you will accomplish more in the long-term if you work closely with like-minded people than you will if you try to do it all on your own. It’s time to leave your ego behind and find a new way of living.

Make an effort to talk to people you don’t have much in common with today. You may be surprised to discover that they actually have some very good ideas, at least one of which you can adapt for your own use. Don’t forget to credit them though.

You have so much to be thankful for and so much to look forward to, so why do you look so worried? Whatever the reason you have to get over it because with your ruler Venus so strong at the moment it would be criminal to waste opportunities.

For quite some time you have been working behind the scenes, happy to get on with things without calling attention to yourself. Now, however, you must go to the other extreme and make as much noise as you can. Let the world know you still exist.

If there is someone you need to impress, someone who can make things happen for you, now is the time to turn on the charm and win them over by sheer force of personality. No one can resist you when you really turn it on.

Don’t be reluctant to put yourself forward and take the initiative. If you hang back and let others make decisions for you today you will regret it later on when you realize that what they have decided is not right for you. Take control and keep control.

Mars in your sign will bring a number of challenges but it will also bring the drive and the energy and the self-belief you need to overcome them. This is a testing time for you – and you are destined to pass top of the class!

You must not be afraid to take risks today. It may be true that what you stand to lose if you get something wrong is more than what you stand to gain if you get it right, but what matters is that you show the world your fighting spirit.

Someone older and wiser will make a big impression on you over the coming year, to the extent that you may consider changing your life in drastic ways. You don’t need to go that far – just adapt what you learn from them and make it work for you.
