Before you criticize someone for expecting something for nothing make sure they cannot criticize you for exactly the same thing. As an Aries, for some reason, you sometimes forget that you are subject to the same rules as everyone else!

You need to find ways to get along with someone who rubs you the wrong way. Like it or not, you are going to have to work with them over the next few days, so forget about your differences and focus on what you have in common.

Life is not a race and the winner is not always the one who moves the fastest. You would be wise to slow things down a bit today, even if it means cutting back on activities you enjoy. Speed isn’t everything, as you are about to find out.

No matter how tough things have been of late, you now have a new lust for living and intend to make up for all the time you wasted feeling glum. Deny yourself nothing. Indulge your every whim. Life is too short to worry about consequences.

It’s quite likely that something will get to you today and make you retreat into your shell. Don’t sulk too long though because not only do you have important things to do but someone wants to reward you for recent efforts. Don’t push them away.

Jupiter in the communications area of your chart means you are under no obligation to tone down your opinions. On the contrary, you must speak up and let someone know loud and clear that you do not approve of their actions. So the truth hurts –so what?

All eyes will be on you today and although you don’t usually enjoy being the centre of attention, on this occasion you won’t mind a bit. Your more outgoing attitude will be noted by someone in a position of power, who may offer you a promotion.

Everything is right with your world at the moment and with both Jupiter and Venus energizing your sign not even the occasional setback can knock you off your stride. Your positive outlook on life will bring both personal and professional rewards.

You have feelings like everyone else (though they’re not always apparent) and what occurs over the next 24 hours could even bring a tear to your eye. Don’t be afraid to admit that you need a shoulder to cry on. Even Sags need emotional support.

Cosmic activity in the friendship area of your chart will make it easy to win people round to your way of thinking, even if your way of thinking is wrong. But don’t expect them to put their money where your mouth is – it won’t happen.

You have been waiting in the wings long enough and now the time has come to take centre stage and make it your own. Put yourself forward today and show the world what you can do – just about anything if you choose to put your mind to it.

You seem more relaxed now, more in tune with the spirit of the times. It’s amazing how good life can feel when you stop making a big issue of everything and simply live in and enjoy the moment. You’ll feel somewhere between good and great today!

You are determined to prove your creative worth, which is good, but there is a risk that what you create over the coming year will be seen by some people as a challenge to their beliefs. That’s okay though – someone has to be the controversial one.

If you don’t know all the facts of a situation you must not make any hard and fast decisions. Also, be careful that in your rush to do good deeds for people you don’t overlook information that might make you think twice about what you are doing.

A mistake you made a long time ago will come back to haunt you today and, yes, it will be embarrassing. But what exactly should you be ashamed of? The fact that you made a mistake, however bad, is evidence that you tried. So few do.

It’s a shame that you are so caught up in your own problems that you have no idea what others are struggling with, because you could learn from each other. Listen to what people tell you– it could lead you to an answer you have been searching for.

The more you try to slow down and give your body time to recover the more your workload piles up in front of you. You need to call a halt and let others know that enough is enough. No new tasks until the old ones are cleared.

The more enthusiastic you are about a new project the more you must keep a hold on the purse strings. If you just throw yourself at it without thinking about how it needs to be financed it could quickly eat into your resources.

You seem so sure of yourself at the moment that nothing can faze you, but you need to be aware that your confidence makes you a target. Your rivals would love nothing better than to take you down a peg or two. Don’t make it easy for them.

Keep all kinds of personal information to yourself today. There is a side to your nature that likes to talk but the planets warn if you say too much over the next 24 hours your words could be used against you by your rivals, so be careful.

The only reason certain people are being critical of you now is because they envy your ability to switch off from outside influences and live in the moment. The more they say you should change your ways the more you should carry on as you are.

Mercury, planet of the mind, is now at odds with Neptune, which among other things means you will need to make an extra-special effort to stay sharp and not let your thoughts drift all over the place. Know your own mind and how to use it.

You seem to believe that if you let down your guard for even a moment your enemies will be at your throat in a flash. Maybe they will, but no way will they win. It takes more than big talk and threats to bring down a Capricorn.

A new project is sure to take up a lot of time and energy between now and the end of the year, so make sure it’s what you truly want to be doing and get other people involved too so you can spread the load as much as possible.

You should know by now that things begun in haste are often repented at leisure, so don’t do anything drastic and don’t make promises you may not be able to keep. This is very much a day for taking things easy. Move slower and enjoy life more.

How you interact with people on a group or social level is going to be of the utmost importance over the coming 12 months. You need to make a conscious decision to view everyone you meet as your spiritual equal. Look beyond superficial differences.

The more other people try to pressure you into making a quick decision about something the more you must take your time. Keep them waiting and make sure they get the message that they don’t put pressure on you – you put pressure on them!

If you make an effort to work with people as part of a team this weekend you will be rewarded in ways you cannot imagine later in the month. Remember though that principles must always come before profit. It’s not all about money.

Don’t worry too much if you encounter some kind of setback today – most likely it is just the universe’s way of telling you to slow down a bit. Delays may in fact work in your favour as it will be those who move fastest who get the least done.

It’s great that your self-belief is sky-high at the moment, but don’t fall into the trap of making promises that you may not be able to keep. It won’t look good if you make guarantees one day then have to backtrack on them the next.

If you want to move up in the world and be someone special you will need to open up about your ambitions and let others know what you see yourself doing five or even 10 years into the future. Making plans is important as it keeps your mind sharp.

Life is quite easy for you at the moment, which is nice, but it could also be dangerous in that you could find it hard to motivate yourself later on when decisive action is called for. Try setting yourself challenges for the fun of it today.

Sometimes the best way to move forward is to go back first and sweep away everything that went before, and that is what you must do now. Think “creative destruction” and throw out everything from your past life that you no longer need.

Let partners and loved ones and friends and even work colleagues know exactly how you feel at the moment, even if – especially if – you don’t feel good about life. Even Scorpios need emotional support now and again. You’ll get it if you open up.

No doubt you believe you have what it takes to be a success, but success will come quicker, and last longer, if you can stop thinking in terms of winning and losing. Work for others as well as yourself now and ultimately everyone will win.

Sometimes you are far too modest about your achievements and that is something you need to overcome this weekend. There are not many people out there who can claim to be as accomplished in the game of life as you are. Enjoy your successes.

Don’t be afraid to push a little bit harder than you usually do this weekend, and don’t hesitate to demand that partners and loved ones and work colleagues follow your example. If you give 100 per cent then everyone else should, too.

There are so many things going on in your life at the moment that you could easily lose sight of the bigger picture. Take time out to think about what you are doing and what it’s all for. Is there a master plan behind your actions? There should be.

The message of your birthday chart is that you need to learn how to be more self-sufficient. Yes, of course, you will always need other people, and they will always need you, but the more you can do on your own the sooner you will reach your potential.

What seems logical to you may look silly, even absurd, to a friend or colleague, so don’t expect to be able to work together toward a common goal. Later in the week you will understand each other a bit better, so bide your time and your time will come.

You have been focusing so much on one issue that you have failed to notice that an equally important issue has crept up on you. What occurs today will make it abundantly clear what needs to be done – and you’ve got the whole week to do it.

You know what you want to do and you have a pretty good idea about how best to go about it, but something is still holding you back. Whatever that something might be, rest assured that it will be gone by this time next week – so keep making plans.

You may be of the opinion that certain aims and ambitions are beyond you, that no matter how hard you strive your efforts will always fall short, but that isn’t true. Raise your thinking, then raise your game and very soon you’ll be flying high.

Certain people have been painting a far too rosy picture of what’s been going on in your world and what happens over the next few days will bring that fact home to you. Are things really so bad? Of course not, but you do need to face up to reality.

You may think that you can cope with any and every challenge that is thrown at you but what happens today will remind you that some things get done better when they are done with other people. Teamwork is very much the keyword for the week ahead.

You have never been the sort to solve your problems by running away from then and in recent weeks have made heroic efforts to face up to a number of painful issues. Now the pain is passing and from here on in there will be more laughs than tears.

You may be tempted to risk a lot on something you believe will work in your favour but can you be 100 per cent certain of that? There is no such thing as a sure thing so, yes, take that risk, but have a fallback plan . . . just in case.

Say what you have to say today but don’t say so much that you turn important people against you. As communications planet Mercury is moving in your favour again you’ll find your voice with ease – but go easy on how you choose to use it.

Usually you are open to taking advice but just lately you have been enjoying life so much that you may have ignored opinions you don’t want to hear. As from today though you need to wise up and recognize that not all news can be good news.

The cosmic picture is beginning to shift in your favour and over the next few days you can expect good news of one sort or another. It may be another week or so until it all comes together but life is now definitely heading in the right direction.

Try not to read too much into a minor difference of opinion with a friend or relative, because what seems so important today will be of no significance to either of you tomorrow. Life always changes, and your outlook needs to keep changing too.

You must not let the doubters and cynics talk you out of what you are planning to do. It’s your life and it is entirely up to you what you choose do with it, so follow your instincts and let everyone know that you intend to follow your dream.

You don’t HAVE to be different, Aries. You don’t HAVE to constantly show that you are not the sort to follow the herd. Sometimes it’s okay to go with the flow and let others call the tune for a while. Such a time is now, so relax.

You may feel an overwhelming need to prove yourself but the planets warn if you push too hard or move too fast you could make the kind of mistake that does your reputation no good at all. Be ambitious by all means, but be sensible too.

There will be times over the next few days when you feel out of your depth, but that’s okay. Others may know more than you but that does not mean you are inferior in any way. Learn from them and add it to your own experience.

You may be super busy at the moment but you must still make time too for those who depend on you for their emotional wellbeing. Partners and loved ones may not be as dynamic as you, so make allowances if they are feeling a bit down.

You must not suppress your natural instincts. You are who you are for a good cosmic reason and anyone who says you should try to be different is wrong. Listen to the little voice inside your head today and do only what it tells you.

You seem to have developed a reputation as a bit of a cold fish in recent months and that’s something you need to change. Start by being more open with friends and relatives about how you feel. There is nothing wrong with having feelings.

You may not be looking forward to what you have to do, but the more time you spend worrying about it the worse it will be. Whatever it is you are expected to take care of just throw yourself at it with energy and enthusiasm. You’ll survive.

Think carefully before agreeing to get involved in a project that a friend or colleague claims is guaranteed to succeed. You know what they say about “certainties” – they do not exist! The planets warn this is one offer you can afford to turn down.

You are strongly advised not to allow yourself to get dragged into a situation that has nothing to do with you either personally or professionally. No matter what the long-term rewards might be it is not worth the short-term stress. Give it a miss.

There is no such thing as a “free lunch” and if you don’t know that by now you will very soon. Whatever it is you are given over the next 24 hours you can be sure that you will have to give something in return. Forewarned is forearmed.

Sometimes you can be too rigid in your thinking and you need to learn how to stand back from your own opinions and see why other people take an opposing viewpoint. You may not agree with them, but at least you will understand them.

Do something different over the next few days, something that causes a bit of a stir. You may not think of yourself as a radical or revolutionary but deep down there is a part of you that enjoys rocking the boat. Rock it today and see who falls out!

A Mars-Uranus link on your birthday this year will encourage you to be more adventurous, which is good, but could also lead to you taking unnecessary risks, which is bad. Your “can do” attitude needs to be combined with common sense.

Why do you look so worried? Why is your attitude so negative? Most likely it has something to do with today’s link between your ruler Mars and Uranus, planet of upheavals, which has you dreading the future. Don’t dread it – enjoy it!

You may feel that someone you work or do business with has let you down and deserves to feel the edge of your tongue, but ask yourself: will it make the situation better or worse? Bite your lip and do what you can to improve things together.

If you don’t think you should be taking orders from someone then make sure they know about it and make sure they cannot get you into a position where you have no choice in the matter. Make this the day that you seize back control.

Take whatever time you need to reach a decision that is likely to have far-reaching consequences both for you and for other people. Anyone who tries to rush you is not your friend and may even be an enemy. Take your time and get it right.

Sometimes it is necessary to tell a small lie in order to save someone you love from the consequences of their actions. Yes, of course, honesty is usually the best policy but on this occasion bending the truth a little is the right thing to do.

By all means be generous with your time today but don’t be so generous with your money or your ideas. If you give too much away, financially or creatively, you could find that others get rich at your expense, and they don’t deserve to.

You may want to prove yourself to those who doubt you that you are more than just a pretty face, but don’t go too far and take on responsibilities that clearly you are not qualified to handle. Expect good things of yourself but don’t try to do everything.

You must stay focused on the tasks that are important to you, no matter how much others try to get you involved in what they are doing. There are only so many hours in a day and not even a Scorpio can find ways to add to them.

It would appear that someone is trying their hardest to undermine your confidence. They don’t know you very well, do they? Sagittarius is a sign that seldom has doubts and if your rivals don’t know that by now then they’re not very smart.

When dealing with business and financial matters you must – repeat, must – make sure you read all the small print. Don’t skip over the details just because you think you know them already. If you do, you could miss something very important.

With your ruling planet Uranus at odds with energy planet Mars today there is a danger you could over-commit yourself and do yourself some physical damage. Even an Aquarius has limits, so be smart and stay within your comfort zone, for now.
PISCES (Feb. 20 - Mar. 20):

Stick with what you know today and don’t be tempted to stray into areas where your expertise is limited. It’s good that you want to extend yourself but you need to take it a step at a time. More than that could prove too much for you.

According to the planets you have put so much time and energy into one aim that an equally important one has suffered. Now you must balance things out and make sure that you can move ahead on two fronts at the same time. Give yourself another option.

It’s time to give up on something that simply isn’t working out the way you wanted it to. It’s not a sign of failure on your part, far from it in fact. You took a chance and gave it your best shot, and that’s more than most people do.

You may have to put a creative project on hold for a while, at least until the sun changes signs at the weekend. You have so many things on the go that it’s unlikely you can do it justice – but you can come back to it later on.

You may not entirely trust what a friend or colleague is telling you but you can sense there is some truth in it and that you will need to take action of some kind. Let your instincts guide you and don’t be afraid to upset powerful people.

Cancer may not be one of the more outgoing of signs but while the sun remains in the travel area of your chart you will want to be on the move. Don’t go too far today though as a family issue may require your input. Short journeys only.

The best way to deal with people who insist on making a drama out of a crisis is to stay calm and let them see that you won’t allow yourself to be panicked. Someone needs to keep a cool head and that someone may have to be you.

The sun is coming to the end of its journey through your sign and that means you need to quickly finish a project that has some sort of deadline. Don’t try to do everything, just do the one thing that really matters really well.

Recent weeks have seen you give some serious thought to what you are going to do in the future and when the sun enters your sign on the 23rd you can turn those thoughts into deeds. And remember: the future is what you choose to make of it.

If you take the opposite viewpoint to what everyone else claims to believe there is every chance that you will be one of the few people who makes the right call. You have never been one to get caught up in the herd mentality, so don’t start now!

Cosmic activity in the career area of your chart has brought a great deal of pressure in recent weeks, but you have handled it well and impressed those who have the power to reward you. Don’t be afraid to ask for a raise or a promotion.

Why is a friend acting in ways that can only hurt them in the long-term? Is it because they just don’t care, or is it their way of calling for assistance? According to the planets it could well be the latter, so what can you do to help them?

The last few weeks have no doubt been frustrating but when the sun moves into your fellow air sign of Libra at the weekend what seemed so difficult in the past will suddenly look easy. Practise your smile – you’re going to need it!

If you can defeat a rival once and for all you must follow through and make sure they are never in a position to challenge you again. Don’t let your big heart get in the way. There is no reason why you should feel sorry for them.

It may at times seem as if you have missed your chance in life but that simply isn’t true. It is always possible to start again, from where you are now, and reach a goal or destination that makes you happy. Give it some thought then enjoy life again.

You can get people to do things for you without making loud demands. You possess a considerable amount of charm – for when you care to use it – and if you say the right words in the right way today no one will be able to resist you.

You have started a lot of new projects of late but you are beginning to realize that you won’t be able to continue with all of them. Start looking at what you are doing with a more critical eye and, where necessary, be ruthless with your plans.

There may have been one or two dark days in recent weeks but now the cosmic tide is beginning to turn and before you know it, everything will be sweetness and light again. Okay, so maybe it won’t be quite that good, but it WILL be much better.

Your social life has been good of late and you are advised to make the most of it over the next few days, because when the sun changes signs on the 23rd a less lighthearted phase will begin. You have responsibilities that cannot be avoided forever.

Money matters of one sort or another have been giving you cause for concern but the planets indicate that your financial position may not be as bad as you think. Either way, your cash-flow situation will improve over the next few days.

The sun leaves your sign at the end of this week but that does not mean life will grind to a halt. On the contrary, you will be busier than ever making sure your wonderful ideas get the chance to see the light of day. Don’t switch off yet.

In a matter of days both the sun and Mercury, planet of the mind, will move into your sign and a new phase will begin. You don’t have to do anything special, just listen to your heart and follow your instincts. Deep down you already know the way.

There has been a lot of coming and going in recent weeks and you could do with a breather. You will get one soon enough, but today you need to redouble your efforts and make sure friends and relatives continue to move in the right direction.

You have achieved much in recent weeks and no doubt you feel you could carry on at your current frantic pace for a while longer. No doubt you could but even a Sag has limits. Start slowing down a bit or you could hit the proverbial wall.

When the sun moves into the career area of your chart next weekend you will get the chance to put your big ideas to the test. Any one of them could change your life for the better but one idea in particular stands head and shoulders above the rest.

No matter how difficult life has been in recent weeks what happens in the very near future will more than make up for it. Trust that the universe will both guide and protect you and listen to the little voice that whispers in your head. It knows the way.

The more you try to change your ways the more you end up doing the same things and making the same mistakes. Perhaps you should take the hint and stop trying so hard. You are who you are for a reason, so why not embrace that fact today?

Your mind will work fast over the coming year and you will see things that other people miss and understand things that had previously confused you. You may or may not discover the meaning of life but life will certainly have more meaning for you.

You can sense that something is coming to a head and that it will be mega. Whatever occurs you cannot ignore it or run away from it. Face up to events as and when they happen and never doubt that you have what it takes to come through smiling.

You may not be much at taking care of details but that will by necessity change over the next few days. Cosmic activity in the work area of your chart means that even quite minor details could result in major consequences, so stay alert.

Life is about to get so much better and even if you don’t quite believe that now you will believe it come the start of next week. A lot will depend on how you have dealt with personal issues in recent weeks – and you’ve dealt with them well.

According to the planets you will have to cut back on your social life this coming weekend while you focus on matters of a family and domestic nature. Tonight though you are still free to go out and have fun – so don’t hold back!

Nothing much will change over the next 24 hours but you can feel on some inner level that a new cycle is about to begin. It promises to be a positive one too, enabling you to look at life through fresh eyes after so much recent disappointment.

Today’s sun-Mercury union in your sign means you can, if you choose, do something dramatic and important today, but you don’t have to. The cosmic picture is beginning to change and your circumstances will change soon too – for the better.

The old solar year is coming to an end and by the time the sun moves into your sign on Sunday, your outlook on life will have improved tenfold. The next four weeks are sure to be special, but what can you do to make them extra special?

You must not let any weird or wonderful ideas take hold in your mind today and over the weekend. Your fears and anxieties are not based on anything real but mainly exist only in your head, and can thus be safely ignored.

There are so many options open to you at the moment that you may be confused as to which route to take. All will become clear when the sun moves in your favour this coming weekend, so be open to new ideas and be ready to act.

If you are having doubts about what you are working on then you might as well stop for a while and give both your mind and body a rest. With the sun about to move into the career area of your chart the way ahead will soon become clear.

If you are tired of the same old faces and the same old scene you will soon get an opportunity to change things. Cosmic activity in the most adventurous area of your chart over the next few days will inspire you to look further afield for your pleasures.

If your financial situation is not as healthy as you would like it to be then what happens over the next few weeks will give you the chance to balance the books again. Try to stay in control of your spending habits in the future.

You know that you are in the right and that those who disagree with you will pay the price for getting it wrong. Don’t get too complacent about life though. The universe has a way of bringing down to earth those who start believing they know it all.

Have you said too much or have you said too little? At some stage this weekend other people will leave you in no doubt what they think about your communication skills. If they criticize you, don’t take it too much to heart. Learn from what they say.

Life does not have a duty to come to you and the sooner you come to terms with that fact the better. If you take the attitude that everything you want will just fall in your lap this weekend it’s quite likely you will be disappointed.

The more others sing your praises now the more likely it is they will want something from you later on. What you should be asking yourself is: What do you want from them? The omens are good that you can come to a mutually beneficial deal.

You don’t have to suffer in silence, Cancer. If you need help just ask for it. You may be surprised to discover that friends, colleagues and even strangers are more than happy to come to your aid. You have, after all, done plenty for them in the past.

Some people appear to believe that you are spending more time enjoying yourself than you are taking care of business of one kind or another, and they are right, you are. Don’t change to please them – it’s important that you please yourself.

You appear to be in a spendthrift mood at the moment, which is not like you at all. Try to avoid the temptation to waste large sums of money on things you don’t need – or at least keep the receipts so you can get a refund later on!

If you confront what you are scared of this weekend you will find that it no longer has any kind of hold or power over you. Face up to your fear and try to understand that it is just one more illusion that can safely be ignored.

At some stage today or tomorrow it will be quite obvious to you that people are telling you what they think you desire to hear. It is essential that you demand to know what is really going on in their minds. And be prepared to be shocked!

The more desperate someone seems to be to get you involved in their latest plan or project the more you should hold off and wait to see how things develop. Chances are there is nothing to worry about but you can’t be too careful.

You are now moving into a phase where, if you know what you want and if you are prepared to work harder than your rivals, all things are possible. You have never been one to do things by half measures, so success is assured.

Something you thought would never work will suddenly start going well for you this weekend. So what has changed? Most likely your big brain, without you realizing it, has started to piece things together so you now understand what needs to be done.

This is a very busy time for you, so pace yourself sensibly and don’t take on so much over the next 48 hours that you risk burning yourself out. There are just a few things that have to be done and many things you can safely ignore.

Trust what your inner voice tells you over the coming 12 months, even if people with more experience than you tell you the opposite. Deep down you already know what you should be doing with your life, so quiet your mind and listen – and then act!

If you must point out where a friend or family member has been going wrong at least try to make your words sound positive. For the sake of your long-term relationship you need to be a bit more subtle than usual when handing out criticism.

You won’t be much interested in work today, but that’s okay. The last few weeks have been intensely busy and it’s natural that there should be some sort of reaction. Give yourself time to replenish both your physical and mental energy.

This is no time to be indecisive where an affair of the heart is concerned. If you need to let someone know how much you care for them then come right out and say it. Don’t worry, they won’t slap your face for coming on too strong!

There are many things you can get emotional about but the one thing you must not abandon logic and reason over is money. If an investment plan of some sort has not lived up to expectations then pull your cash out of it immediately.

A problem will only be a problem today if you are determined to think of it as a problem. If, on the other hand, you think of it as a challenge then most likely it won’t be a problem at all. Sometimes Leo you take life far too seriously.

As the sun leaves your birth sign today so your energy, both mental and physical, may tail off a bit, but that is to be expected. It’s just a sign that you need to slow down and focus on one or two aims rather than one or two dozen.

The sun moves into your sign today and already you can sense that your luck could be changing for the better. Indeed it is, but good things won’t just happen as if by magic – it’s up to you to seize the initiative and get things started. Start now!

Don’t rush into something that you are not 100 per cent certain is in your best interests. At this time of year you are desperate to achieve things but you also need to be aware of events going on around you – and how they could impact on you.

If you have your doubts about what a friend or family member is up to then you must speak up. They may be annoyed with you interfering to begin with but it won’t be long before they realize you are right – and then they won’t stop thanking you!

If you feel like doing something out of the ordinary, or even outrageous, don’t think twice about it, just do it. The eyes of the world will be on you over the next few days, so pull out all the stops and give them something worth watching.

This is going to be a good week for friendships of all kinds, and even if a relationship has not been going well of late it will start to go well now. You don’t have to do anything special, you just need to be ready to have fun together.

Someone seems to believe that they are in your debt and wants to repay you. Even if you don’t actually want anything from them you should find a way they can help you. It will make them feel good about themselves, and that’s a nice aim in itself.

A Mars-Mercury link on your birthday will do wonders both for your mind and your ability to communicate. Your powers of persuasion are such that no one will be able to deny you what it is you desire. Try not to get carried away though!

Someone who has more experience in certain areas than you will point you in the right direction today and if you are smart you will do what they say. Don’t let your ego get in the way. You cannot possibly know everything Aries!

You will find yourself in a number of challenging situations over the next few days, and you will master each and every one of them. Your ability to stay calm when under immense pressure will do your reputation no harm at all.

Some rather strange people will come into your life this week but it won’t faze you one little bit. You rather enjoy mixing with those who are different in some way – it’s part of your Gemini nature to be attracted to bizarre situations.

Don’t get angry if every time you come up with an idea someone tries to shoot it down. Constant criticism is something you will have to get used to over the next few weeks, because others are sure to be jealous of your skill and success.

Be careful today when dealing with cash and material things such as property and possessions. It’s unlikely that anyone will try to cheat you as such but it will be easy to make the kind of mistakes that could cost you serious money.

You can, if you wish, force others to go along with your plans but if you do, you will sour at least one important relationship, and maybe several. You don’t need to be pushy to get things done, you just need to turn on the charm.

Forget about the past and focus only on the future. What’s done is done and cannot be undone, so get rid of any negative thoughts and feelings you may have and start a new life for yourself right now. Each day can be a new beginning.

A friend or family member will say something today that does not fit with what you want to believe about yourself or the world in general. Be that as it may it is obvious that they are correct, so it’s you who must change your ways.

You are never afraid to speak your mind and friends and work colleagues will be impressed today by your willingness to call it as you see it. However, employers and other important people may not be quite so amused, so watch your back!

The more noise you have made about what you are going to accomplish the more you will be expected to deliver. The sun in the career area of your chart at this time of year makes you intensely ambitious, but are your aims realistic?

You must not let your mind slip into negative modes of thinking this week, because it will be so hard to snap yourself out of it. As you think so you are, so think happy and you will be happy, which in turn will make success more likely.

It may seem as if certain people are being selfish, and maybe they are, but why should that worry you? The message of the stars today is that it is not what other people do that matters but how you choose to react to it. Choose to be positive.

A full moon on your birthday, as well as a powerful sun-Saturn link, means you will be challenged again and again over the coming 12 months. Never doubt you have what it takes and never doubt you have the right to take whatever makes you happy.

Today’s full moon in your sign could see you acting in ways that are guaranteed to get a negative response from those around you. Whatever grievances you may have you must keep a lid on them. If you explode it will be you who suffers most.

So much seems to be happening at the moment and if you are honest you will admit that you don’t understand it all. But that’s okay. Just because you cannot see the bigger picture does not mean the bigger picture does not exist.

The more you socialize over the next few days the more likely it is you will learn something to your advantage. Make an effort to get out and about and make sure you spend time with people who know how to have fun.

You may be tempted to tell someone in a position of authority what you think of them today but the full moon warns that is not a good idea. It’s quite likely you will need this person’s support very soon, so don’t burn your bridges.

Everyone is entitled to their opinion and you must keep that fact in mind today if you want to avoid the kind of arguments and confrontations that can easily ruin friendships. Put your side of the story by all means, but listen to the other side too.

Take care you don’t fall out with someone you may need to stay on good terms with. Your financial situation is such at the moment that you cannot afford to end alliances just because you don’t like the way certain people choose to operate.

You must not allow other people to dictate to you in any way, shape or form, today, not even if you and they believe it is for your own good. Once they find they can tell you what to do you will find it hard to break free again.

If you allow yourself to be talked into doing something you don’t want to do it’s quite likely you will regret it before the end of the week. There is no easy way to say “No” to people you like and admire but it has to be done.

Today’s full moon will encourage you to be even more outspoken than you usually are but if you say too much it could cause all kinds of trouble later on. Affairs of the heart, especially, need to be handled with a great deal of care.

Because today’s full moon cuts across a major angle of your chart you must expect a certain amount of opposition, both in your personal life and at work. You must not – repeat, not – react in an emotional manner. Stay calm and the storm will pass.

You seem to be a bit excitable at the moment, which isn’t like you at all. Maybe it’s the influence of the full moon but whatever the reason your passions are clearly running high. Just be careful they don’t run away with you completely!

Be careful what you spend your money on today because once you start flashing the cash you may not be able to stop. Above all you need to realize that you are under no obligation to help other people financially. Give love, not money.

If you feel the need to transform your life, to change your existence in major ways, now is the time to move from the thinking about it stage to the doing it stage. Just take one small step in the right direction, then keep walking. Soon you’ll be flying!

If you need help today you must ask for it. Don’t worry that friends and colleagues might think less of you – everyone needs assistance once in a while, even an Aries. It’s time to recognize that you are only human, and all humans have weaknesses.

Cosmic activity in the work area of your chart means that others expect you to deliver and if you don’t your reputation could quickly head south. In future you might like to think twice before agreeing to take on so many new jobs!

Creative activities and affairs of the heart are under excellent stars now and if you have not yet got the rewards and applause you think you are entitled to, don’t worry, it’s just a matter of time. Forget about everything else and focus on success.

It’s good to let off steam once in a while but don’t complain too loudly that you have been hard done by. The planets warn if you make too much noise certain people may try to make life even more difficult for you than it is now.

You will have plenty to say for yourself today and that’s good because too often you keep quiet when you really should speak up. Just make sure that any claims you make can be backed up by facts, because your enemies will check up on them.

You need to pay much more attention to your resources. For too long you have drifted along not worrying too much about where the money comes from, and even less about where it goes to, but that will soon need to change. Earn more and spend less!

All things are possible for you now. No, really, they are! As the sun moves through the most dynamic area of your chart you will find it increasingly easy to make good things happen, both for yourself and for other people. Be amazing Libra!

What you need to keep in mind today is that no matter how bad things might seem now they will get better. The sun in the most sensitive area of your chart at this time of year makes things look a bit gloomy, but you can still shine.

You are rarely troubled by self-doubt and even if things go wrong today you will carry on regardless and let nothing faze you. Experience has taught you that events have a way of turning out right in the end. It seems to be a cosmic law.

Important people are watching you closely, so make sure they like what they see. Capricorn is a sign that always finishes what it starts and that fact alone will help you stand out from the crowd. You possess staying power and that’s rare.

The sun in Libra at this time of year makes you more adventurous than usual, so head off some place new and enjoy yourself. Even if you can’t get away at short notice at least start planning your next vacation. Always have something to look forward to.

The planets warn that you have been living beyond your means for too long and the time of reckoning will soon be here. Don’t worry though – the universe will bring new opportunities your way. But it’s you who must take advantage of them.

A sun-Mars link on your birthday will endow you with the kind of energy levels that make all things possible. But don’t try to do everything. Focus on your No. 1 aim and make that the focus of the year ahead. Greatness awaits you.

You should be having the time of your life now and today’s sun-Mars link promises it will be fun all the way. This is also a good time for affairs of the heart and there is every chance you are about to meet some pretty amazing people.

You don’t seem to have a care in the world at the moment, which is nice, but don’t start thinking that life will always be this easy. On the work front, especially, there will be a number of challenges over the next few days, so stay alert.

Socially and romantically this is one of the best times of the year for you, so put chores on hold and don’t let anyone burst the bubble of happiness that surrounds you. Your positive attitude will help others be positive too. Everybody wins!

Be generous with your time today and do what you can to help those who are not having it anywhere near as easy as you are. The more you help others now the more the universe will help you later on. Good deeds are good business.

This is no time to stick with tried and tested methods – you must be more adventurous. An excellent sun-Mars link will help you be more creative and also make it easier for you to communicate with like-minded people. Go for it Leo!

The best way to avoid unpleasant situations is to ignore them. Keep telling yourself that no matter what other people may say and do you are the only one who controls what occurs in your life. Avoid confrontation at all costs today.

The sun in your sign will bring all sorts of new and interesting possibilities your way and today’s sun-Mars link will give you the drive and the energy to take full advantage of them. Life is what you choose to make of it, so make it a masterpiece!

Make sure that important people know who you are and what you can do. If you feel that a change of job, or even a whole new career path, would be of benefit to you then go for it. You don’t have to ask anyone’s permission to move on.

Get out and about and meet people today because someone you encounter on your travels could play a major role in your life. And don’t limit yourself to the kind of people you already know about – be a bit more adventurous in your friendships.

Today’s highly positive cosmic picture urges you to let go of fear and let fate take its course. The changes you are going through at the moment may be unsettling but one day you will look back and realize they were exactly what you needed.

Even if you are the kind of Aquarius who prefers to keep your emotions under control you will want to express yourself openly and joyously today. There are so many good things going on in your life right now, so stand up and shout about it!

If you make an effort to get on with people today there is no limit to how much you can accomplish. It will also help if you can learn to accept that some people simply do not want to do the things that you do. It’s no big deal.

The most important thing this year is that you keep faith with yourself. Others may doubt you but you must never doubt yourself. The skills and talents you were born with will find a highly rewarding outlet over the coming 12 months.

Try not to be so aggressive in your opinions today. By all means stand up for what you believe but there is no need to make a war of it. You can disagree with both friends and foes and still find ways to get along on a personal level.

If someone in a position of authority says or does something that you fundamentally disagree with today try not to let it get to you personally. The planets warn if you choose to make a fight of it most likely it will be you who loses.

You have always been a bit of a rebel and the more others try to tell you what you should be doing today the more you are likely to ignore them. Watch out for double bluffs though – someone may say one thing knowing you will do the opposite.

If you feel that a rumor of some sort is damaging your credibility then you must do something about it. If you try to ignore it others may take that as a sign that what is being said about you is true. It’s not, so speak up!

One-to-one relationships seem to be more troublesome than usual, due no doubt to the presence of Mars in your opposite sign. Keep reminding yourself that life is not a battle. More will be achieved over time by compromise and cooperation.

You are strongly advised not to make any new plans for the coming weekend as you have too much on your plate already. If an authority figure asks you to take on extra responsibilities you must turn them down. You’ll be the loser if you do not.

The tempo of life has picked up a lot over the past few days and it will get even faster over the coming weekend. The good news is you will enjoy the challenges that come your way as they give you a chance to prove yourself. And you will.

There will come a point today when you finally have enough of someone forcing you to do things you don’t want to do and you hit back at them. Good for you. Do only what feels right to you and if they don’t like it . . . too bad!

The sun and Mars are very much on your side at the moment and endowing you with huge amounts of energy. Don’t take on too many tasks though. It is quality work that will get you noticed, so do less but to a much higher standard.

Because you have built up a head of steam in recent weeks your momentum will carry you on for some time yet. It will, however, pay you to start looking at ways of decreasing your workload, maybe by not trying to do everything yourself!

Mars in your birth sign makes you hugely ambitious and what you do today and over the weekend will amaze even those who thought they knew you well. Seize the initiative and make sure the world knows you are a force to be reckoned with.

Security in life is important, of course, but it should not be more important to you than freedom. The message of your birthday chart is that you need to let go of what appears to be holding you up – because in fact it is just holding you back.

You may have to dance to someone else’s tune as the new week begins but you will still be generally free of restrictions and limitations. If others have power over you it can only be because you have given them that power – so take it back!

It may seem to some people as if you are dreaming the impossible dream but they do not possess your level of self-belief. Whatever it is you want out of life you will find a way to get it, be it today, tomorrow or further into the future.

Try not to be too sensitive to criticism and steer clear of revealing your feelings, especially if they are negative in nature! Whatever happens over the next 24 hours, be it good, bad or indifferent, the important thing is that you deal with it calmly.

Loved ones will be rather demanding today and you may have to make sacrifices you don’t want to make. Be that as it may you recognize that you have an obligation to assist them, so do so with good grace. One day they will return the favour.

Make sure those around you know how you feel today. Sometimes you can be a bit too self-controlled for your own good, and rather than suffer in silence it may pay you to kick up a bit of a fuss. But only a bit – don’t overdo it!

There is a danger now that you could go on a spending spree and buy things you cannot afford, and probably don’t need to possess. For big purchases make sure you get some sort of money-back guarantee – you may have to use it quite quickly.

Put your own needs first as the new week begins and don’t feel in the least bit guilty that you appear to be doing well while others are struggling. People never have been and never will be equal in their abilities. There will always be winners and losers.

Make sure you don’t let your workload get on top of you this week. Draw up a schedule you know you can keep to and refuse to deviate from it, not even for people who promise you more money if you take on extra chores.

Someone you meet on your travels today could become a useful contact in the near future, so keep your eyes and ears open and don’t ignore people just because they seem a bit “different” in their ways. Think how you might look to them!

The most important thing now is that you look and act confident in all situations, because if your rivals get the idea that you are even a little bit anxious they will go out of their way to play on it. Pretend you don’t have a care in the world.

Yes, your head is full of fantastic ideas but how many of them are ever going to see the light of day? Your main task now should be to focus on the two or three things that are likely to have the biggest impact. Ignore everything else.

Pluto’s influence on your birthday is sure to make you more intense than usual, but maybe that’s no bad thing. You’ve been through your happy-go-lucky phase and now it’s time to get passionate about what’s important in life.

If you get involved in some kind of power struggle today most likely you will regret it. So much is going well for you now that you can afford to ignore what other people are saying about you, be it good or bad.

Chances are someone will try to annoy you today, most likely in the hope that you will overreact and do something silly. But you’re too smart to fall for that kind of trick. Keep your temper under control and, above all, keep smiling.

The sun in Libra at this time of year is fortunate for you and there will be occasions when you wonder if you really deserve all the good things that are coming your way. Of course you do. In fact no one deserves them more.

You will find yourself in the kind of situation today where the odds are stacked heavily against you but no way are you going to back down. Don’t make too much of an issue of it though. Be smart and live to fight another day.

If you compare yourself to other people you will always be dissatisfied with your lot, so focus on your own skills and talents and ignore what everyone else might be up to. Believe that life has purpose and meaning. You’re doing better than most.

If certain facts and figures don’t seem to add up today you must make it your responsibility to find out why. It could be there is a perfectly good explanation – or it could be someone is trying to cheat you. Either way, be careful.

This could be an emotional day for you, the kind of day when you are ridiculously happy one minute and angry for no good reason the next. Eventually your mood will settle down, but for now just sit back and ride it out!

If your heart isn’t in what others expect you to do then don’t do it – yes, it’s really that simple. What are they going to do? Force you? No one can compel a Scorpio to do things they don’t want to do, not now, not ever!

You may be a touch unhappy with your lot, but Pluto’s influence warns this is probably not the best time to start making changes, not least because they could end up costing you a great deal more than you expected.

Pluto in your sign brings out the perfectionist in you but if you are wise you will accept that not even a Capricorn can get it right every day of the week. Don’t set your standards too high – it might hurt when you fail to reach them.

How come you seem to be in the right place at the right time so much of late? Maybe it has something to do with the sun in the sympathetic sign of Libra. Whatever the reason, make the most if it – you know how fickle fate can be.

Few things in life come free of risk but that doesn’t mean you should go looking for it. Try to steer clear of situations that could easily get out of hand – and the kind of people who enjoy making them get out of hand.

There is nothing wrong with your life but there may be something wrong with your attitude, and if you can change that then your fortunes will change for the better as well. Love. Laugh. Learn. Make those three little words your three guiding stars.

If someone betrays your trust this weekend don’t let it make you cynical about life in general. Most people are still honest and trustworthy and would not dream of taking you for a ride. It’s only the very few you have to watch out for.

You may be hurting on the inside, but on the outside try to make it look as if you don’t have a care in the world. Put on a brave face, go out and have fun and before you know it your worries and woes will be in the past.

As far as a dispute of some kind is concerned, the facts of the situation are very much on your side and you won’t find it hard to make your opponents look bad. But don’t do it. Win, but win in as friendly a way as possible.

You will be rather assertive today and there is nothing wrong with that at all. However, you are strongly advised not to force others to do things they clearly don’t want to do. Their feelings are as important to them as your success is to you.

The more others know about what you are planning the more likely it is they will oppose you in some, so don’t give too much away today and certainly don’t let them know that you may not be as confident as you look.

You need to sit down with someone and have a serious talk about your relationship. You have fallen out more than once in recent weeks and there is clearly something that needs to be dealt with. Approach the issue with mutual respect.

The way to turn your fortunes around is by letting important people know who you are and what you can do. What will really impress them though is your amazing attention to detail. That, plus devotion to duty, is a sure-fire recipe for success.

Whatever you do today someone is sure to criticize you for it, so you might as well close your ears and do it anyway. Fortunately, you are not the sort to let other people’s disapproval affect you. In fact, you enjoy winding them up a bit.

You may think you can get away with outrageous behaviour but the planets warn you could easily push your luck too far and almost instantly regret it today. Keep your excesses at a reasonable level – reasonable by your standards anyway!

The most important thing today is that you stick to the rules. If you stray from the straight and narrow even by the tiniest fraction the universe will punish you for it. You’ve pushed your luck as far as it will go. Now get serious.

Co-operation is the key to success today. If you choose to go it alone you will get so far but no further as events conspire to limit your ability to get things done. You don’t need all the credit for yourself – there is plenty to go around.

Try not to be so much of a perfectionist Pisces. Remind yourself at regular intervals that you are human like everyone else and like everyone else you make mistakes from time to time. Don’t get into a habit of making them though!

Your determination to succeed is admirable but you also need to know when it is time to back off and give yourself a breather. Not even a Libra can give 100 per cent every day of the year. Learn to be kind to yourself over the coming 12 months.

If you want people to understand what you are trying to say you will have to spell it out for them in words of three syllables or fewer. Not everyone is as sharp or as quick on the uptake as you – in fact hardly anyone is!

Now that Pluto, planet of power, is moving in your favour again you won’t be so reluctant to take on new responsibilities. But don’t take on too many. Even a Taurus has limits and you are getting pretty close to yours already.

This will be one of those days when you want nothing more than to be left alone with your thoughts. If anyone is so silly as to invade your personal space they will soon learn the error of their ways. You’re in no mood to be subtle.

It does not matter in the slightest if certain people are talking about you behind your back, there is nothing they can do to influence you. Cancer is a cardinal sign and once you have made up your mind about something that’s it, it gets done.

Today’s Mercury-Pluto link warns that people will tell you what they think you want to hear, and what will further their own interests. In which case, take everything you hear with a large pinch of salt – except when it’s your inner voice talking.

There are so many distractions in your life and so many trivial things going on in the world. Your task today is to block it all out of your conscious mind and focus on your No. 1 aim. What matters to you is the only thing that matters.

Someone whose arrogance annoys you will give you a hard time today – and you must give them a hard time back. Sadly, the only language some people respect is the language of strength, so stand up for yourself, and maybe shout a bit too!

There are some tasks that are too important to be left to other people and the task that is in front of you now is one of them. It may be tempting to sit back while others do the heavy lifting but that could be a huge mistake.

Yes, someone you are close to emotionally has betrayed your trust but don’t let your disappointment show. This is one of those situations where, if you speak up, it could make the situation worse than before. Keep quiet and let it pass.

A little bit of mental effort on your part will go a long way toward convincing people in positions of power that you have what it takes to compete at the highest level. You’re not just as good as your rivals, you’re many times better!

Don’t think about giving up on something that is proving a tough nut to crack. According to the planets you are very close to a breakthrough but if you give up now you will always wonder what might have been. Stick with it!

What starts off as bad news early in the day will develop into good news later in the day, so don’t get too dismayed by what you hear. They say every cloud has a silver lining and this particular cloud could be tinged with gold as well.

The most important thing for you over the coming year is that you stand up for yourself both in your private life and at work. Sometimes you can be too nice for your own good, so put your own needs first for a change. You’ll feel better for it.

The people you have to deal with today, both at home and at work, will be rather demanding and there may be times when you come close to losing your temper. Maybe you should. Maybe that’s what is needed to make them see sense.

There is really no such thing as coincidence in life and something that appears to be a random event today is actually part of a much bigger plan. Try to work out what that plan might be – it could make life so much easier to deal with.

This is a great time for creative activities and you must not let anyone tell you that what you are dreaming of cannot be done. That may be true for them but it is not true for you. Where Gemini is concerned not even the sky is the limit.

It may at times be hard to control your feelings but control them you must or you might say something you later regret. The sun in Libra at this time of year can make you rather emotional, so make allowances for other people, and for yourself.

This is both a busy and an enjoyable time for you but there is a danger that you could do too much and burn yourself out. You cannot party until the early hours then get up bright and fresh the next morning for work. Not every day anyway!

This is an important time of year for money matters and business issues, and if you need to find ways to earn more or spend less – or maybe both – now is the time to put your thinking cap on and come up with some serious answers.

Things are going well for you at the moment but you are doing so many things on so many levels that you may wish that life was a bit more relaxed. A few weeks ago you were lamenting that life was too quiet. You’re never satisfied Libra!

There may be times when it feels as if the world is against you, but if you remain positive of mind and busy of body you will get through this phase unscathed. It’s quite natural to feel low occasionally, so don’t make a big issue of it.

You rarely lack for courage and confidence but you need to realize that those attributes alone won’t get you where you need to go or get you what you want to possess. Common sense is a factor too. How much of that do you have?

Career-wise so much is possible for you now, but a lot will depend on how well you can focus your power on a single target or goal. Don’t scatter your energy and your thoughts in so many directions that you end up achieving nothing.

Cosmic activity in the sympathetic sign of Libra will give your confidence a boost today, not that you really need it! Be creative by all means but start thinking about your next vacation, too. Where might be nice at this time of year?

You may be of the opinion that if you ignore a problem long enough it will go away of its own accord but that isn’t going to happen, so wise up and do something specific that starts the process of change. It’s up to you to make things happen.

Venus, your ruler, turns retrograde on your birthday this year, which suggests you need to start asking yourself some serious questions about your values. You also need to remind yourself at regular intervals that people are more important than things.

Why are people you don’t always get along with so eager to get close to you now? Do they have a less-than-honest motive? Yes, most likely they do, so be on your guard and don’t give away anything that might be of value to them.

If your inner voice warns that someone you have dealings with is not to be trusted you must pay attention. Even if you have successfully done business with them in the past that does not guarantee good relations now or in the future. Be worldly wise.

The more fantastic your ideas may be the more important it is to keep them to yourself. If your rivals get a hint of what you are thinking they may decide to steal your ideas and use them to enrich themselves– which may be unfair but isn’t illegal.

If something you are involved with goes wrong today you must not blame yourself for it. It was a team effort and just as the team takes the applause when things go right so the team must face the consequences together when things go wrong.

The planets warn there is a danger that if you are too eager to hit back at your critics today you may encourage them to attack you all the more, setting off a tit-for-tat spiral that is unlikely to lead to anywhere good. Just let it go.

By all means give some serious thought to an idea that comes at you out of the blue today but don’t start thinking it is the answer to all your prayers. At the very least you will have to work extra hard to get it up and running.

What occurs today is likely to come as a complete surprise to you but looking back at it a day or two from now you will realize you should have seen it coming. Next time, try looking at the whole picture rather than just the individual parts.

Let fate guide you and don’t be surprised if it takes you some place that is a lot of fun. At this time of year more than most you seem to expect bad things to happen but it is always your mind that creates your world, so be positive!

You may not think of yourself as an intuitive person but there is a part of your mind that knows all the answers and if you allow it to come through today you will discover some pretty amazing things. The world may not be what you think it is.

Something you thought had been forgotten will make a comeback today and no matter how uncomfortable it may be for you it must be faced up to. If you carry on pretending the issue does not exist it will carry on growing in importance.

It may be that someone has deceived you but even if they have it’s unlikely it will do you much harm, so maybe you should just let it pass without mention – this time. If it happens again though you can and you must take decisive action.

There may be a dozen and one things going on in your world at the moment but don’t start thinking you can ignore your responsibilities while you have fun. You also need to be aware that getting involved will cost you money – lots of money!

If you listen to what others tell you this year all you will hear are reasons why you should do nothing. Ignore everyone else and listen to what your own heart says. Yes it does speak, and it knows what you need to do. So do it!

As the first and most dynamic sign of the zodiac you often get your way through sheer force of personality, but the planets warn you will need to take a more subtle approach this weekend. If you don’t know the meaning of the word then look it up!

Not everyone is as honest as you Taurus and if you keep that fact in mind today you should do okay. You are certainly less likely to be cheated by people who measure their own success by what they can steal from others. Yes, they do exist.

Someone in a position of power will make what looks like a pretty good offer this weekend but you should think long and hard before you accept it. Are there any hidden costs you will have to incur? Find out before you sign up.

A somewhat negative link between the sun and Neptune warns that your imagination could play tricks on you over the next 48 hours. By all means visualize the life you would like to be living in the future but steer clear of fantasies.

Being the sort of person who speaks first and only thinks about what you have said later on – if at all – it’s quite likely you will say something this weekend that upsets a friend. If they get angry just say “sorry”. No lasting harm will be done.

You may say or do something that a loved one takes the wrong way this weekend, but chances are you will be completely oblivious to the fact. If they start acting strangely make it your business to find out what’s up with them – it may be you!

A tactic that worked well for you in the past is unlikely to work quite so well this weekend, so be prepared to take a different approach if the situation calls for it. And remember, the best tactic of all is to be honest with everyone.

Don’t push yourself too hard this weekend. The sun in the most sensitive area of your chart, at odds with Neptune, means you may be a bit vague about what it is you should be doing – in which case it might be safer to do nothing at all.

No matter how easygoing you are most of the time you won’t be able to keep your feelings under wraps today and tomorrow. Find a constructive outlet for your more negative emotions – sport and other physical activities could help you immensely.

Why do you think you have something to prove? Why do you think you need to be bigger and better than everyone else? Whatever the reason it will pay you to calm down and take life at a more relaxed pace this weekend. Don’t bust a gut!

The sun in Libra gives you loads of energy and you should be using it to finish at least some of those tasks you started earlier in the year but never got round to completing. Don’t overdo it though – give yourself time to daydream as well.

Don’t try to force people to do things against their will, because your efforts are sure to backfire. The only way to get what you want is to make sure that your desires match up with the desires of friends and family. Work together towards a single aim.

A sun-Saturn link on your birthday means you will have to work extra hard to reach your goals. It also means that when you get to the place you’ve been aiming for the sense of satisfaction you feel will be tremendous. It’s an effort worth making.

You may not be interested in a social activity of some kind but the planets suggest if you take the plunge you will enjoy yourself. Just take care you don’t enjoy yourself too much – this is one of those days when you could go to extremes.

A friend or work colleague will make something that is actually quite risky sound like the simplest thing in the world today. Don’t be fooled. If they ask you to invest your time and money in the project be polite but give it a miss.

You seem to be a bit too assertive, even aggressive, at the moment, and that could work against you if you offend someone who is big enough to hit back hard. If you can be a little less abrasive today you will get a lot more done.

You are not the type to sit on the fence and watch the world go by – as a cardinal sign you prefer to get involved. Which is fine, but the planets warn if you get too deeply involved in someone else’s business today you may never get out again!

“Don’t shoot the messenger” appears to be the warning from the stars today Leo. If a friend or family member says something you don’t like it’s not because they want to hurt you, it’s because they feel they have no choice in the matter.

By all means be ambitious but try not to be impulsive. More than anything else now you must be 100 per cent convinced that the course of action you are about to take is really for the best. Always have a purpose, and always have a plan.

Your calm Libra exterior is likely to crack a bit as someone annoys you to such an extent that you can’t help but let your feelings show. Hopefully they are smart enough to get the message. If not, it could get a bit nasty by day’s end.

If you try to force people to do things they don’t want to do today you are asking for trouble – and you’ll get it big time. Scorpio may be a persuasive sign but sometimes you have to accept that no matter what you offer it won’t be enough.

Today’s sun-Saturn link could make you a bit reticent today, a bit reluctant to take risks. That may seem out of character but it could also save you from making a huge mistake. Listen to what your subconscious mind is trying to tell you.

No one is out to get you. No one is scheming behind your back. Although your ruling planet Saturn is under a bit of pressure at the moment that does not mean you should fear the worst. In fact, fearing it is more likely to make it happen.

Try not to take what happens over the next 24 hours too seriously because the planets indicate that nothing bad will come of it – at least, nothing bad for you personally. Also, what happens in the world at large must not be allowed to affect your mood.

It may be frustrating that someone is dragging their feet and refusing to move as quickly as you would like them to but there is precious little you can do about it. Do what you can to hurry them along but don’t get angry or upset. It’s not worth it.

The message of your birthday chart this year is that you should throw yourself into social activities and not worry too much about more “serious” matters. They may be a big deal for you now but new friendships will make them look small.

You may think that giving up on something is the only course of action left open to you, but it isn’t true. The approaching new moon means it might be wise to wait a while. Chances are you will be thinking more clearly come this time tomorrow.

Can you trust what other people tell you? Probably not. The planets warn that even partners and loved ones are giving you bad information. They may not be doing it on purpose, of course, but you still need to err on the side of caution.

Once again you seem to be worrying about something that you have no way of changing – which is pointless. Fate will guide you in whatever direction you are destined to take, so stop worrying, sit back and enjoy the ride. It WILL be fun!

Deep down you know that money and possessions are of little worth, but you still need to put food on the table and that means you must get your financial act together as soon as possible. Get loved ones to help you – they will if you ask.

You may be tempted to get involved in a friend’s domestic situation today but the planets warn that nothing good will come of it, so keep your distance. The best way to help them is to let them learn from their own mistakes and experiences.

You have noticed a distinct difference in the direction your life seems to be taking in recent weeks. Don’t fight it. Life moves in cycles and no part of the cycle is better or worse than the part that went before. Live in and for the moment.

There is an urgency about you now that was lacking earlier in the year and it will grow even stronger when the moon is new in your sign tomorrow. But don’t let your desire to get things done cloud your judgment. Avoid making silly mistakes.

If you play hard to get over the next 24 hours you will send just about everyone you know the wrong kind of signal. Make an effort to show people, especially those in positions of power, that you are still in the game and still hungry for success.

By all means plan something new but don’t start on it just yet. Tomorrow’s new moon will bring to light information that could see you changing your plans, to your benefit, at the last possible moment, so the less you do today the better.

It’s good that you have the confidence to take risks but that does not mean you should start taking them wildly. Tomorrow’s new moon in the career area of your chart, the effects of which you will start feeling today, will point you in the right direction.

You may be tempted to end a partnership or relationship that has been nothing but trouble of late but is that such a wise move? Give it a day or two before you say or do anything you might later regret. Maybe it’s still worth keeping alive.

The most important thing now is that you don’t let vague fears and forebodings hold you back from doing what you want to do. Is this the only life we live? Who knows, but act as if it is. Don’t let today, or any other day, go to waste.

A new moon on your birthday makes this the perfect day to start a new project or even a whole new way of life. If there is something you have dreamed of doing for months or even years then do it now. Just act and let the universe guide you.

Jupiter in the wealth area of your chart means there is every chance you will come into money, but there is also a chance that you will lose what you gain by wasting it buying things for people who are too cheap to pay for themselves. Wise up!

Someone you work with will offer you some excellent advice today but because it is not what you were hoping to hear you may be tempted to ignore it. That would be a serious mistake. Don’t let your ego blind you to reality.

A new moon in the most dynamic area of your chart means you will be tempted to go faster than ever today, but as you are racing ahead at top speed already that could be a dangerous thing to do. Try moving at a more sensible pace.

Anything is possible for you now but that does not mean you should try to do everything. If you want to get the most from the next few days you must focus your energy in a single direction and put secondary interests on hold for a while.

Why are you attaching so much importance to things that only a few days ago would have meant nothing to you at all? Whatever the reason you need to get over it, and quickly. Attitude is everything, so start thinking and acting in more positive ways.

You may be eager to start something new and you know it could be a big success, but can you afford to take on such a costly commitment? You don’t have to give up on your dream but you do have to bring it down to earth a little.

A lot of good things are coming your way and today’s new moon in your sign is sure to bring something, or someone, into your life that makes you believe the good times will never end. They must, one day, of course, but for now just enjoy!

Jupiter in your sign endows you with a surplus of optimism and self-belief and if you are smart you will spread some of it around to people who don’t possess your amazingly positive outlook on life. Remember, what you give you get back tenfold.

A good deed you did for a friend will be paid back in full today, with a little extra added as a “thank you” from the universe. If you get out into the world and meet new people there will be many more days like this in the future.

Be careful what you choose to believe today because there are a lot of strange ideas doing the rounds at the moment. Yes, sometimes there really are plots and conspiracies to watch out for, but don’t start believing that everyone is out to get you!

The sun in Libra is an excellent influence for you and today’s new moon will be the cosmic icing on the cake. Self-belief is a wonderful thing and you have so much of it now that almost anything is possible. Note that word “almost” though!
