It’s not often you take silly risks but you could do so today, and if there is money involved you could end up making the kind of loss you cannot afford. Stick with what you’ve got and be happy with that. You’re still doing better than most.

A Mercury-Uranus link on your birthday suggests you will be looking for new ways to improve your lifestyle and some of the ideas you come up with may be rather exotic. Go for it though. If anyone can make the unusual work, you can!

It may seem as if you don’t have a care in the world but you can at times be extremely sensitive and you may find it hard to hide that side of your nature today. But why on earth would you want to? Never be scared of your feelings.

Forget about doing the right thing – do what feels right for you. Cosmic activity in your opposite sign of Scorpio suggests others will try to get you to see and do things their way but you are under no obligation. Be true to yourself.

You need to let certain individuals know that you have no intention of putting up with their negative remarks. You have serious things to do and you cannot afford to waste time on those who always seem to see the worst in the world.

You may be tempted to turn down a social invitation today but the planets warn that might be a mistake. Someone you meet on your travels could turn out to be very useful to you over the next few months. Enjoy meeting people, even when you don’t!

According to the planets you may be feeling guilty because things are going well for you but badly for someone you know. There’s really no need. What’s happening to them is designed by the universe to help them grow. Ultimately, it’s all good.

As Mercury, your ruler, moves into the area of your chart associated with how you think and how you communicate, you won’t have just one good idea, you’ll have dozens! Make a list of them but don’t try to do them all at the same time!

Don’t worry if your cash-flow situation is not as healthy as you would like it to be. Now that Mercury, planet of the mind, has moved into the money area of your chart you can find ways to make ends meet again, and maybe even turn a profit!

Jupiter in your sign gives you no end of confidence and with mind planet Mercury moving in your favour, to, few things will faze you today. If you feel the need to satisfy your material desires, do so without feeling guilty about it.

Sooner or later you are going to have to make some major changes to your lifestyle but don’t get impatient and start before the time is right. When will that be? Listen to your inner voice and move swiftly and decisively when it tells you to act.

What happens today will in some way remind you that making money and climbing the ladder of success, while enjoyable, are not really what life is about. It’s people that matter, not things or possessions. You’re rich in friendships, so enjoy them.

Mars in your sign makes you intensely ambitious but other influences warn that you need to keep your professional life and your private life in balance. On the home front, especially, you must spend more time with the people who love you.

You may be tempted to get your own back on someone who has let you down or made you look silly, but is it worth the effort? Probably not. You’ve got more productive things to do with your time than pursue senseless vendettas.

The planets warn that with so many amazing plans in your mind you run the risk of spreading yourself too thin. You have only so much time and energy to spare, so be selective and only do what really matters in the present moment.

Why have you retreated into your shell? It’s not like you to shut yourself off from the world and if you refuse to get out and about and interact with friends and family they may start to worry about you. Let them know you’re okay.

You could make an issue of something that annoys you but is it worth the effort? No, it’s not. There are so many things going well for you now that minor setbacks can be safely ignored. Don’t waste your time on people who think and act small.

Something that once seemed beyond you is now within your grasp and at some stage today you must reach out and take it. But don’t hold on to it too tightly. The less possessive you are about material things the more of them you will enjoy.

If a friend or family member is sending out signals that they don’t want you to get too close you must respect their wishes. You may not understand why they are refusing to accept your help but there will be a reason, so keep your distance.

Someone you have not seen for a while will come back into your life over the next few days. Whatever your relationship was like before it will be all smiles now as you remember all the good times you shared – while conveniently forgetting the bad!

Try not to pay too much attention to matters of a material nature. Your financial status is of no great importance in the wider scheme of things, so put all thoughts of money out of your head and focus on creativity – and love what you are doing.

You may be of the opinion that the best way to proceed is to tear down everything you have built and start again from scratch, but is that really necessary? Today’s Venus-Mars link warns against impetuous action. Think before you make your move.

Even a Scorpio gets it wrong once in a while, so don’t think it’s a big deal just because you made a mistake of some kind. At the very least the situation should remind you that you are only human, just like everyone else.

You cannot live in fear of things that might happen in the future but most likely won’t. The world is full of people who spread doom and gloom news but you don’t have to be one of them. Be positive today and help others be positive too.

Work and career issues are going well for you now but don’t fall into the trap of thinking that you no longer have to make as much effort as you did before. You are only as good as your last success, so keep at it and keep making waves.

The more certain people complain that you are making life difficult for them the more you can be sure that you are on the right track. The fact is your needs and their needs are at right angles to each other, so make sure your needs come first.

If you have feelings for someone but they don’t know about it you may be tempted to open up and tell them today. That might be a mistake. Today’s Venus-Mars link suggests the response you get may not be to your liking. Leave it a while.

A sun-Pluto link on your birthday means there will be some pretty stiff challenges over the coming 12 months, but if you are going to accomplish anything meaningful in life you must embrace those challenges rather than try to avoid them. Be the best!

The more you try to convince people that you know what is best for them the more inclined they are to disbelieve you, which is annoying to say the least. Maybe you should take the hint and let them sort it out for themselves.

No matter how much work has piled up over the past few days you must forget about it for now and plan for the weekend. Ignore existing deadlines, at least for the next 72 hours. Your work will still be there for you come Monday morning.

You could not care less what other people think about your methods and you will make sure they know that fact today. But don’t come on too strong and antagonize people you will need to get along with over the next few weeks. Be tactful.

You may find it harder than usual to control your temper today, due to the influence of a tough looking sun-Pluto link, but if you put your mind to it you can find ways to stay calm. Nothing in life is worth getting too worked up about.

Last minute changes to travel and social plans are best avoided, not least because your workload is such that it will be hard enough to meet your commitments as it is, without adding uncertainty to the mix. Stick to what you have already agreed on.

Don’t plan on getting ahead of yourself today because the planets warn you will be called on to deal with unexpected crises both at home and at work and they will eat into your time. Take events as they come and take nothing too seriously.

There may be one or two emotionally bruising encounters today with people whose way of looking at the world is very different to your own. Try not to make a war of it but don’t back down either. You must always stick up for yourself.

Little things will annoy you today and the more you tell yourself to stop being silly and get on with life the more worked up you will get. By this time tomorrow you will have calmed down again. Hopefully not much damage will have been done!

You hate injustice but you sometimes see bad things occurring where they don’t really exist and that could be a problem for you over the next 24 hours. Keep telling yourself that it will all come right in the end – the universe will see to it.

Be flexible today. Bend a little. Yes, of course you can do that Capricorn! People in positions of authority are watching you closely and if they like what they see it could be rewarding for you in the very near future. Never be too rigid in your thinking.

Sometimes you read too much into what is taking place in the world and that could be a problem today as the sun’s link to Pluto, planet of power, encourages you to expect the worst. No, it’s not the end of the world. It’s just the beginning.

Sometimes it’s okay to be a bit suspicious and today’s less than positive cosmic alignment will make it easy to believe that certain individuals cannot be trusted. Keep your doubts to yourself for the time being but be on your guard as well.

Take time on your birthday to define your goals for the coming year. You don’t need to go into detail but you do need to identify the direction you want to move in and the milestones you want to reach along the way. Give yourself something to aim for.

Your self-confidence could be a bit fragile this weekend as nothing you do seems to find favour with people you love and respect. Don’t worry, this is only a passing phase, so let it pass and come Monday you will be their favourite again.

Ignore those who say that certain things must not be said or done. If a belief or course of action feels right to you then go for it. Pay no attention to what others tell you this weekend. Only listen to and act on what your inner voice says.

If you give others the impression that you are being too negative about what they are proposing they may cut you out of their plans, and that would be a shame because the planets indicate they will be a huge success. Be positive Gemini!

Someone you can usually trust seems to be giving you a slanted version of what’s been going on and you must make it your number one aim to find out the truth. If you act on misleading information the consequences could be disastrous.

The effects of yesterday’s sun-Pluto link won’t fade for a day or two yet, so be careful what you say to people in positions of power and don’t be tempted to use your own position to get an advantage over others. If you do it WILL rebound on you.

Why are some people so negative in their thinking? Whatever the reason you must have no part of it and may even have to distance yourself physically this weekend so their bad vibes can’t rub off on you. Always believe that good things will happen.

This could turn out to be one of those weekends when the more you strive to get things done the less you seem to accomplish. Maybe you should take the hint and stop trying so hard. The workday week is over, so why not have some fun?

If you change something you are working on in even a minor way the long-term effects are unlikely to be to your liking, so think before you act and recognize that, in fact, you are under no obligation to act at all. Don’t make life difficult for yourself.

Yes, it may be true that someone is talking behind your back – you’ve heard the whispers – but there is nothing you can do about it, so why let it get to you? Most likely they are jealous of your talent and good looks. Most people are!

Don’t wait for a friend to ask for assistance today – you can see they are struggling and you must dive right in and help. But don’t go too far and completely take over what they are doing. Just show them how to do it better for themselves.

The planets suggest you are worrying about something that isn’t worth the effort, so get your head together and tell yourself that from here on in you are not even going to think about it. This kind of “problem” tends to go away if you ignore it.

You need to be a bit more skeptical about what friends tell you and what you read and hear in the news. That is doubly important when the news is negative. Are things really so bad or are certain people putting a slant on events for their own ends?

A sun-Pluto link on your birthday will stir things up over the coming 12 months but if you can stay calm and identify the new opportunities that are sure to arise you will not only survive but thrive as well. Most change is good change, so don’t fight it.

A sun-Pluto link warns of upheavals and confrontations. That’s probably not what you want to hear right at the start of the week but forewarned is forearmed and now you know there is trouble afoot you can make some nimble moves to avoid it.

You will be faced with a situation that calls for quick and decisive action today. It will be obvious right from the start that this is not the sort of situation you can avoid, so accept the position you find yourself in and turn it to your advantage.

You won’t be content to sit back and watch the world go by over the next few days – you will be eager to get out there and do things that make a difference. Make sure it’s a positive difference though, not just something you do for fun.

You have no intention of doing what other people tell you to do, especially if they seem to believe that their elevated social or professional position gives them the right to direct your actions. It doesn’t, and the sooner they learn that fact the better.

Even if you may not believe that one individual can change the world you are advised to act as if you believe it today. With the sun, your ruler, linked to power planet Pluto you must not be scared to rock the boat. Create your own little storm.

Before you do something big, maybe even spectacular, think carefully about how much it is going to cost you, because the planets warn you could easily let your spending get out of hand. Decide on a reasonable budget and stick to it Virgo.

There will be some interesting developments in your social life this week and, yes, you will have one, even though you seem to be working all hours at the moment. There is more to life than making a living, so get out there and, well, live a little.

Cosmic activity in and around the most sensitive area of your chart has got you jumping at shadows of late and today’s sun-Pluto link won’t help much. But that’s okay. A good scare could be precisely what you need to get you moving again.

Accept from the start this week that other people will not be playing by the rules. That will put you in the right frame of mind to deal with whatever challenges come your way. Remember, all is fair in love and war – and making money and getting ahead.

You need to do something different, something that helps you break through the limitations that have been imposed on you (and which you have imposed on yourself) in recent weeks. If you make it something big and bold the world is sure to take notice.

You tend to take certain things for granted and act as if they will never change, but today’s sun-Pluto link will destroy that belief quite forcefully. The simple fact is that nothing stays the same forever – and nor should you want it to.

The going will get a bit rough over the next day or two and you may need to get assistance from someone you know you can trust. Likewise, others will come to you for help in their moments of need. Kindness and co-operation are what life’s all about.

Money matters should go well for you over the next 12 months. You don’t have to do anything special to attract financial good fortune – just expect good things to become available to you and, somehow, they will materialize in your life. Lucky you.

Your feelings for a certain person run deep and with love planet Venus so strong in your chart they will get deeper still over the next few days. By all means worship the ground they walk on but don’t forget they are human too.

Love is in the air as the new week begins. Too often of late you have allowed affairs of the heart to take a back seat while you took care of business but that must now end. Give your attention to the people who matter – the people you love.

If you want to get on in the world then you are going to have to be a bit more flexible in the way you approach work matters. You cannot expect others to change their ways just to suit you, at least not every time, so bend a little, too.

This could be one of those days when everything you desire will just fall into your lap. Yes, it really should be that good. A lot depends, of course, on your attitude. If you expect good things to happen they most likely will.

You may not be modest by nature but it will pay you to let others take some of the credit for recent successes. If you say nice things about the people you work with now chances are they won’t be so demanding of you later on.

Spend time with those you feel attuned to emotionally and avoid those whose very presence annoys or upsets you. You are not wrong to have these feelings – deep down you can sense that being close to them could be bad for your health.

You seem to believe that someone is hiding something from you. Maybe they are but that does not mean it’s a bad thing. Most likely they want to surprise you in some way, so don’t ask too many questions – you don’t want to spoil it!

Venus and Mercury join forces in your sign today, making this one of the best times ever to let the people you love know how you feel about them. You certainly seem to be flavour of the month at the moment. Make it last as long as you can!

The last few days have been rather intense and you’ve hardly had time to catch your breath, but now you can sit back and let life come to you. Don’t worry about tomorrow, nor the day after that. Your guardian angel is watching over you.

This is one of those days when you will find yourself on exactly the same wavelength as the people around you, which is nice. Everyone seems amazingly friendly now but don’t let that make you suspicious. There’s no trickery or deception involved.

Cosmic activity in the career area of your chart suggests that employers and other important people will look on you favourably over the next 24 hours. Whatever favours you ask of them they will do their best to grant, so ask away!

No matter where you go or what you do today the universe will take care of you, so stop worrying about what your next step should be and just take it. Travel plans are under excellent stars and the further afield you go the more fun you will have.

The year ahead of you is going to be life-changing, and it won’t only be your life that changes. The challenges you face must be faced alongside those who share your higher values. Don’t go it alone and certainly don’t lower your standards.

Sometimes you can be too suspicious for your own good but it’s quite unnecessary at the moment because it’s obvious who your real enemies are. All you have to do is decide whether to confront them or whether to avoid them.

There is a great deal taking place behind the scenes at the moment, so don’t jump to conclusions and don’t make any major moves that don’t have to be made. What’s going on will be a lot clearer toward the end of the week.

A friend is not really a friend and an enemy is not really an enemy. How did you get them mixed up? Whatever the reason you know what is what and who is who now, so get your act together and put things right. Better late than never.

The more you try to move ahead with a plan that means a lot to you the more invisible forces seem to be holding you back. Perhaps you should take the hint and recognize that the universe does not want you to go down this particular route.

It always seems to others as if you have total self-belief but there are times when even a Leo starts to have doubts and this appears to be one of them. Maybe if you stopped chasing after things you clearly cannot have life would be happier.

There is a simple solution to your current dilemma and it won’t be long before you recognize what it is and what needs to be done to get past it. You may have to make do with less for a while but you’ll make up for it later.

You must not try to avoid relationship problems, especially those that have been dragging on for a while. If a difference of opinion is so glaringly obvious that it cannot be ignored then you must do something about it – and that means today!

Don’t waste time and energy trying to explain to other people why you had to do certain things because if they don’t “get it” by now chances are they never will. Just do what you feel is right and be ready to live with the consequences.

If you are not happy with either a relationship or something of a creative nature then you must change it. Don’t let it carry on as it is because that just guarantees you will become even more disillusioned. Take action and take it right now.

You may want to rush in and get things done today but that little voice in the back of your head is urging caution and you would be wise to listen to it. The planets warn if you act in haste you could soon come to a grinding halt.

People will ask you what you think about certain situations today and being the brutally honest kind of person you are you will tell them – and they won’t like it. Be that as it may it is your cosmic duty to call it as you see it.

Try not to be greedy today when it comes to money matters and possessions. It’s fine that material things mean a lot to you but that can make it easier for rivals and enemies to pull your strings. Pretend you don’t care about material things.

You must not take “No” for an answer, not in your personal life and not in your working life. If you want to be taken seriously – and you do – then you must show that you are not the sort who gives up in the face of opposition.

You will get an interesting offer of some kind over the next 24 hours and, yes, it will be a genuine offer. Deep down you know this is the kind of golden opportunity you cannot allow to pass, so take advantage of the situation – quickly!

Not everyone will approve of what you get up to today but that won’t worry you in the slightest. Sometimes you quite enjoy stirring things up a little, or a lot, so push ahead with your plans and, if others don’t like it, that’s good!

The sun in the most dynamic area of your chart puts you in the mood to change things around. However, other aspects warn there are some things it might be wiser to leave as they are. Change things for a reason, not just because you can.

You will reach your objectives in life a lot quicker if you join hands with people who share your aims and ambitions and, more importantly, your principles and beliefs. On your own, you can do only so much. Together, you can do everything.

Decide what it is you want to achieve then set about it with energy, enthusiasm and a passion for excellence. No matter how many disappointments you may have suffered in the past your future looks bright, so get your act together – and get busy.

Don’t waste your time and energy trying to settle old scores. Be positive about your ambitions, and be forgiving of people who, for one reason or another, cannot reach your high standards. There has rarely been a better time for a Virgo to shine.

If you know what you want and if you are bold enough to go after it you will accomplish great things. Someone in a position of authority will look kindly on you today and you must use their influence to help get what you want.

Although you have been under a lot of pressure in recent weeks you must also admit that you have learned a great deal about both yourself and other people. Sometimes it takes tough times to discover who we are and what we can do.

Instead of brooding on how unfair the world is why don’t you get out there and do something to improve it? If you are tired of seeing the same negative stories in the media every day then write a more positive one for yourself.

This could be and should be a day to remember for all the right reasons. Don’t let self-doubt hold you back. Both in your personal life and at work anything and everything is possible. Nourish your belief in yourself – and watch it grow.

The planets indicate you need to get yourself into a frame of mind where nothing bothers you too much, where you can accept what happens in the world around you with serenity. For starters, don’t take anyone or anything too seriously today.

Speak up and let people know what you believe and why you believe it. Too often in the past you have been too negative about your own ideas and opinions, and that must now change. Let the world know you have something to say.

You will be so full of energy and enthusiasm this year that you take on tasks you previously believed would be too much for you. That’s great but you still need to be selective. Do one thing really well rather than several things to a lower standard.

You may go over the top in some way today but chances are the universe will protect you. That is not, of course, an excuse to act in ways that might hurt other people, not least because that hurt is sure to come back at you at some stage.

If something does not work out the way you expected it to today don’t feel bad about it, and certainly don’t try to make others feel bad by pinning the blame on them. Life is full of ups and downs. You’ll feel better about the situation tomorrow.

You may not want to let others make decisions for you on the work front but you must let them take some of the strain. Jupiter, planet of excess, is encouraging you to push yourself harder than ever, but that may not be good for your health.

Why are you trying so hard to impress other people when, if anything, they should be trying to impress you? Focus on what you do well today and give it 100 per cent. If others praise you for it that’s great; if not, that’s okay, too.

You can, if you wish, force people you work with to do your bidding today but why would you want to when they are more than willing to assist if you just ask them nicely? Get rid of the tough guy act – you don’t need it.

Don’t try to avoid situations that have the potential to turn nasty – tackle them head on. The planets suggest you will quite enjoy getting stuck in to situations that most other people would prefer to avoid. It’s the challenge that excites you.

You will get a chance to do something remarkable today and you must not let it pass you by. Don’t sit at home wondering what is going on in the world outside your door – get out there and find out. And then add your bit as well.

Most likely you will be in the mood to sit back and watch the world go by today, and so you should. You will be busier than ever not long after the sun enters your sign on the 23rd, so why put yourself under pressure now?

There has rarely been a better time to push yourself forward and show those around you, at home and at work, what you are capable of. Be assertive but in a way that does not antagonize people. Even if you’re the boss you should also be a friend.

You are not really as conservative in your thinking as you sometimes make out and over the next two or three days you will get the opportunity to surprise people by the radical nature of your ideas. They must, of course, be practical too.

The world seems such a sunny and happy place at the moment – for you at least – and you must strive to make your positive outlook last as long as possible. Don’t strive too hard though as that could stress you out all over again!

Upcoming cosmic influences will boost both your ego and your energy. On the work front, especially, you will no longer be prepared to play second fiddle to people whose talents you don’t rate as highly as your own. You know you’re the best.

The influence of Mercury on your birthday this year means you will have plenty to say for yourself, and most of it will be worth hearing, but you also need to make sure that you deal only in facts. Don’t give your rivals a chance to make you look bad.

Certain people may be disruptive and hard to get along with today but don’t worry about it too much. Listen to what they have to say and promise to take their ideas into consideration, then do what you were going to do anyway.

There are so many cosmic forces battering you at the moment that you have no choice but to let them get on with it. Things will improve dramatically tomorrow and even more so early next week. Better times are coming – look forward to them.

This may be a rather tense time for you but if you keep telling yourself that there is nothing to worry about your belief in that opinion will make it a fact. Never underestimate the power of the mind, especially the Gemini mind!

It may seem as if the world has gone crazy but are things really as bad as some people say? No, of course not. In fact there are still plenty of things going on, many in your own immediate environment, that can cheer you up if you let them.

Everything has its time and place and when one thing moves out of your life another soon comes in to replace it. With that thought in mind don’t try to cling to something that is now on its way out. Its time is over. Your time is just beginning.

No doubt you have big plans for the remainder of the year and no doubt you have made all sorts of promises to yourself that this time you will get it right. That’s great but don’t look too far ahead. Take each day as it comes.

What seems such a trivial issue to you is obviously of major importance to other people, so don’t try to ignore it because they simply won’t let you. At least make it look as if you share their concerns, even if you couldn’t care less.

Today’s Mars-Mercury link warns you need to watch what you say. If you come on too strong you could find that you spark a fight or feud that causes all sides some serious damage. You don’t have to tell it like it is all the time Scorpio!

If you go out of your way to help other people today they will go out of their way to help you later on, so everybody wins. Besides which, it does your soul good to assist a fellow human being when they can’t do certain things for themselves.

The planets indicate that if you want to stay happy – indeed, if you want to stay sane – you need to go with the flow and trust that in time what seems to be going wrong now will set itself right. The universe has a way of balancing things out.

Why so jumpy? Why so afraid? Whatever the reason you must get over it because in a matter of days there will be an opportunity to move up in your job or career and to make the most of that opportunity you will need to be bold.

You have never been much for routine but you dislike it when other people change their routines and leave you high and dry. Maybe that’s what you get for relying too much on friends and colleagues. Maybe you should set your own agenda.

There is one thing and one thing only that can stop you from reaching the heights and that is your own negative thinking. Promise yourself on your birthday this year that you will greet each new day with a smile and each new challenge with genuine enthusiasm.

A relationship of some kind will come under pressure this weekend and if you say the wrong thing at the wrong time in the wrong way it could end completely. Try to keep your more negative thoughts to yourself. You don’t have to speak up.

You seem to have hit a wall as far as a creative project is concerned. Do you carry on with it? Or do you give up and focus your energy in a new direction? It would be a shame to waste all the time you have invested. Give it another go.

Your workload will increase dramatically a few days from now, so make sure you are on top of your chores or you could be playing catch-up for several weeks to come. Better still, delegate as much as you can to other people.

A feud that has dragged on for ages needs to be resolved, and quickly. If you allow it to linger it could hold you back from doing something creative with your life when the sun moves in your favour on Tuesday. Look for a compromise solution.

If you don’t feel like doing much this weekend then . . . don’t do it. Your mind and your body have been sending you signals for quite some time now that you need to take things easy – and it’s about time you listened to them.

Why are you still waiting? Why are you still hesitating? Whatever the reason you need to get over it because new opportunities will be coming your way very soon and you must be in the kind of mindset where you can move quickly.

Once again you seem to be worrying about things that you have no way of changing. How many times have you been told that’s a waste of time? And how many times have you resolved to change your ways? Too many. Never mind, maybe this time.

You may not think of yourself as a star or celebrity, as the kind of person that others look up to, but in some ways you are and over the next few days you will attract the kind of attention that makes you realize how highly you are rated.

There is no point cursing fate if what happens this weekend is not to your liking because it won’t change things. What will change, however, is your ability to understand what got you into this position in the first place. Understand it, and act.

Try not to take an irrational dislike to someone you know very little about. Yes, on the surface they may seem a bit too full of themselves, but dig deeper and you will find you have a lot in common. Who knows, you could even become friends.

Tread warily when dealing with people who promise huge returns for just a small investment on your part. You should know by now that the only way to make serious money is by having a seriously good idea and putting some serious work into it.

Some of the people you are close to in life have been a bit moody of late but that should change next week when the sun moves into your fellow water sign of Scorpio. For now, just put up with their silences and strange ways.

You need to learn to take a more laid-back view of the world and its woes. Yes, of course, there are many things that need to be fixed, but there are also many things that are going very well indeed. Involve yourself more in the latter this year.

Relationships won’t seem quite so tense as the new week begins, which is good, but if you want it to stay that way try not to let slip any comments that might upset those of a sensitive disposition. Not everyone is as robust as you Aries.

No matter who you may have fallen out with in recent weeks you can easily make it up with them again. Today’s Venus-Neptune link will help you focus on the things you have in common rather than the things that set you apart. That’s progress.

Do what you feel you have to do today and don’t lose sleep over the possible consequences. What will be will be and, as with so many other similar situations in the past, it’s unlikely to be anywhere near as bad as you initially fear.

Your powers of self-discipline have been tested over the past few days and the good news is you have come through with flying colours. Now you must show other people how to stay calm and not lose their cool in challenging situations. Be a good example.

There has been so much drama in your life of late that you could do with a few days when nothing much happens. Those days will come but not yet. The sun’s imminent change of signs will bring crises that only you know how to deal with.

Venus, planet of love, will assist you in patching up a relationship that may have turned a touch sour in recent weeks. The important thing is to recognize that there is precious little actually wrong with it. You both just need to cool down a bit.

Your ruling planet Venus links with Neptune, planet of empathy, today, so you won’t find it hard to reach out to people who desperately need a helping hand. Don’t be too selective in who you choose to assist – if others ask you must give what you can.

Everyone has fears and anxieties – yes, even a Scorpio – so don’t think you are strange because you worry what the future might bring. But don’t give in to that worry either. Always have a purpose and always keep moving toward it, step by step.

It is of the utmost importance that you stay in a positive frame of mind today, especially if you are involved in situations where everyone needs to pull together to make sure of success. You won’t get far if you are constantly arguing with each other.

An opportunity to improve your status must be take advantage of immediately. If you can’t make up your mind about it over the next day or two it may be taken away from you and given to someone else. Do you really want it Capricorn? Then take it!

A Venus-Neptune link will brighten your day by helping you to come to terms with the fact that people have a right to be different and that without that difference the world would be a far more boring place. Do you really want everyone to be just like you?

Neptune, your ruler, links with Venus, planet of love today, making it easy for you to feel other people’s pain. But you must not let their pain become your pain. Help others with their problems if you can but don’t let those problems weigh you down as well.

You will find your voice over the coming 12 months and what you have to tell the world will meet with huge approval. Your way with words and your obvious sincerity will attract praise on both a personal and a professional level. Make it work for you.

You need to start looking at your long-term financial situation in a more serious way. If you are typical of your sign you most likely take money matters as they come, but the planets warn that approach won’t work any more. Start planning ahead.

Partners and loved ones will be a bit more assertive than usual today but that’s okay. With a little bit of thought and effort you can help them harness their energy for more positive things. Partnerships can be highly productive for everyone now.

You will work like a demon over the next few days. You will take on tasks and responsibilities that at most other times you might prefer to avoid. But don’t take on too much and risk burning yourself out. Look ahead and pace yourself.

No matter how tough life may have been for you of late as from today it will start to get better – much better! Stop feeling sorry for yourself and start doing the things that will make your existence more enjoyable and more productive.

You need to deal with a problem that you have been avoiding for some time. Most likely it involves someone you live with or are related to. Whatever it is that has been dividing you it’s time to kiss and make up, or at least shake hands!

You may be in an argumentative mood today and even the most mildly expressed statement of belief, if it clashes with your own, could set you off. Don’t expect to get it all your own way though. Others can be just as opinionated as you.

The sun is about to leave your sign but there is no reason why your energy and enthusiasm should wane. You have built up quite a head of steam in recent weeks and if you are smart (and you are!) you will find ways to keep it going.

As the sun is about to join Jupiter in your birth sign you should be feeling quietly confident about your prospects. In a matter of days you won’t be in the least bit quiet though – you will be singing your own praises loud and clear!

You may not want to act on the assumption that people could be conspiring against you but the planets warn you cannot afford to take anything on trust, at least for the time being. Be aware that not everyone would like to see you succeed.

You need to rethink something of a creative nature that you had hoped would work but can now recognize is not going to evolve to the point where you are happy with it. It’s no big deal – you can easily upgrade what you have already done.

As the sun is about to move into the area of your chart that governs your place in the world you must be upbeat about your abilities. What employers and other important people want to see in you is confidence. Fake it if you don’t yet have it.

One of the best times of the year begins tomorrow when the sun moves into your fellow water sign of Scorpio. For the next few weeks you will look at life as a gift rather than as a trial. That’s how you should look at it all the time!

A new start is possible any day of the year but with the sun changing signs on your birthday this really is the ideal day to move from one way of living to another. It’s all about the future now, so banish the past from your mind.

There are certain issues in your life that need dealing with and can no longer be avoided. Find the courage to make a start and then follow through to the end. Don’t be afraid to ask others for help – you may be surprised how well they respond.

The sun moves into the partnership area of your chart today, so anything of a one-to-one nature, be it personal or professional, can be changed for the better. A new romantic relationship is possible but you need to be more open about your feelings.

This is the ideal time to make changes to your methods and routines. You may be a creature of habit but you recognize that certain ways of doing things are not working as well as they should, so push your ego to one side and try something different.

You have kept your feelings in check for too long and now you must let them out again. The results could be spectacular! The sun in the sympathetic sign of Scorpio will encourage you to believe that all things are possible – and they are.

Cosmic activity in and around the domestic area of your chart means things may be a bit tense on the home front today. The good news is that if you make an effort to find out why loved ones are so uptight harmony can soon be restored.

There is no point trying to predict what will happen over the next few days because there are so many ways your current situation could play itself out. Just relax and let things happen and be ready to move in a radically new direction.

You need to get serious about your cash-flow situation. The sun’s move into the money area of your chart will make it clear where and how savings need to be made. Looks like that shopping spree you were planning may have to be postponed.

The sun moves into your birth sign today and a new phase begins. Tomorrow’s full moon could bring an unwelcome surprise but once you get past that it should be blue skies and smiles all the way. Life is what you choose to make of it.

Cosmic activity in the most sensitive area of your chart could have a negative effect on your outlook but you must overcome it and strive to be positive. This may be a time for thinking rather than doing but your thoughts don’t have to be glum.

Opportunities will come thick and fast over the next few days. Friendships and group activities are under especially good stars at the moment and if you get out into the world and do things with other people the results could be spectacular.

If you are in any way dissatisfied with your work or career now is the time to make changes. It may even be time to think seriously about taking up a new vocation. Whatever you choose to do you will soon be moving up in the world.

As the sun moves into your fellow water sign of Scorpio today your worries about money and other material matters will begin to fade and in a matter of days won’t bother you at all. But no, that is not an excuse to go on a spree!

A full moon on your birthday is sure to place obstacles in your path but you will overcome each and every one of them. You will never be asked to take on more than you can handle, so believe in yourself and be the best you can be.

You may look confident on the outside but today’s full moon could dent your self-belief a bit. On the material front, if something you value is taken away from you over the next 24 hours it means you no longer need it – so let it go.

A full moon in your sign suggests you will have to fight hard to get your way today. You could, of course, decide not to fight at all and let fate take its course but what kind of message would that send to your rivals and enemies?

The harder you work lately the less you accomplish – or at least it seems that way. Maybe you should take the hint and stop forcing yourself to do things you don’t really care about, even more so if you are doing them for other people.

Keep your distance from people whose negative outlook could easily get under your skin. Your first and only duty over the next 24 hours is to keep your mind free from ideas that seem to favor the worst possible way of looking at the world.

If you are expecting other people to be enthusiastic about what you are up to then most likely you will be disappointed. But so what? Whether they support you or not will have no effect on the outcome, which depends entirely on you.

You are under no obligation to care as much about other people’s problems as you do your own. Yes, of course, if you get the chance to assist them you should but don’t feel guilty about it if you have to tell them you’re too busy to help.

A positive attitude is essential today, because if you let negative thoughts enter your mind it could stop you taking advantage of opportunities that are designed by the universe to make you materially and emotionally richer. It’s all good, so be happy.

Worrying about things you have no way of controlling is a complete waste of time and emotional energy. What will be will be – and with the sun now in your sign it will be amazing – so let go of your doubts and live without fear.

Today’s full moon will in some way or other remind you that you don’t know it all, and never will. Perfection may be something to aim for but it’s not something any human being ever really achieves. There is still so much for you to learn.

You will find it hard to feel sorry for people who have brought their difficulties upon themselves. Having said which, if someone approaches you for assistance you have a duty to support them if you can. Do something that helps them in practical ways.

You may be tempted to interfere in a friend’s private life today but the planets warn that could be a very bad idea. They will learn more in the long-term – and you will still remain friends – if you just let them get on with it.

You may want to come and go as you please today but the full moon is unlikely to allow it. If you want to enjoy your independence you must first take care of certain duties and obligations – you know, those ones you happily signed up for.

Try not to be too generous for your own good. Yes, of course, there are a lot of needy people in the world and if you can do your bit to help some of them that’s good, but taking care of your own needs must still have priority.

You may have a particular goal in mind but don’t focus on it to the exclusion of everything else. You need to be flexible if you are to make the most of the opportunities coming your way. There’s more than one road to success.

You are finding it hard to be honest about your feelings and that’s a shame because others need to know how much you care. Also, if you walk around with a frown on your face they may think they have done something to displease you.

There is a danger at the moment that you will let people get away with things they do not deserve to get away with. It may seem the easy option now but it could cause problems later on when there are more serious issues at stake.

This is potentially one of the best times of the year for you, so why are you still looking back on things that might have been? Yesterday is over and done with, it’s only tomorrow that matters – and tomorrow starts right now.

If there is something you feel strongly about you must let others know about it. Don’t keep your feelings hidden because if you internalize them they may damage you in ways you had not expected. Be open about what you feel and what you believe.

Someone needs a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on and you are not the sort to turn them away. You must, however, make sure they know that your help is conditional on them taking more responsibility for themselves in future.

For best results today just sit quietly some place that makes it possible to collect your scattered thoughts. You don’t have to be sociable every day of the week – six days out of every seven is more than enough – so enjoy your own company.

There is a danger that you will get too confident and take your eye off the ball. The sun in your sign endows you with a great deal of self-belief (as if you did not have enough already) but that won’t save you if you make silly mistakes.

You may not be the sort to make a big deal of your emotions but you need to let someone know how important they are. You don’t have to declare your undying love but you do have to let them know your feelings for them are sincere.

You cannot be the biggest and the best all the time, so if your ego is feeling a bit deflated today don’t let it worry you. It might pay you to slow down a bit, physically and mentally, as you have been pushing yourself rather hard.

Why are you suddenly so eager to take offence? No doubt it has something to do with Mars in your sign but you don’t have to get angry over every little thing that goes wrong. Rise above petty differences today and treat life as a game.

You will demand to be heard today and if those around you have any sense they will let you say your piece. No doubt some will disagree with your message but what they cannot deny is your passion. You should be passionate more often!

The sun and Venus join forces on your birthday in a way that guarantees you will be “flavour of the month” for the coming year. Don’t be afraid to take chances because most times you will succeed, and even when you fail no one will mind.

You instinctively know what needs to be done and you won’t hesitate to do it. One of the great things about your birth sign is your self-belief, so you won’t care in the slightest how many people tell you that you are doing it wrong.

You may have been dependent on someone in the past but you won’t need their assistance today, and you must make sure they are aware of that fact. They seem to have got it into their head that they can interfere any time they like.

You want to prove you have what it takes to compete at the highest level but watch out you don’t bite off more than you can chew. Everyone has limits, even a Gemini, and you must make sure you know what your limits are.

No matter how many bad things may have happened in the past only good things will happen over the next few days. Cosmic activity in the most dynamic area of your chart urges you to go out and have fun tonight and over the weekend.

Something you seem to have neglected in recent weeks will suddenly become important to you again, but don’t expect other people to just fall in with your plans, especially if you left them to it before. You’ve got some making up to do!

Today’s sun-Venus link means you will be feelings relaxed about life in general and about affairs of the heart in particular. Don’t get so relaxed though that you do nothing– you will have a lot more fun if you are on the move.

Your ruling planet Venus links with the sun today, so good news of one sort or another is sure to come your way. However, as Venus is still moving retrograde you would be wise not to take anything too seriously, including yourself.

You don’t have to do anything special today, you just have to sit back and let life come to you. With so much beneficial cosmic activity in your sign you only have to put a name to your desires to see to come true. Yes, it’s that easy!

How much do you think you are worth – not in a financial sense but in your human value to other people? At this time of year more than most you need friends and family to remind you how much you are cherished – and they will.

Your personal magnetism will draw important people into your orbit today and if you are able to work together there is no limit to what you can accomplish. Gloss over any minor differences you may have – they can be safely ignored.

If you show willing over the next 24 hours you will not only get through a huge amount of work but will impress people in positions of power with your professionalism. They are sure to reward you generously, so make an effort to shine.

Cosmic activity in the sympathetic sign of Scorpio means you can expect good things, and good people, to come your way today and over the weekend. You will be the centre of attention for all the right reasons, and that makes a nice change!

Saturn’s influence on your birthday means there will be times over the coming year when it feels as if your options are being limited by forces you cannot control. But that’s okay – it’s just the universe guiding you in the direction that’s best for you.

You may have good reason to be disappointed with a friend but getting angry about it won’t help. The time has come to forgive and forget and let them know that you don’t hold a grudge. You should, however, be careful who you trust in future.

You will be on the move a lot over the next few days and someone you meet on your travels will open your mind to new possibilities. Up until now you’ve had a rather limited understanding of what’s going on in the world. That is about to change.

Even if you are the kind of Gemini who is careful with money (and few are) you will be tempted to splash out on pretty things this weekend. Only buy items that can be returned with no questions asked. You may run out of cash sooner than expected!

This could be and should be one of the best times of the year for you, so why are you still allowing minor issues to cloud your mind? Whatever the reason you need to get over it fast and raise your sights to bigger and better things. Start now.

If you go out of your way to help people in need this weekend the universe will reward you later on when it is you who is in need of assistance. And if they have brought their troubles on themselves? It doesn’t matter, help them anyway.

There could be some interesting developments in your social life over the next few days, so don’t limit your horizons to places you know and faces that are familiar. Be adventurous. Expand your horizons. The further you travel the more fun you will have.

Often in life it’s not so much what you know as who you know that matters and that is very much the case this weekend. Get out your contacts book and let people whose support you have enjoyed in the past know you are still alive and kicking.

Don’t worry that others might think you are being irresponsible if you just get up and go some place different over the next 48 hours – you deserve a break and have every right to take one. If possible, share your journey with someone you love.

A new arrival on your social scene will make a big impression on you and it may be the start of a beautiful friendship. The fact that you seem to be on the same wavelength for so many things means you’ll enjoy being in each other’s company.

The sun’s link to your ruler Saturn will bring your sense of duty to the fore and you will go all out to complete a project that others are depending on to come right. Don’t do it all on your own though – it must be a group endeavour.

The harder you have pushed yourself in recent weeks the more you must slow down and take things easy now. You don’t have to do anything special this weekend because the things you need will come to you – as will some very interesting people.

Be careful who you confide in over the next 48 hours because not everyone has your interests at heart. You should know by now who you can trust, so if you have any worries to discuss go to them and no one else – don’t make personal issues public.

If you can fix your vision on a single aim or ambition over the coming year then there really is no limit to how high you can climb. What is the one thing that would transform your life from “good” to “great”? Make that one thing your guiding star.

Be ruthless today, both with yourself and with other people. You may want to be friendly with certain individuals but if they are in the way of your ambitions then you must brush them aside. If you don’t, your efforts could fall short of expectations.

Yes, to an extent you will have to dance to someone else’s tune today, but no, that does not mean you won’t have a say in what takes place. Your voice is as important as anyone else’s, and your friends and work colleagues instinctively know this.

You will get the chance to make a good impression on the work front today and you must seize it with both hands. The planets warn if you hesitate for even a moment a rival could nip in and get ahead of you in the race to move up.

Under no circumstances should you back away from your needs and desires today. A new moon in your fellow water sign of Scorpio means you don’t need to make deals to succeed – on the contrary, you will do so much better if you go it alone.

No matter what you had planned to do over the next 24 hours, if loved ones and relatives want to do something different you would be wise to accommodate their needs. Just this once, let them decide which games you are going to play.

You must speak up and say your piece. A few people may not like your loud and overly assertive manner but you can afford to ignore them because those who really matter will be impressed by your get up and go. So get up and shout!

There are some strong emotions at play in your world at the moment and today’s new moon will bring them into focus. Remember, just because someone is acting crazy does not necessarily mean they are crazy. Maybe it’s just an act to fool you.

Any day can be a new beginning and the new moon in your sign makes this the day you can, if you wish, start again with a clean conscience and a blank slate. Listen to what your inner voice is trying to tell you – then act on it decisively.

It’s not like you to shun the limelight but a new moon in the most secretive area of your chart means you may prefer to stay in the shadows today. From there you can work out what’s really going on, as opposed to what others claim is going on.

If you make an effort to communicate with someone you don’t always get along with you may be surprised to discover that you actually have a lot in common. Your outlook on life is similar but you tend to express it in different ways, that’s all.

You must not give in to pressure today, especially on the work front and especially when dealing with people who have the power and influence to make life tough for you. They will respect you more if you stand tall and stand up to them.

If you have been thinking about moving on from your present environment then you can take that to another level today by actually looking around for somewhere else to stay. A change is as good as a rest, so don’t be afraid to walk on and walk far.

You need to stop thinking that you have to plan everything out in great detail. The message of your birthday chart is that you will do better – much better, in fact – if you keep your aims vague and take each day as it comes. Let the universe guide you.

Don’t fall into the trap of thinking that nothing can go wrong for you now because the planets warn there are still a few obstacles up ahead that you will need to get past. Keep your eyes and ears open over the next few days.

Before you make your next move you must ask the people you are closest to emotionally what they think about what you are planning to do. If they are in any way negative about it you must ask them why. Their input could be priceless.

Don’t worry too much if you do not get the support you were hoping for over the next three or four days because you are quite capable of doing what has to be done on your own. You don’t need other people’s approval – only your own!

Check and then check again is the message of the stars for you as the new week begins. It may seem as if something you are working on is going according to plan but could there be something you have missed, something that might cause problems?

You may be tempted to give up on something that is not working out the way you expected but you must stick with it a while longer. Put it on the back burner for a few days and give your mind time to come up with a solution.

Make allowances for those who do not share your sense of adventure. Everyone is different and everyone has their own path to take through life. If your paths converge over the next few days, that’s great. If they don’t, that’s great too.

Every now and then you throw caution to the wind and that seems to be the kind of mood you are in at the moment. Just be careful you are not more reckless than courageous, because if you go too far it could end in tears.

You will receive some kind of offer today and you will be reluctant to turn it down. But turn it down you must because the planets warn if it sounds too good to be true then it most likely is. Listen to what your inner voice tells you.

Keep your schemes and dreams to yourself over the next two or three days, because if the wrong person gets to hear what you are planning they may try to steal your ideas or sabotage your efforts. Not everyone wants to see you succeed.

If someone has done you a favour then you should find a way to repay them over the next few days. However, if you have done a good deed for someone else, you must not expect to get something back in return. Generosity is its own reward.

Don’t get hot under the collar if a friend tries to remind you that you are only human and that you have faults like everyone else. It’s true after all, and they are only trying to save you from making a fool of yourself. You should thank them.

More than anything else over the coming week you must strive to avoid doing things that, if they go wrong, could have an adverse effect on your reputation. What other people think of you matters, though not as much as what you think of yourself.

What sacrifices are you prepared to make to realize your dreams? That is the question you need to answer on your birthday and you should think about it long and hard before making a decision. Life could still be good if you make no sacrifices at all.

Try not to jump to conclusions of any sort today because there is a good chance they could be wrong. Venus, your ruler, warns that if you slip up in any way, shape or form, it could have consequences that are not to your liking.

Don’t complain, don’t explain, and certainly don’t apologize. That is the message of the stars for you today Taurus and if you heed it you will sail past events that upset other people with a minimum of fuss. Refuse to let life get you down.

Take extra care when dealing with matters where there could be money at stake. You may think you need to grab what you can get but the planets promise there is more than enough to go around. Make sure others get their share as well.

The sun in the sympathetic sign of Scorpio does wonders for your confidence and that’s just as well because other aspects warn that someone will go out of their way to make you feel bad about yourself today. They won’t remotely succeed.

Someone who knows how your mind works will try to manoeuvre you in a direction that is of benefit to them but could cost you dearly. The moment you realize what they are up to you must call a halt. Don’t let them use you.

Because you are flexible by nature you don’t find it hard to make compromises, but that could work against you today. You are under no obligation to change what you are doing just to please other people. Pleasing yourself is more important.

It would appear that you are trying too hard to please someone who does not deserve your attention and not hard enough to please someone who does. You need to get your priorities sorted before you lose a friend and make an enemy.

Do what feels right to you today and don’t be surprised if someone makes a big negative noise about it. You are under no obligation to play down your own needs and desires just to please other people, not even people you love.

You won’t see eye-to-eye with someone over a money matter today but it’s not as big a deal as you might think, so don’t get angry about it. Compromise is possible if you give it time, and time is something you have plenty of.

There is a danger that you could read all sorts of weird and wonderful meanings into what is really quite a straightforward situation. Your imagination is a powerful tool but you must learn to control it or it could end up controlling you!

You will have to make one or two changes today and you probably won’t be happy about it, especially if they have been forced on you by other people’s stupidity or selfishness. Be that as it may it’s not worth getting worked up about, so don’t.

It does not matter if your creative ideas are met with a certain amount of opposition today – it matters only that you have enough confidence in what you are doing to carry on regardless. One day you will look back and say “I told you so!”

You know you are capable of so much more but sometimes you find it hard to get motivated and get moving. That won’t be such a problem over the coming 12 months, not least because you desperately need to make some serious money.

You want to bring some kind of feud to an end but you don’t want to admit that it was mainly you who was in the wrong. Look for a compromise solution today but make sure you can do so from a position of strength.

You seem rather sensitive to criticism at the moment but you must not allow yourself to get emotional about what other people say. Pretend you don’t care in the slightest what they think or feel. Put on an act and make it a good one.

You won't be short of admirers today but you cannot possibly accept each and every social invitation that is going to come your way, so be selective and only show your face at events that might be good for you career-wise.

You must not take what others tell you too seriously today, especially if what they tell you is negative in nature. It could be they believe what they say but more likely they are trying to make you look small to make themselves look big in the mirror.

If you are bored with your current social scene then get up and go some place else. There must be a party or two going on in your neighbourhood and, if there isn’t, there is nothing stopping you from throwing one of your own.

You may be in a dynamic sort of mood but you must not let it drive you to the point where you start taking the kind of risks you would usually strive to avoid. Listen to your inner voice and only act on what it tells you.

As Venus, your ruler, moves back into your sign today this is a good time to let those you care about know how much you love them. Don’t worry if not everyone responds with the same level of enthusiasm. Not everyone is as expressive as you.

Don’t worry too much if your rivals seem to pull ahead of you over the next few days. Most likely they are cutting corners or in some other way getting an unfair advantage. In the long-term though it is sure to count against them.

No matter what your differences with someone may be you must make an effort to find a compromise solution. There is so much you can accomplish over the next week or so while Jupiter remains in your sign – don’t let petty squabbles hold you back.

Steer clear of people who annoy you because the planets warn that the more you try to be nice to them today the more they will see that as a sign of weakness. You don’t have to play their silly game. Just give them a miss.

It will pay you to keep your ideas to yourself today, because if you let slip what you are thinking someone may steal your insights and use them for their own benefit. It may be immoral but it’s not illegal, so don’t give too much away.

It may seem as if certain people are conspiring against you but are they really or are you going through one of those typically Piscean phases when you think the world is against you for no good reason? Most likely it’s the latter, so get over it.

You will be in the public eye a lot this year, which at times you will enjoy but at other times you will hate. Like it or not you can’t have one without the other. On balance though you are extremely lucky that so many people want to see you.

There are so many things you want to change in your life but is this really the right time to be changing them? According to the planets if you leave it a week or two, or maybe even three, your efforts will have much more of an impact.

You may be reluctant to admit that you got the wrong end of the stick and accused someone of things they did not do but you really have no choice. One of the hallmarks of your sign is your honesty, so admit you got it wrong.

Put petty disagreements behind you and give others the benefit of the doubt. Some things are worth getting worked up about but most things are not, so try not to get emotional over matters that a few days from now won’t matter in the slightest.

If life seems a bit too easy of late that’s good because it means you are in the groove and getting done what needs to be done. The sun in Scorpio is blowing the wind into your sails, so off you go – and have a great journey!

You may be of the opinion that you should not act yet because you expect a better offer to come along soon, but can you be sure of that? It might be best to take the deal that is on the table in front of you right now.

Let your hair down and have a good time today. Cosmic activity in the most outgoing area of your chart promises you can and you will enjoy mixing with all sorts of people – yes, even people you usually can’t stand the sight of!

Try to do something that makes you feel good about yourself today. It does not matter if that something is important or productive – all that matters is that you enjoy it and have fun doing it. You’ve worked hard of late, so now it’s time to play.

You will have to take care of a lot of routine chores today and while it may be boring it is also of the utmost importance because it will clear the decks and make it easier to focus on more important things tomorrow and over the weekend.

Try not to spread yourself too thin over the next 24 hours. You may think you have enough physical and mental energy to reach all those wonderful targets you’ve set yourself but the planets warn you may be closer to the edge than you realize.

You seem to believe that you should be doing more and you should be doing better but most likely it is your desire for perfection that is pushing you to make so many demands on yourself. You’re human, so don’t set yourself superhuman standards.

Try not to take what other people say too seriously today because among all the good advice there may be some bad advice that could trip you up. It would be nice to believe that everyone is on your side but, seriously, how likely is that?

It may be time to remind those who seem to have forgotten that you are a free spirit and have every right to come and go as you please. The sun in the most adventurous area of your chart is encouraging you to stand up for your rights.

Life should be good for you at the moment and according to the cosmic picture on your birthday it will get even better over the next few months. To get the most from your days – and your nights – believe that the universe is smiling on you, because it is.

If there is something about your work situation you don’t much enjoy there is nothing stopping you from changing it. But before you do ask yourself, honestly, if you really dislike it that much or if you are just momentarily bored. It could be the latter.

Something will happen either today or over the weekend that takes you by surprise and makes you wonder if maybe you have been a bit too hasty in your judgment of someone. Maybe they are not as dumb as you thought they were.

It may feel as if you are running out of time and need to get your act together quickly but is that really the case or are you putting yourself under pressure for no good reason? The planets indicate that you don’t need to rush things.

You must not let other people’s overly cautious ways hold you back from trying something new. You may not be the most adventurous sign of the zodiac but you have your moments and over the next few days you may have several.

You only like surprises when it is you who is doing the surprising and because what occurs over the next 24 hours catches you unaware you won’t be too happy about it. Keep the smile on your face though – don’t let others see they got to you.

You must look for ways to settle a dispute amicably today, because if you allow it to drag on much longer it will taint everything else you are doing. Even if someone owes you an apology, be the one who says sorry first. Pretend that you mean it.

The more you try to please partners and loved ones the less happy with you they seem to get, so you might as well stop trying altogether and do only what amuses you. Strangely, they may be happier with that than if you try to please them.

If someone needs a helping hand today or over the weekend then give it to them with a smile on your face and don’t ask for or expect anything in return. The universe will reward your generosity in other, less materialistic, ways.

You want to be dynamic, you want to be ambitious, but you can’t seem to get started. Most likely it is the sun’s influence in the most sensitive area of your chart that is holding you back. There’s a good cosmic reason for it.

It may be the case that you have no influence over certain situations but try not to feel bad about it. Life moves in cycles and while you may be on the down side of the curve now it won’t be long before you are moving up again.

All possible routes you can take will eventually lead to your ultimate destination, so don’t worry that you might be going in the wrong direction – there is no such thing as a wrong direction. Enjoy life no matter where it seems to be taking you.

You must be ready to take advantage of an unexpected opportunity today. A friend or a work colleague or maybe even a total stranger will make you the kind of offer you find hard to believe – but it’s also very much on the level, so say “Yes”.

This could be and should be one of the very best times of your life. All that is good about your sign – your courage, your confidence, your self-belief – will carry you forward like never before. Dream the impossible dream, then make it happen.

You would be wise not to believe everything that you see and hear over the next 48 hours because almost certainly someone is feeding you wrong information. The only voice you should listen to is the voice that comes from within. It knows the answers.

You seem to be Mr. or Ms. Popular at the moment and that’s very nice, but don’t get carried away and start thinking you can do as you please. You still have responsibilities to take care of, and you won’t be popular for long if you neglect them.

You won't be much in the mood for work this weekend and that’s good because the planets suggest that the best way to get things done is to do nothing at all. Even a Gemini can benefit from a physical and mental recharge once in a while.

Cosmic activity in your fellow water sign of Scorpio endows you with the kind of can-do attitude that gets things done in record quick time. You don’t have to do it all on your own though. Others will happily assist you if you ask them nicely.

You must not let your feelings get in the way of facts this weekend, and the No. 1 fact you need to be aware of is that on the domestic front you cannot hope to please everyone. Ultimately, of course, the person you need to please most is yourself.

It’s not like you to go over the top emotionally and declare your undying love for someone but you might do that this weekend. No doubt you’ll be embarrassed later on when reason kicks in but it’s good to remind others that you have feelings, too.

Money and status may seem important to you now but later on you will look back and realize that it’s love alone that makes the world go round. Having said that, don’t waste your cash on frivolous things – it’s still a resource to be conserved.

You have every right and every reason to enjoy yourself now and no one has the right to suggest that you take life in a more serious fashion. What does “serious” mean anyway? What’s serious to someone else may seem hilariously funny to you.

Why is it that everyone but you is having fun? What have you done so wrong that you must watch from the sidelines while others enjoy themselves? In reality, you’ve done nothing wrong at all, except maybe let negative thoughts unbalance your mind.

You can afford to be generous over the next few days, especially when dealing with people who, for whatever reason, find it hard to share in the things that come to you as if by right. Enjoy your good fortune – and spread it around.

If someone tries to abuse their authority you must make it clear to them that you are not going to stand for it. If there is one thing you truly hate it is being told what to do by people you have no respect for. Don’t let it happen.

The planets are encouraging you to strike out in a new direction and deep down you know it is now or never. Do you have the courage to take that first step into the unknown? If you do, all the other steps will come easy to you.

Whatever challenges you face over the coming year you will deal with them all with ease. There is something in the Scorpio nature that enjoys being put to the test and even the powers that be will be impressed with your creativity and can-do attitude.

You should not pretend that you care about someone when, in all honesty, you don’t have the slightest positive feelings for them. That may sound a bit harsh but you must be true to your own instincts, Aries. If you ignore those instincts you may regret it.

Someone you don’t get along with will be overly friendly towards you today and, of course, you will wonder what they are up to. However, it could be the case that they simply want to get on better terms with you. Be smart and meet them halfway.

Major changes are taking place in your world and you would not be human if they did not worry you. By all means share your concerns with people you trust, but don’t get so caught up in events that you start believing the end is nigh. It isn’t!

The best way to get over a situation that makes you anxious is to expose yourself to what worries you about it the most. Throw yourself in at the deep end today and force yourself to find ways to overcome your fears. You won’t sink – you’ll swim just fine.

A choice you make about a relationship will take you in one of two very different directions, so think carefully before you make it. If the other person is important to you then you must take their needs and desires into account as much as you do your own.

You may be a bit more pushy than usual over the next 24 hours and there is nothing wrong with that, but make sure you push for the right reasons. Some things in life are important and some things are not – make sure you know which is which.
